6730a79b-d9fc-4fab-89c6-428195974199.quote: When the going gets weird, the weird turn pro.
6730a79b-d9fc-4fab-89c6-428195974199.author: Hunter S. Thompson

6c8cdfb6-6c7e-45fd-92c5-8d8d8e3ed95d.quote: For a kid, self-esteem can be as close at hand as a sports victory or a sense of belonging in a peer group. It's a much more complicated and elusive proposition for adults, subject to the responsibilities and vicissitudes of grown-up life.
6c8cdfb6-6c7e-45fd-92c5-8d8d8e3ed95d.author: Meghan Daum

961acf67-ac6a-482f-95c0-bcaf0b5b0575.quote: The day of parochialism in sports is over. The world is too small for what people like to call 'the good old days.' Fans want the best, wherever they come from.
961acf67-ac6a-482f-95c0-bcaf0b5b0575.author: Mario Andretti

759baa61-270e-4f8e-a4c8-8c57832855a2.quote: To catch a wave, to stand up - it was just life-changing. There was nothing that even came close. I quit playing all other sports - by the time I was eleven, they were toast.
759baa61-270e-4f8e-a4c8-8c57832855a2.author: Rob Machado

dcc5a514-8614-4693-9912-52ab81aa7870.quote: Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play.
dcc5a514-8614-4693-9912-52ab81aa7870.author: Mike Singletary

62462592-c080-4816-959e-d7b1f6ab4cad.quote: Of all human activities, man's listening to God is the supreme act of his reasoning and will.
62462592-c080-4816-959e-d7b1f6ab4cad.author: Pope Paul VI

7098262c-40e4-4ca0-848c-e38cfc5e7dc8.quote: I love those who yearn for the impossible.
7098262c-40e4-4ca0-848c-e38cfc5e7dc8.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

e4c27aca-77e3-42d2-a524-d4a31f151aca.quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
e4c27aca-77e3-42d2-a524-d4a31f151aca.author: Thomas Paine

e35a003a-a006-4612-a38e-2e890cc930cd.quote: Winning is habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.
e35a003a-a006-4612-a38e-2e890cc930cd.author: Vince Lombardi

f3acde04-0de5-454e-bf4d-2ad4e8b991ed.quote: Half a century ago, the amazing courage of Rosa Parks, the visionary leadership of Martin Luther King, and the inspirational actions of the civil rights movement led politicians to write equality into the law and make real the promise of America for all her citizens.
f3acde04-0de5-454e-bf4d-2ad4e8b991ed.author: David Cameron

e9b35771-d8d6-404e-a255-7ad8b7de0028.quote: I look up to a strong woman; maybe that's why I fell for Gaga. She works incredibly hard and is very strong and inspirational like Mom, with a great work ethic.
e9b35771-d8d6-404e-a255-7ad8b7de0028.author: Taylor Kinney

f11b79c5-7eb5-4215-ad85-222307ba188c.quote: Look within. Within is the fountain of good, and it will ever bubble up, if thou wilt ever dig.
f11b79c5-7eb5-4215-ad85-222307ba188c.author: Marcus Aurelius

c43bf912-b6a4-4999-b873-bea526cef4c2.quote: In motivating people, you've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.
c43bf912-b6a4-4999-b873-bea526cef4c2.author: Rupert Murdoch

85a599d7-00f2-4359-b8a5-8cd2a2368c0a.quote: Essentially, I am a dreamer. I've dreamed all my life. When I started, I dreamed I'd be Champion because it is a sport that is all about the people who win the most, and I have a fear of not winning.
85a599d7-00f2-4359-b8a5-8cd2a2368c0a.author: Tony McCoy

c4354eb7-4030-4ed7-a55f-4b9f6759bcb9.quote: In football, time and space are the same thing.
c4354eb7-4030-4ed7-a55f-4b9f6759bcb9.author: Graham Taylor

facd2e81-bf86-4278-9248-27c64f494581.quote: Sport doesn't know barriers, really. You are judged on your performance... how far you can jump, how fast you can run, how well you can hit a tennis ball.
facd2e81-bf86-4278-9248-27c64f494581.author: Martina Navratilova

7fdc0efb-ed11-4c15-ae49-71bf31857e6d.quote: I like playing many other sports, such as basketball.
7fdc0efb-ed11-4c15-ae49-71bf31857e6d.author: Guan Tianlang

da3b757c-b0a5-481f-ad49-c5078379c889.quote: I believe in living today. Not in yesterday, nor in tomorrow.
da3b757c-b0a5-481f-ad49-c5078379c889.author: Loretta Young

d45399f5-1de9-441c-b034-e9a9a6be0023.quote: The only thing wrong with the NBA - or any other professional sport, for that matter - is a wild epidemic of Dumbness and overweening Greed. There is no Mystery about it, and no need to change any rules.
d45399f5-1de9-441c-b034-e9a9a6be0023.author: Hunter S. Thompson

e89516b9-b7d5-48d1-b712-b1a910cf52fb.quote: Business gives you a massive high. Doing a great deal, coming up with an inspirational solution... It's very addictive. But it doesn't last long. In isolation, it's a bit sterile. It doesn't reward the soul.
e89516b9-b7d5-48d1-b712-b1a910cf52fb.author: John Caudwell

85c84bf8-aa6a-402d-b2bd-7e04edaf48cd.quote: What better way to get to know a culture than to go there and learn their sports? And I say to people who tell me they can't travel, 'How much did you spend at the mall this year? How many times did you eat out? Take that money and go.'
85c84bf8-aa6a-402d-b2bd-7e04edaf48cd.author: Dhani Jones

6b8eb616-6020-476c-a5a1-2c0d37462c87.quote: The only time my prayers are never answered is on the golf course.
6b8eb616-6020-476c-a5a1-2c0d37462c87.author: Billy Graham

1afce171-faa0-4c28-b800-21ff8c3508a5.quote: I did an A Level in Theatre Studies and had a really inspirational teacher, and then I just went on to university.
1afce171-faa0-4c28-b800-21ff8c3508a5.author: Jessica Raine

30c0a478-2307-49a4-bd4d-b39ecd6103a5.quote: I love sport as long as it's kept as an entertainment - not a meaning of life.
30c0a478-2307-49a4-bd4d-b39ecd6103a5.author: David Icke

f41858ef-2060-4a67-ae64-1caf20667ccb.quote: I realized I love motivating and I love empowering and I love inspiring people. I did that as an athlete for 18 years, and I am able to do that as a motivational speaker now as well as doing work on television.
f41858ef-2060-4a67-ae64-1caf20667ccb.author: Dominique Dawes

8898b276-ed9a-4211-a3a7-cf849ec29c1d.quote: Women's sports is still in its infancy. The beginning of women's sports in the United States started in 1972, with the passage of Title 9 for girls to finally get athletic scholarships.
8898b276-ed9a-4211-a3a7-cf849ec29c1d.author: Billie Jean King

05de2dc9-f5aa-4401-8a96-f7fe0870b5b2.quote: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.
05de2dc9-f5aa-4401-8a96-f7fe0870b5b2.author: Pauline Kael

38ab0aad-d40e-44d2-8fe2-ae20d1d5878e.quote: Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing that it is not fish they are after.
38ab0aad-d40e-44d2-8fe2-ae20d1d5878e.author: Henry David Thoreau

3e13cb1b-0653-495b-bcd2-b7d15715c755.quote: In Boston, they love their sports celebrities. And it's great.
3e13cb1b-0653-495b-bcd2-b7d15715c755.author: Tom Brady

a9fa61ad-3148-4450-a7f6-0ec09075eb76.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
a9fa61ad-3148-4450-a7f6-0ec09075eb76.author: Samuel Beckett

c7863a30-1488-44b7-b42d-75d1dd91b6a4.quote: I don't care what they say about me when I'm through with sports. I don't want to be known as anything else in life but a great father.
c7863a30-1488-44b7-b42d-75d1dd91b6a4.author: Deion Sanders

6b60c860-2d50-4cc2-b42d-f5af0d010cd7.quote: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.
6b60c860-2d50-4cc2-b42d-f5af0d010cd7.author: Les Brown

3d0d3da8-9c18-42d5-a84f-dd0f300f9fdc.quote: Ah, but a man's reach should exceed his grasp, Or what's a heaven for?
3d0d3da8-9c18-42d5-a84f-dd0f300f9fdc.author: Robert Browning

2d72bd8b-20b0-4784-aa23-585dfec7f87b.quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
2d72bd8b-20b0-4784-aa23-585dfec7f87b.author: Joseph Campbell

9dbede86-a920-4302-81d3-9fb77d7efbbc.quote: After a storm comes a calm.
9dbede86-a920-4302-81d3-9fb77d7efbbc.author: Matthew Henry

e77470b0-c749-45c2-949b-d640ac879c0e.quote: The more violent the body contact of the sports you watch, the lower the class.
e77470b0-c749-45c2-949b-d640ac879c0e.author: Paul Fussell

c11e38dc-9ca5-4b1b-b951-f9a6238c5470.quote: No matter how little we think anatomy should matter to one's social and political rights, surely we can't pretend biology doesn't matter in sports. Surely there's a reason we don't let adults play in the t-ball leagues, and a reason most women athletes want their own leagues.
c11e38dc-9ca5-4b1b-b951-f9a6238c5470.author: Alice Dreger

9c113f42-408d-4189-a0b1-5932151fb70e.quote: You know, I never really paid attention to sports, which, coming from the mecca of football in Texas, is kind of odd. I played sports, but I was nerdy. Having a single mother, the pressure was on me to get good grades and a scholarship and go to college.
9c113f42-408d-4189-a0b1-5932151fb70e.author: Sarah Shahi

244a0004-cafc-4f62-ae61-43db132ef28b.quote: There will always be cheaters. It is human nature. It will never be 100 percent clean, in any sport.
244a0004-cafc-4f62-ae61-43db132ef28b.author: David Millar

7814b0d0-2b0a-4348-a48e-096e6bdcac92.quote: I grew up in Baltimore. And yes, I am a big sports fan, especially when it comes to my local teams.
7814b0d0-2b0a-4348-a48e-096e6bdcac92.author: Josh Charles

3349d7f7-45ad-4469-9276-eb1c51830855.quote: We have it in our power to begin the world over again.
3349d7f7-45ad-4469-9276-eb1c51830855.author: Thomas Paine

cb565c3a-c117-4045-a2b8-6534b50c63a7.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
cb565c3a-c117-4045-a2b8-6534b50c63a7.author: William James

e2101e9e-9e3c-41b4-b156-b448ee94bec0.quote: Don't play too much golf. Two rounds a day are plenty.
e2101e9e-9e3c-41b4-b156-b448ee94bec0.author: Harry Vardon

f48a1ea1-2c5d-448a-aa83-74f3f2465562.quote: Courage, my friends; 'tis not too late to build a better world.
f48a1ea1-2c5d-448a-aa83-74f3f2465562.author: Tommy Douglas

74e8ab60-d7f5-4630-b984-f5923471d900.quote: I have always believed, and I still believe, that whatever good or bad fortune may come our way we can always give it meaning and transform it into something of value.
74e8ab60-d7f5-4630-b984-f5923471d900.author: Hermann Hesse

bd88f23b-ea14-4573-b073-858731352c2b.quote: Know or listen to those who know.
bd88f23b-ea14-4573-b073-858731352c2b.author: Baltasar Gracian

9c2a36e1-e372-4fa4-a210-74ea4812d16a.quote: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time. The only people who never tumble are those who never mount the high wire. This is your moment. Own it.
9c2a36e1-e372-4fa4-a210-74ea4812d16a.author: Oprah Winfrey

0264b886-07d2-4f24-82e6-55ea1a609ff4.quote: Sport must be amateur or it is not sport. Sports played professionally are entertainment.
0264b886-07d2-4f24-82e6-55ea1a609ff4.author: Avery Brundage

b8b240e8-cd41-453e-8850-4fd48ddf73cb.quote: Miracles are a retelling in small letters of the very same story which is written across the whole world in letters too large for some of us to see.
b8b240e8-cd41-453e-8850-4fd48ddf73cb.author: C. S. Lewis

1c20e32a-a864-468f-8071-d446034a5dd0.quote: We all obviously need others to look up to, and be inspirational to us. Ford did a great job as far as putting the presidency back where it belonged, getting the trust back after Nixon. And President Reagan has been one of the most influential presidents.
1c20e32a-a864-468f-8071-d446034a5dd0.author: Steve Garvey

f388b1b3-9236-4210-b6c5-a35a6a16d127.quote: 'Do What You Gotta Do' is a positive, inspirational song that says no matter what it is; whether you're up against challenges or trying to get your dreams and aspirations met, you should do what whatever you have to do shy of killing yourself or someone else.
f388b1b3-9236-4210-b6c5-a35a6a16d127.author: Angie Stone

64cccd1e-50aa-4018-8718-ef413a692f14.quote: On the recollection of so many and great favours and blessings, I now, with a high sense of gratitude, presume to offer up my sincere thanks to the Almighty, the Creator and Preserver.
64cccd1e-50aa-4018-8718-ef413a692f14.author: William Bartram

884edd1a-4721-4c3a-b247-ff242be7a6ba.quote: Tennis is a funny game, and it takes a life-time of keeping one's eyes open on the circuit to have any chance of understanding the strange phenomena that exist in our exciting sport!
884edd1a-4721-4c3a-b247-ff242be7a6ba.author: Sania Mirza

9608b9c7-cc61-4fc3-a02c-3cd5d0025f83.quote: Minor sports in the community is fun and recreation for everyone, not just the elite. I think back to my days in minor hockey and those are my fondest memories, having fun.
9608b9c7-cc61-4fc3-a02c-3cd5d0025f83.author: Bobby Orr

16c7c347-f090-4933-baf0-71d2ebe2630e.quote: I was a huge athlete as a kid. I was on every sports team.
16c7c347-f090-4933-baf0-71d2ebe2630e.author: Bonnie Bassler

8211b32c-9bdc-48b4-bdf7-225564768663.quote: Tension is the greatest curse in sport. I've never had any tension. You give the best you have - you win or lose. What's the difference if you give all you've got to give?
8211b32c-9bdc-48b4-bdf7-225564768663.author: Chief Bender

55cef9cf-d4d8-4882-b5c7-b172f1ca54e5.quote: These are my new shoes. They're good shoes. They won't make you rich like me, they won't make you rebound like me, they definitely won't make you handsome like me. They'll only make you have shoes like me. That's it.
55cef9cf-d4d8-4882-b5c7-b172f1ca54e5.author: Charles Barkley

db9a4e53-8ca5-4c3b-9c0c-0c5cbb1b52ed.quote: I had a really bad temper, when I was growing up. Sport helped me channel that temper into more positive acts.
db9a4e53-8ca5-4c3b-9c0c-0c5cbb1b52ed.author: Mike Krzyzewski

9982f682-5a36-4c44-896f-c64a5e5a96b0.quote: Every day we should hear at least one little song, read one good poem, see one exquisite picture, and, if possible, speak a few sensible words.
9982f682-5a36-4c44-896f-c64a5e5a96b0.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

00622140-1b90-481a-be87-e62a840bdccd.quote: The fiesta of soccer, a feast for the legs that play and the eyes that watch, is much more than a big business run by overlords from Switzerland. The most popular sport in the world wants to serve the people who embrace it.
00622140-1b90-481a-be87-e62a840bdccd.author: Eduardo Galeano

31026780-39f9-482f-988c-d85d8cc2fdc1.quote: If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music which he hears, however measured or far away.
31026780-39f9-482f-988c-d85d8cc2fdc1.author: Henry David Thoreau

781c0118-1d2b-4c84-bcb7-7a17e41eb2cc.quote: Baseball just a came as simple as a ball and bat. Yet, as complex as the American spirit it symbolizes. A sport, a business and sometimes almost even a religion.
781c0118-1d2b-4c84-bcb7-7a17e41eb2cc.author: Ernie Harwell

528b7f3a-51b6-4a7d-a77f-ee4c0ec3dd1e.quote: It's a wonderful feeling to be a bridge to the past and to unite generations. The sport of baseball does that, and I am just a part of it.
528b7f3a-51b6-4a7d-a77f-ee4c0ec3dd1e.author: Vin Scully

31b5317f-90d9-4324-84ab-54d67ba0c621.quote: It's always too early to quit.
31b5317f-90d9-4324-84ab-54d67ba0c621.author: Norman Vincent Peale

d81c8348-d122-4786-bb98-0f0655889209.quote: Every decision you make in life, not just on the sporting field - a lot of time and energy goes into it. You think things through before you make decisions and you always think the decision you make at the time is going to be the right one.
d81c8348-d122-4786-bb98-0f0655889209.author: Ricky Ponting

2a1fdece-bfaf-446f-86cc-efd0d16bccb7.quote: The Games are just a nice, positive way to build friendships, camaraderie and, of course, self-esteem. Plus, the Games are a great opportunity for people to participate in sports who normally wouldn't.
2a1fdece-bfaf-446f-86cc-efd0d16bccb7.author: Greg Louganis

5dbff45e-ec5c-4e78-9185-7092fbc459f2.quote: Silence is the last thing the world will ever hear from me.
5dbff45e-ec5c-4e78-9185-7092fbc459f2.author: Marlee Matlin

1903b507-be1a-4e47-912a-ceb65b8b9ec5.quote: Beckham is unusual. He was desperate to be a footballer. His mind was made up when he was nine or ten. Many kids think that it's beyond them. But you can't succeed without practising at any sport.
1903b507-be1a-4e47-912a-ceb65b8b9ec5.author: Bobby Charlton

a9fa4283-28af-420e-96d4-c9a4974b1db2.quote: The importance that our society attaches to sport is incredible. After all, is football a game or a religion? The people of this country have allowed sports to get completely out of hand.
a9fa4283-28af-420e-96d4-c9a4974b1db2.author: Howard Cosell

fff749b3-da65-4d46-bcd8-02748c4c6285.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
fff749b3-da65-4d46-bcd8-02748c4c6285.author: Anne Frank

add1b19a-4518-4e04-98d8-87a21480309c.quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
add1b19a-4518-4e04-98d8-87a21480309c.author: Mary Kay Ash

b9640b39-c74d-4e74-938d-e5520d1c9344.quote: Yeah, I miss it. You don't just break off a friendship you've had with a sport, and with all those you've met all over the country. We've got some friends, some very close friends, and you just sit back and think how fortunate you were having a career like that. And, actually, there's nothing in the game of baseball that hasn't happened to me.
b9640b39-c74d-4e74-938d-e5520d1c9344.author: Lou Boudreau

75777245-c4cc-4efd-9d09-2abe9cd0ffba.quote: There's a way to do it better - find it.
75777245-c4cc-4efd-9d09-2abe9cd0ffba.author: Thomas A. Edison

40c948c9-9edf-4b9a-b200-c1517c54ce82.quote: Political columnists and sports pundits are rewarded for being overconfident.
40c948c9-9edf-4b9a-b200-c1517c54ce82.author: Daniel Kahneman

ddd75a49-4286-40d0-8864-8dcd2c80e9ef.quote: I remember when I was growing up, I always wore glasses and so if I was on-stage or just being able to move around playing sports, I was never really able to because I had glasses holding me back. Wearing contacts has just been very helpful.
ddd75a49-4286-40d0-8864-8dcd2c80e9ef.author: Joe Jonas

c46faf66-8ab3-43c9-b9af-56b53594dc3b.quote: As a kid who wasn't into sports, at school I felt almost alienated at times, whereas in the theatre community there was this amazing sense of camaraderie. Early on, we would go to rehearsals with my dad and I was like the mascot for the backstage crew. That was a big part of my childhood, so I dreamed of one day doing a play in London.
c46faf66-8ab3-43c9-b9af-56b53594dc3b.author: Zach Braff

cc09158c-ce26-4767-997b-fcfd3ac13388.quote: Sport is something that is very inspirational for young people.
cc09158c-ce26-4767-997b-fcfd3ac13388.author: Pele

5b31c703-e473-4b3f-87dd-7018d3627b91.quote: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbors and laugh at them in our turn?
5b31c703-e473-4b3f-87dd-7018d3627b91.author: Jane Austen

e8aee882-1b78-4c99-975f-0775ea8075fa.quote: Sports fans have been mistreated for a long time. They have overpaid for inferior food and they have had poor service.
e8aee882-1b78-4c99-975f-0775ea8075fa.author: Dave Checketts

b6b60037-e307-40ff-9664-457c899f5840.quote: I love extreme sports, I like snowboarding and motorcross and rollerblading and hockey.
b6b60037-e307-40ff-9664-457c899f5840.author: Jeremy London

4bb68a57-c020-4d74-860b-778f1e001fc1.quote: Cards are war, in disguise of a sport.
4bb68a57-c020-4d74-860b-778f1e001fc1.author: Charles Lamb

52a8ddfc-80c3-42fd-b23a-d2b7c9ed876a.quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
52a8ddfc-80c3-42fd-b23a-d2b7c9ed876a.author: H. L. Hunt

817753c8-0e23-4fe6-8f42-535eeecd00a8.quote: I think my appeal is that I've always tried to stay very grounded to my fans and to be accessible - not being this unattainable thing. I think doing sports and riding motorcycles has made me more approachable and more real and down to earth.
817753c8-0e23-4fe6-8f42-535eeecd00a8.author: Marisa Miller

69a92a08-eb07-434c-bc00-661f185e0b44.quote: The weeds keep multiplying in our garden, which is our mind ruled by fear. Rip them out and call them by name.
69a92a08-eb07-434c-bc00-661f185e0b44.author: Sylvia Browne

0d4b444d-eefd-4d3c-9c6a-3b0a856d40c4.quote: One of the things that I did before I ran for president is I was a professional speaker. Not a motivational speaker - an inspirational speaker. Motivation comes from within. You have to be inspired. That's what I do. I inspire people, I inspire the public, I inspire my staff. I inspired the organizations I took over to want to succeed.
0d4b444d-eefd-4d3c-9c6a-3b0a856d40c4.author: Herman Cain

ac2531f2-d096-415f-bd6e-6f70fdbcbdb6.quote: For a gallant spirit there can never be defeat.
ac2531f2-d096-415f-bd6e-6f70fdbcbdb6.author: Wallis Simpson

2a2b52e2-3ce6-44b9-8fe2-9dea4c8c8bd3.quote: What we need is more people who specialize in the impossible.
2a2b52e2-3ce6-44b9-8fe2-9dea4c8c8bd3.author: Theodore Roethke

588e2928-6026-4130-8d7d-a2ec7dd041da.quote: The fascination of shooting as a sport depends almost wholly on whether you are at the right or wrong end of the gun.
588e2928-6026-4130-8d7d-a2ec7dd041da.author: P. G. Wodehouse

42a827dc-7fe8-4b56-b552-b47fce8d1f94.quote: Politics in Philadelphia is a contact sport.
42a827dc-7fe8-4b56-b552-b47fce8d1f94.author: Michael Nutter

d0a75eaf-3914-4cbf-b24d-6bed390cc9cc.quote: Almost every college playwright or sketch or improv comedian was sort of aware of Christopher Durang - even kids in high school. His short plays were so accessible to younger people and I think that was inspirational to me.
d0a75eaf-3914-4cbf-b24d-6bed390cc9cc.author: Mindy Kaling

cbcb81e0-a24a-413e-82b2-3d9bb40c8db2.quote: Basketball was not my main sport in grade school, or even the first year of high school.
cbcb81e0-a24a-413e-82b2-3d9bb40c8db2.author: Mike Krzyzewski

e357f0fc-6214-43c0-8f6a-e2797ff72601.quote: I love figure skating and what I am able to express creatively. I want to leave a legacy in the sport.
e357f0fc-6214-43c0-8f6a-e2797ff72601.author: Patrick Chan

6afe64f7-9726-4dec-98f1-440ab8f3fed0.quote: To its great credit, Wimbledon has been a leader in bringing about change and improvement in the sport.
6afe64f7-9726-4dec-98f1-440ab8f3fed0.author: Fred Perry

3c64fe43-5898-45cf-b058-3e8e01e1e7fd.quote: I want to see where I measure up against everyone in the world and everyone who has ever competed in the sport, and there's that innate sense of wanting to challenge myself. I'm competitive in all aspects.
3c64fe43-5898-45cf-b058-3e8e01e1e7fd.author: Ashton Eaton

d1547231-c770-45f5-be8b-461bcc180ba4.quote: The coach doesn't have to play the sport as well as you do. They have to watch you and get you to be your best.
d1547231-c770-45f5-be8b-461bcc180ba4.author: Eric Schmidt

93eeecd6-1e72-4e4b-9c8b-7dd959d78be2.quote: I was very fortunate to play sports. All the anger in me went out. I had to do what I had to do. If you stay angry all the time, then you really don't have a good life.
93eeecd6-1e72-4e4b-9c8b-7dd959d78be2.author: Willie Mays

a8187514-fd74-4ead-bfd5-0998779536d0.quote: I think that's a great opportunity, to pick a script where you can build up a good skill. I think the main thing I look for when I look at scripts is if it's inspirational. If it's something that teenagers can relate to. And is it something that the audience is going to get something out of. If not, then it's really not worth doing.
a8187514-fd74-4ead-bfd5-0998779536d0.author: Carly Schroeder

34e324ba-2bc8-4674-8f34-eccc5d4c168e.quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
34e324ba-2bc8-4674-8f34-eccc5d4c168e.author: John Muir

15e40346-66d5-4bc4-b67d-f5bbad983f27.quote: The only sport I'm not interested in is horse racing. That's because I don't know the horses personally.
15e40346-66d5-4bc4-b67d-f5bbad983f27.author: Nat King Cole

805e3917-2095-4535-844a-9e5f9df73b25.quote: If I wasn't dyslexic, I probably wouldn't have won the Games. If I had been a better reader, then that would have come easily, sports would have come easily... and I never would have realized that the way you get ahead in life is hard work.
805e3917-2095-4535-844a-9e5f9df73b25.author: Caitlyn Jenner

561fd04f-2b28-4311-b82a-4a3e862ddaea.quote: The first thing is to love your sport. Never do it to please someone else. It has to be yours.
561fd04f-2b28-4311-b82a-4a3e862ddaea.author: Peggy Fleming

228f4e63-923e-43e0-ac12-fe1d5b4dcf86.quote: There is so much hypocrisy in sports.
228f4e63-923e-43e0-ac12-fe1d5b4dcf86.author: Dennis Rodman

90dadcdd-c749-4547-8710-27fc2b0f1cfb.quote: There are only two seasons - winter and Baseball.
90dadcdd-c749-4547-8710-27fc2b0f1cfb.author: Bill Veeck

8c6844e4-bd69-4d10-bdef-d622129fa974.quote: A lot of people think Formula One isn't a sport because everyone drives a car when they go to work in the morning. But we're pulling up to six G on a corner or during breaking, which is almost like being a fighter pilot. So we have to do a lot of work on our neck muscles.
8c6844e4-bd69-4d10-bdef-d622129fa974.author: Jenson Button

a5080139-d9cd-4abb-9adf-b6fa660cbf91.quote: A lifetime of training for just ten seconds.
a5080139-d9cd-4abb-9adf-b6fa660cbf91.author: Jesse Owens

f1685c88-8ac3-4f13-9cb1-876d4007d835.quote: I want to make this world perfect.
f1685c88-8ac3-4f13-9cb1-876d4007d835.author: Malala Yousafzai

5087434a-1fb4-43ef-9d60-8830c08a526b.quote: So in fact the only thing you can judge in this sport its the longterm. You can judge a career or a season, but not one race.
5087434a-1fb4-43ef-9d60-8830c08a526b.author: Alain Prost

1e1f79ef-adae-475e-aff7-65c6be3d0572.quote: If you can be a good role model for people, well, great. You try and live your sporting life and the rest of your life as well as you can, and if it's something that people admire, well, fantastic. I don't sit at home and think about it too much, though - there's plenty of other things in my life going on.
1e1f79ef-adae-475e-aff7-65c6be3d0572.author: Brian O'Driscoll

da308f1e-1cc3-4582-9c44-9d09f18abdac.quote: Everyone thought I was going to die like a year later, they didn't know. So I helped educate sports, and then the world, that a man living with HIV can play basketball. He's not going to give it to anybody by playing basketball.
da308f1e-1cc3-4582-9c44-9d09f18abdac.author: Magic Johnson

27e9753e-7c94-4b09-b38e-02596900e94d.quote: It's important that athletes can compete on a level playing field. And youngsters coming into the sport can know that if they are working hard and training hard, they'll see a true reflection of where they stand and what they can achieve worldwide and not be swayed by people who are cheating.
27e9753e-7c94-4b09-b38e-02596900e94d.author: Paula Radcliffe

1abd1057-a305-4723-bb46-98a930c37bf7.quote: I was heavily into sport from 10 to 15, I was in all the teams, and it was everything to me. But I was very young for my school year and when puberty kicked in for my classmates I got left behind.
1abd1057-a305-4723-bb46-98a930c37bf7.author: Ben Barnes

d1cb1d62-8cf2-4b40-b1fa-608a11460f4f.quote: Business is a combination of war and sport.
d1cb1d62-8cf2-4b40-b1fa-608a11460f4f.author: Andre Maurois

e9a3d9ea-8a9c-494e-865d-d5a3f25da7c4.quote: You have to list all your special skills on a form when you get an agent. There's fencing, stage combat, horse riding, motorbike riding, Spanish, French, German, whatever. I just ticked everything. I talk about 10 languages according to that form. I even ticked the extreme sports box.
e9a3d9ea-8a9c-494e-865d-d5a3f25da7c4.author: Isla Fisher

6c5384f7-9bc9-432a-8feb-616b6cf99bb4.quote: My sport taught me what I could do with my talents, whether in the rink or in the rest of my life.
6c5384f7-9bc9-432a-8feb-616b6cf99bb4.author: Peggy Fleming

60a7fc76-2df2-4549-8880-2f5939130f75.quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.
60a7fc76-2df2-4549-8880-2f5939130f75.author: William Blake

33ba3da7-0957-4f0f-9580-78d2441612ae.quote: Benazir Bhutto was an inspirational leader and an inspirational woman.
33ba3da7-0957-4f0f-9580-78d2441612ae.author: Malala Yousafzai

ef645651-7d99-4c6a-afbc-f42952952c14.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
ef645651-7d99-4c6a-afbc-f42952952c14.author: Sam Levenson

2ded9555-b6dd-4408-86cc-8d9867fc1c05.quote: Unlike any other business in the United States, sports must preserve an illusion of perfect innocence.
2ded9555-b6dd-4408-86cc-8d9867fc1c05.author: Lewis H. Lapham

e4cd7eaa-047f-41ae-b507-25c24e854ce2.quote: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.
e4cd7eaa-047f-41ae-b507-25c24e854ce2.author: Augustus Hare

4a6a1f99-f4ba-49b3-b18c-d99550dbc182.quote: Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
4a6a1f99-f4ba-49b3-b18c-d99550dbc182.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

8798ae40-f8bd-45d8-a733-1d1767616a3c.quote: In sport you always think the strongest guy should be going for it and getting the best results. The thing is, cycling also has a very important team aspect, which I don't think that a lot of people fully grasp.
8798ae40-f8bd-45d8-a733-1d1767616a3c.author: Chris Froome

6727d2a8-71ec-46a6-a6aa-ccb45cd63dac.quote: Because I used to play a lot of sport, I've always been in decent enough shape. When I used to get asked to do a bit of body work before a photo shoot I'd lie and say, 'Yeah, I'm going to the gym.' I literally never did anything.
6727d2a8-71ec-46a6-a6aa-ccb45cd63dac.author: Jamie Dornan

b498986f-f045-48bf-a8fc-602274a966a9.quote: As a kid, I was always a tomboy, playing sport and doing martial arts. And I'm pretty opinionated - I've never been told that I'm a weak person.
b498986f-f045-48bf-a8fc-602274a966a9.author: Caity Lotz

0d2c7f2c-b86e-4bdc-8f73-abc0fb65721b.quote: What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.
0d2c7f2c-b86e-4bdc-8f73-abc0fb65721b.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

23b457dc-2829-4c2e-a0b1-831b6ba36047.quote: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?
23b457dc-2829-4c2e-a0b1-831b6ba36047.author: Robert H. Schuller

b4718f9c-4710-4974-951e-f2b813487bb2.quote: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
b4718f9c-4710-4974-951e-f2b813487bb2.author: Thomas A. Edison

da6d2e29-80e6-437b-80b3-f27996a5d1fb.quote: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.
da6d2e29-80e6-437b-80b3-f27996a5d1fb.author: Bill Copeland

191e2b6e-b855-47da-8582-0d234e0c0997.quote: I was on the yearbook staff, so I would take out film cameras and Nikons and take photos around school and at sporting events and things like that. We had a darkroom as well. I just loved it. I also saved up for a video camera to video my friends and cut and paste the videos together and I gave them to all of my friends for graduation.
191e2b6e-b855-47da-8582-0d234e0c0997.author: Dianna Agron

df399e7b-4809-4710-966e-6bd87b61fc09.quote: The great thing about playing team sport is you win and lose together, and the pain is never as bad when you share it.
df399e7b-4809-4710-966e-6bd87b61fc09.author: Brian O'Driscoll

2d872fe8-73fb-4c77-8582-c4f486dd2d03.quote: See, I respect boxing because it has given me so much and that's why I will never allow anyone to mistreat the sport of boxing if I can help it.
2d872fe8-73fb-4c77-8582-c4f486dd2d03.author: Alexis Arguello

06891299-fec7-4cfc-9ed2-cd7160312254.quote: I attribute my success to this - I never gave or took any excuse.
06891299-fec7-4cfc-9ed2-cd7160312254.author: Florence Nightingale

0fddd98e-85f4-4303-9915-f8055c41114a.quote: I think the Winter Olympics are definitely on a smaller scale than the summer games, but with the inclusion of cool new sports like slope style skiing and snowboarding, it is going to breathe new life into them and attract a whole new crowd.
0fddd98e-85f4-4303-9915-f8055c41114a.author: Nick Goepper

5429c997-9375-490a-ae8d-b9ee78d0bf98.quote: There are hurdles to overcome in sport and in life. Sport is a very valuable learning ground for how to live your life in the best possible way.
5429c997-9375-490a-ae8d-b9ee78d0bf98.author: Lynn Davies

f873fbb9-163e-4f55-aa11-1cecb08d6342.quote: Boxing, for me, it's the beginning of all sports. I'm willing to bet that the first sport was a man against another man in a fight, so I think that's something innate in all of us.
f873fbb9-163e-4f55-aa11-1cecb08d6342.author: Omar Epps

0de4c90b-93c1-4e6c-bb6f-9ae830002d75.quote: I do enjoy playing some sports, even though none of them are organized. I enjoy football most of all.
0de4c90b-93c1-4e6c-bb6f-9ae830002d75.author: Nathan Kress

6cc7f73b-c5ff-49f9-a87c-e5b4ae4ef00e.quote: It seems to me we can never give up longing and wishing while we are thoroughly alive. There are certain things we feel to be beautiful and good, and we must hunger after them.
6cc7f73b-c5ff-49f9-a87c-e5b4ae4ef00e.author: George Eliot

7be3e828-9153-498a-a463-88927726b517.quote: I want to be motivational and inspirational for everybody: my big aim is more women on bicycles.
7be3e828-9153-498a-a463-88927726b517.author: Marianne Vos

e3e8149c-8c01-4e45-8164-b6b423970b51.quote: Comedy was my sport. It taught me how to roll with the punches. Failure is the exact same as success when it comes to comedy because it just keeps coming. It never stops.
e3e8149c-8c01-4e45-8164-b6b423970b51.author: Emma Stone

6cf09595-26c2-48bf-b5ff-c4e6b5f1a55a.quote: I'm a visual thinker, really bad at algebra. There's others that are a pattern thinker. These are the music and math minds. They think in patterns instead of pictures. Then there's another type that's not a visual thinker at all, and they're the ones that memorize all of the sports statistics, all of the weather statistics.
6cf09595-26c2-48bf-b5ff-c4e6b5f1a55a.author: Temple Grandin

cb025090-c3a7-4bac-8d9c-c78c7202d01d.quote: I want to support kids that not a lot of people believe in. Give them an opportunity to do good in school, play sports and get scholarships.
cb025090-c3a7-4bac-8d9c-c78c7202d01d.author: Tim Tebow

5af889cd-ca2b-41a4-a612-4961b7f6126a.quote: Nosology (from the Greek 'nosos,' meaning 'disease,' and 'logos,' referring to 'study') is not a sport for the timid, and certainly not for those so scrupulous about rules and order that they demand consistency in all things.
5af889cd-ca2b-41a4-a612-4961b7f6126a.author: Sherwin B. Nuland

b9fb5e7d-52a1-4121-8483-1d6f64b2ecf4.quote: If you think it's hard to meet new people, try picking up the wrong golf ball.
b9fb5e7d-52a1-4121-8483-1d6f64b2ecf4.author: Jack Lemmon

d8ea9b1e-8334-47a6-9dfa-6dfaf7a0db98.quote: Faith is love taking the form of aspiration.
d8ea9b1e-8334-47a6-9dfa-6dfaf7a0db98.author: William Ellery Channing

0ae20c81-588c-4f73-ac79-8bbe7a146ba0.quote: Though teenagers are generally very interested in sports, they must realise that education is the most important thing in their lives. They must find the right balance.
0ae20c81-588c-4f73-ac79-8bbe7a146ba0.author: Kapil Dev

a0cab781-f2c9-4b09-a58e-1ae6df3b1987.quote: I used to make up stuff in my bio all the time, that I used to be a professional ice-skater and stuff like that. I found it so inspirational. Why not make myself cooler than I am?
a0cab781-f2c9-4b09-a58e-1ae6df3b1987.author: Stephen Colbert

4ac45920-cd2e-4aa8-aefb-038c1cdb9e23.quote: So nonetheless given the importance that was placed on sport in Australia, I wanted to be part of that scene, particularly since I had felt very strongly in my early schooling being marginalised even in the Catholic school.
4ac45920-cd2e-4aa8-aefb-038c1cdb9e23.author: Thomas Keneally

62cc6239-e752-4445-b649-6ff722dd01b3.quote: I began these clinics because I want to share my years of experience in around the ring, in addition to my proven winning methods. I have seen the good and the bad. I have learned valuable lessons, which I want to pass along to those truly interested in the sport.
62cc6239-e752-4445-b649-6ff722dd01b3.author: Emanuel Steward

2281db27-380a-49d2-86ee-af7c14814018.quote: Every sport evolves. Every sport gets bigger and more athletic, and you have to keep up.
2281db27-380a-49d2-86ee-af7c14814018.author: Tiger Woods

22f8f1e8-ca6c-4ac9-a5c3-b821bb9594b5.quote: It is not ignorance but knowledge which is the mother of wonder.
22f8f1e8-ca6c-4ac9-a5c3-b821bb9594b5.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

05a313fd-b4bc-4108-80a9-5d8613eda1d3.quote: Sometimes in football you have to score goals.
05a313fd-b4bc-4108-80a9-5d8613eda1d3.author: Thierry Henry

eac7d567-50b2-4724-b6a7-14a057c8d9b1.quote: My motto is, you have to get in a sport a day.
eac7d567-50b2-4724-b6a7-14a057c8d9b1.author: Paul Walker

34a65648-95c2-4e31-88b0-f4c63718b6db.quote: Injuries are a huge thing for skating. I think skating is a very unnatural sport for the body, very tough on the joints.
34a65648-95c2-4e31-88b0-f4c63718b6db.author: Patrick Chan

3fcd76db-2c98-4847-b90d-0a8932f6a274.quote: Hockey is the original extreme sport.
3fcd76db-2c98-4847-b90d-0a8932f6a274.author: Tom Ward

c216a249-9780-4a09-bec0-5b7832d5bfd9.quote: The team has come along slow but fast.
c216a249-9780-4a09-bec0-5b7832d5bfd9.author: Casey Stengel

a6fb224c-af79-4393-bc28-5c3251d08fc7.quote: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.
a6fb224c-af79-4393-bc28-5c3251d08fc7.author: Jim Elliot

0df1b812-159b-435e-bd19-4dd7254b2904.quote: My greatest memories as a kid were playing sports with my dad and watching sports with my dad.
0df1b812-159b-435e-bd19-4dd7254b2904.author: Mark Teixeira

af65b990-67d8-49bb-b84a-5f6d8161e9d1.quote: Sports and entertainment are the only places where inner-city kids see themselves being able to succeed. Their intellectual development is something they don't relate to.
af65b990-67d8-49bb-b84a-5f6d8161e9d1.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

1ea2e4bf-d4c6-4f57-8b97-2ed522f23c84.quote: I love a lot of the New York bands, but Patti Smith stands out. I just read 'Just Kids' and it's an inspirational, well-written account of an emerging New York artist in the late seventies.
1ea2e4bf-d4c6-4f57-8b97-2ed522f23c84.author: James Iha

8c2fa60a-c2dd-499e-9f89-ec1c96da8b50.quote: When you think about the NASCAR brand, it resonates everywhere. They have the No. 1 sports brand.
8c2fa60a-c2dd-499e-9f89-ec1c96da8b50.author: Magic Johnson

ccbe4ccb-a073-4baa-a3c1-9cd6741e6e49.quote: I am excited to bring my deep knowledge, passion and expertise of soccer in this country to The New York Cosmos. They truly represent where this sport is headed on a national and international level, and I want to make history with them.
ccbe4ccb-a073-4baa-a3c1-9cd6741e6e49.author: Cobi Jones

1d2c5388-9a45-4458-8247-be3c4d794954.quote: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven.
1d2c5388-9a45-4458-8247-be3c4d794954.author: Henry Ward Beecher

cfcb6323-d845-46af-8bd5-096a69f1c6cd.quote: We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change.
cfcb6323-d845-46af-8bd5-096a69f1c6cd.author: Katharine Hepburn

5505e618-0682-4003-a8c1-61feb72053f2.quote: Athletics at the highest level is a sport within a sport.
5505e618-0682-4003-a8c1-61feb72053f2.author: Lindsey Vonn

6c5ccb5e-290c-4d3d-99aa-a7da7b371461.quote: Noble deeds that are concealed are most esteemed.
6c5ccb5e-290c-4d3d-99aa-a7da7b371461.author: Blaise Pascal

a5d5f09b-8dc3-43cb-a170-2404222c57d5.quote: Commitment, belief and positive attitude are all important if you're going to be a success, whether you're in sports, in business or, as in my case, anthropology.
a5d5f09b-8dc3-43cb-a170-2404222c57d5.author: Donald Johanson

67e608b7-4ec9-48a8-b21c-b0767105516f.quote: Thank you for reminding Canada that I'm a disappointment to them. I like hockey, I love it, but I'm not an avid hockey - let's face it, true Canadian - fan. I've always been more into snowboarding and skateboarding and sort of the alternative sports, I'm not crazy about hockey - but love it!
67e608b7-4ec9-48a8-b21c-b0767105516f.author: Dustin Milligan

7684ad39-2f35-47b0-8e43-f84d0cd80348.quote: I don't dislike rappers or hip-hop or people who like it. I went to the Def Jam tour in Manchester in the '80s when rap was inspirational. Public Enemy were awesome. But it's all about status and bling now, and it doesn't say anything to me.
7684ad39-2f35-47b0-8e43-f84d0cd80348.author: Noel Gallagher

ceab94f5-14bb-455e-96e7-2fd779d61f53.quote: Give Obama a script he has made his own, and he is the motivational speaker to end all speakers. Tony Robbins cloned with Honest Abe.
ceab94f5-14bb-455e-96e7-2fd779d61f53.author: Tina Brown

880be7d8-6353-4f60-98c9-4539a57ad7a6.quote: There are two theories on hitting the knuckleball. Unfortunately, neither of them works.
880be7d8-6353-4f60-98c9-4539a57ad7a6.author: Charley Lau

2f5793ba-ba4d-4f19-aee4-406605370ed1.quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
2f5793ba-ba4d-4f19-aee4-406605370ed1.author: Martin Luther

a28ffcee-54ed-49ef-9adb-570a59311d8e.quote: We don't see a lot of models for male social interaction. There's sports and barn raisings.
a28ffcee-54ed-49ef-9adb-570a59311d8e.author: Chuck Palahniuk

a91f12ca-3225-4114-8921-7915ad2eb05e.quote: Well done is better than well said.
a91f12ca-3225-4114-8921-7915ad2eb05e.author: Benjamin Franklin

120e94ce-40f6-4db5-81a1-fbc25a1124e9.quote: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.
120e94ce-40f6-4db5-81a1-fbc25a1124e9.author: Henry David Thoreau

6e80f3fe-4d89-4fd0-910c-7d130b160d2d.quote: I come from playing sports. I compete, so I gotta be better than I was last year. I gotta get better, and that better gotta come from just growing. From learning new stuff to working on it, experience it in life, and failing.
6e80f3fe-4d89-4fd0-910c-7d130b160d2d.author: Common

a6957e00-cc1c-4e75-b795-9548bc18f4fa.quote: You don't look out there for God, something in the sky, you look in you.
a6957e00-cc1c-4e75-b795-9548bc18f4fa.author: Alan Watts

10d2f58b-5b7f-4686-bdd9-f7abdbd6a2b5.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
10d2f58b-5b7f-4686-bdd9-f7abdbd6a2b5.author: Aristotle

dfb82f33-c579-4810-abae-bdcbbeda3945.quote: I went to a motivational training course once, a course of self-discovery, and I found out after a week that my fear - it was not a fear of not being accepted - was a very violent fear of failure.
dfb82f33-c579-4810-abae-bdcbbeda3945.author: Emanuel Steward

03c8a293-549f-4e31-be62-7025ef7d6742.quote: Hopefully, when people see 'Senna', they will understand why this inspirational story needed to be told, why it had to be made as a movie for the big screen, and why it is a film for everyone.
03c8a293-549f-4e31-be62-7025ef7d6742.author: Asif Kapadia

60c40e45-f020-4da1-a409-93a35202bfe2.quote: I love to compete. To me, business is the ultimate sport. It's always on. There is always someone trying to beat me.
60c40e45-f020-4da1-a409-93a35202bfe2.author: Mark Cuban

69d16e8e-06b5-4d37-bb4d-9e4f58a10a3b.quote: Karate's a very boring sport, but when you know the technique you can go further and further.
69d16e8e-06b5-4d37-bb4d-9e4f58a10a3b.author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

5f2d3d03-a6d4-409a-b8fc-5125c7c7925e.quote: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.
5f2d3d03-a6d4-409a-b8fc-5125c7c7925e.author: Michael Jordan

8f8bbf8a-bd3d-4842-9992-9cac071e8307.quote: If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
8f8bbf8a-bd3d-4842-9992-9cac071e8307.author: Bruce Lee

37fed392-371a-4783-951a-3fdd0516be4a.quote: Whirlyball is only the most awesome sport on the planet! It's like bumper cars plus lacrosse meets basketball.
37fed392-371a-4783-951a-3fdd0516be4a.author: St. Vincent

f09a03ac-91ba-403d-ab46-4faf59574b83.quote: I'm a big sports fan. College football is my favorite.
f09a03ac-91ba-403d-ab46-4faf59574b83.author: Verne Troyer

2296c8f4-f238-47ce-9556-79f2721f9922.quote: It was the Michael Jordan/Nike phenomenon that really let people see that athletes were OK, and black athletes were OK. Defying a previous wisdom - not only that black athletes wouldn't sell in white America, but that the NBA as a predominantly black sport could not sell in white America.
2296c8f4-f238-47ce-9556-79f2721f9922.author: David Stern

79ce9939-5d51-4869-a78b-8071601a08ff.quote: President Obama called for a 'we' nation in his Inauguration Address. Art convenes. It is not just inspirational. It is aspirational. It pricks the walls of our compartmentalized minds, opens our hearts and makes us brave. And that's what we need most in our country today.
79ce9939-5d51-4869-a78b-8071601a08ff.author: Anna Deavere Smith

6f7a8673-618c-4527-8bb6-5b1957a2efe3.quote: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
6f7a8673-618c-4527-8bb6-5b1957a2efe3.author: Henry Ford

3d31f7dc-87ff-40d9-a789-10fdcfd03d01.quote: I didn't aspire to be a good sport; 'champion' was good enough for me.
3d31f7dc-87ff-40d9-a789-10fdcfd03d01.author: Fred Perry

bb5f2a16-576f-4db0-a53c-c21a55662c0a.quote: Sporting achievements bestow a sense of unification on the cultures and societies in which they take place and create an outpouring of nationalism and pride.
bb5f2a16-576f-4db0-a53c-c21a55662c0a.author: Richard Attias

3f43fc03-ffc4-4740-8320-38327b5c33eb.quote: The disabled people that do sport, they don't think about what they don't have but try to get better with what they do have. That is the same for me.
3f43fc03-ffc4-4740-8320-38327b5c33eb.author: Johan Cruyff

928067cd-94d7-4048-9425-f13645afd2fa.quote: When I was working at the Sprint store, I got laid off. I was bummed out, but I stayed positive. I used the money I had earned while working there to make my first album. Without that job, maybe 'Corazon Sin Cara' would never had been made. It's a very inspirational story.
928067cd-94d7-4048-9425-f13645afd2fa.author: Prince Royce

947461c5-e78f-4be9-9f00-2f5f969cbb24.quote: Can they do both? That's a huge balance, I think, with kids- trying to find the right- it's everything, you know, it's social life, it's academics, it's sports.
947461c5-e78f-4be9-9f00-2f5f969cbb24.author: Joan Cusack

52509ade-7972-46e6-99d0-a9f1c85a852c.quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.
52509ade-7972-46e6-99d0-a9f1c85a852c.author: Albert Camus

ea1973ca-c8c4-4a84-91c7-e8390c7904a8.quote: You know they're not going to lose 162 consecutive games.
ea1973ca-c8c4-4a84-91c7-e8390c7904a8.author: Harry Caray

d4fc71f9-2f2d-40f7-bc53-30d379a1aaec.quote: The paradox of endurance sports is that an athlete can never work as hard as he wants, because if he pushes himself too far, his hematocrit will fall.
d4fc71f9-2f2d-40f7-bc53-30d379a1aaec.author: Malcolm Gladwell

75eb8948-4337-4e40-88d2-62f639a3ada2.quote: After 'Sports' came out in the fall of 1983, everything changed for me. Four of the album's singles became top-10 hits, and by the end of June in 1984, the album was No. 1 on the Billboard chart. It was quite a ride, and for the first time I had enough money to live the way I wanted.
75eb8948-4337-4e40-88d2-62f639a3ada2.author: Huey Lewis

cd405684-80fe-484d-ab23-753adf8b9489.quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
cd405684-80fe-484d-ab23-753adf8b9489.author: Malala Yousafzai

c17406a1-6ef8-4874-b9f0-ad6e6217e6a2.quote: Swimming is probably the ultimate of burnout sports. It's ironic because millions of people who swim as their regular exercise love the meditation aspect of it; you don't wind up with any orthopedic injuries. But when you swim at a world class level for hours and hours - the loneness of the long distance runner.
c17406a1-6ef8-4874-b9f0-ad6e6217e6a2.author: Diana Nyad

40283570-9635-4cee-b20a-198db01f46e3.quote: In no way can sport be considered a luxury object.
40283570-9635-4cee-b20a-198db01f46e3.author: Pierre de Coubertin

e3d9524f-7dbb-4ac6-910b-90a9f5fdaa63.quote: What they have done in Japan, which I find so inspirational, is they've brought the toilet out from behind the locked door. They've made it conversational. People go out and upgrade their toilet. They talk about it. They've sanitized it.
e3d9524f-7dbb-4ac6-910b-90a9f5fdaa63.author: Rose George

c50b1b94-2ad2-4a20-a4cb-585b7060bac4.quote: Thank you... fantasy football draft, for letting me know that even in my fantasies, I am bad at sports.
c50b1b94-2ad2-4a20-a4cb-585b7060bac4.author: Jimmy Fallon

e1e1f0cc-e49c-4216-a5e4-18967193eaa4.quote: I have never seen a wrestling match or a prize fight, and I don't want to. When I find out a man is interested in these sports, I drop him.
e1e1f0cc-e49c-4216-a5e4-18967193eaa4.author: Hedy Lamarr

a9e7ab2b-3666-4c7a-bea3-0ae2417346db.quote: With 'Love & Basketball,' I played ball my whole life and did track at UCLA. So, I'm an athlete. And it was very important for me to get it right. I started with casting: As an athlete, there's nothing worse for me than watching a sports movie and the woman that they hire can't run or can't shoot. It sets women's sports back years.
a9e7ab2b-3666-4c7a-bea3-0ae2417346db.author: Gina Prince-Bythewood

b79c366f-d697-4690-9b3a-c48e1775fbf9.quote: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
b79c366f-d697-4690-9b3a-c48e1775fbf9.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

000d0cde-ab48-430f-b860-58b4480a892b.quote: I walked away from the sport for 17 years, then started swimming again recently in a master's program.
000d0cde-ab48-430f-b860-58b4480a892b.author: Mark Spitz

f02b2b74-9e28-404b-8f83-a02b725d5b9e.quote: I went through baseball as 'a player to be named later.'
f02b2b74-9e28-404b-8f83-a02b725d5b9e.author: Joe Garagiola

f468e4ad-a51c-4845-bade-d2c7ade7c326.quote: The more we do, the more we can do.
f468e4ad-a51c-4845-bade-d2c7ade7c326.author: William Hazlitt

c8ead22e-a625-4bc6-ba03-656699c6b9e0.quote: I think as a 20-year-old you expect life to always be easy. You get given a good hand and the chance to race in Formula One. You think the driver can make the difference, can make up for everything else within the team. But that is not the case. You are racing in such a competitive sport so that doesn't happen.
c8ead22e-a625-4bc6-ba03-656699c6b9e0.author: Jenson Button

364912ff-5e99-4df1-a195-c680a132aa18.quote: You see countries like India really investing in their space program because they see it as inspirational and good for their economy.
364912ff-5e99-4df1-a195-c680a132aa18.author: Ellen Stofan

ecc7fb19-3ab2-48c8-b8d7-d05b7e2dd0d9.quote: Marvin's Motivational Moments actually started as something that was actually therapeutic for me. I would sit up late at night after my wife passed trying to adjust to being alone.
ecc7fb19-3ab2-48c8-b8d7-d05b7e2dd0d9.author: Marvin Sapp

131c8976-3764-4ac5-b006-b99064c47ac9.quote: I'm tired of hearing about money, money, money, money, money. I just want to play the game, drink Pepsi, wear Reebok.
131c8976-3764-4ac5-b006-b99064c47ac9.author: Shaquille O'Neal

4f1ff9f8-d6ac-4fe4-bcc6-8dea333df624.quote: One reason outfielders don't have stronger arms might be they don't practice as much as we did. Most teams today don't take outfield practice. Another reason is baseball has to compete with other sports now - basketball, football, soccer - for the better athletes that might have more skills and stronger arms.
4f1ff9f8-d6ac-4fe4-bcc6-8dea333df624.author: Al Kaline

046dadc3-79f1-451a-b67e-094c81c21871.quote: At school I pretended I had a normal life, but I felt lonely all the time and different from everyone else. I never felt like I fit in, and I wasn't allowed to participate in after-school activities, go to sports events or parties or date boys. Many times I had to make up stories about why I couldn't do anything with my classmates.
046dadc3-79f1-451a-b67e-094c81c21871.author: Joyce Meyer

86c625ba-9792-43e2-b0d9-82a9da088ffc.quote: We relish news of our heroes, forgetting that we are extraordinary to somebody too.
86c625ba-9792-43e2-b0d9-82a9da088ffc.author: Helen Hayes

44922916-7c03-4eb5-82ae-dab9dab1a4ff.quote: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
44922916-7c03-4eb5-82ae-dab9dab1a4ff.author: Bobby Unser

7a672d49-f689-4359-9243-2fdfcd88798f.quote: Technique is the basis of every pursuit. If you're a sportsman or you're a singer or a swimmer, well that comes under sport but you have to develop a basic technique to know what you're doing at any given time.
7a672d49-f689-4359-9243-2fdfcd88798f.author: Joan Sutherland

34e3f5c8-a502-421d-9bfc-80d85de540ee.quote: I think 'Heroes of Cosplay' will show a lot of the positive things, like how much effort it takes to make a costume. These people on the show aren't taking shortcuts. As long as that effort gets through to the viewers, we will be inspirational. Then there will be people who watch the show that want to get in and hands-on make outfits.
34e3f5c8-a502-421d-9bfc-80d85de540ee.author: Yaya Han

c12a99fb-8fe1-4eae-8b80-47a78d4f5b54.quote: Relax? How can anybody relax and play golf? You have to grip the club, don't you?
c12a99fb-8fe1-4eae-8b80-47a78d4f5b54.author: Ben Hogan

8bbcb35e-dd06-4a2d-9461-1d5b3800e983.quote: I think that in any group activity - whether it be business, sports, or family - there has to be leadership or it won't be successful.
8bbcb35e-dd06-4a2d-9461-1d5b3800e983.author: John Wooden

9ac6ee82-7d1b-406a-941a-e7ac60e9a756.quote: Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.
9ac6ee82-7d1b-406a-941a-e7ac60e9a756.author: Michael Jackson

7d601506-2654-455a-816d-ec966bf06c61.quote: My first book was called, 'Mountain, Get Out of My Way,' where I did an autobiographical sketch, if you will, looking back at myself and looking back at things in my life, and juxtaposing them against things that are happening in other people's lives and trying to be motivational.
7d601506-2654-455a-816d-ec966bf06c61.author: Montel Williams

cf523c06-ee2c-4493-8a19-6488a4fbdd4d.quote: It's not just the kid who's spent every penny from his job to upgrade his car to tell the world he cares about sports cars, it's also the person driving around in a fuel-conscious hybrid electric car, because it's more a message to the world than an effective means of saving fuel, to be quite honest.
cf523c06-ee2c-4493-8a19-6488a4fbdd4d.author: Richard Hammond

098ca5be-a671-452c-baae-ca6b400c4662.quote: Alexander Wang is a young designer, and his style is so profound. He took sports and street and kind of combined it into upscale high fashion. He made a white T-shirt a luxury.
098ca5be-a671-452c-baae-ca6b400c4662.author: ASAP Ferg

46dc78b0-9f6d-4591-9060-0a0cab5b7d21.quote: I am so fresh in soul and spirit that life gushes and bubbles around me in a thousand springs.
46dc78b0-9f6d-4591-9060-0a0cab5b7d21.author: Robert Schumann

4be57415-bd0b-46af-8db9-11b1e555e9f3.quote: Modern bodybuilding is ritual, religion, sport, art, and science, awash in Western chemistry and mathematics. Defying nature, it surpasses it.
4be57415-bd0b-46af-8db9-11b1e555e9f3.author: Camille Paglia

d3a5a0f0-0d0a-414b-8852-a476714d94c5.quote: My love for sports will never die. I love martial arts and I want to promote it in whichever way I can. I am a fighter first, then an actor.
d3a5a0f0-0d0a-414b-8852-a476714d94c5.author: Akshay Kumar

24bf96e2-c45b-404d-99ee-7d7c2247469b.quote: The most important thing you learn as a sports photographer is anticipation - not where the action is taking place, but where it's going to take place. Not where the subject is now, but where they're going to be.
24bf96e2-c45b-404d-99ee-7d7c2247469b.author: Lawrence Schiller

0987796a-e56c-44f4-9b72-4bbc462b79eb.quote: Books are challenging and inspirational to me.
0987796a-e56c-44f4-9b72-4bbc462b79eb.author: Amy Sedaris

b1a9218d-75bd-45fd-ade3-4eb989953b89.quote: In sports, every day you can be the hero or the goat.
b1a9218d-75bd-45fd-ade3-4eb989953b89.author: Geoff Stults

551c55cb-2e58-4089-ac8d-a704543aa7db.quote: 'Just Do It' is exactly what you need to hear when you're in a moment of doubt. When you're struggling, especially with sport... just do it. Stop talking about it, stop complaining about the cellulite, or that you're not able to run fast enough for the bus... just do it.
551c55cb-2e58-4089-ac8d-a704543aa7db.author: Jessie J

25b27329-ce87-4beb-9f72-ab87009bb827.quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
25b27329-ce87-4beb-9f72-ab87009bb827.author: Carol Burnett

6a0e615c-0694-40f8-83e4-8a4ad9478aea.quote: I'm thrilled to continue my partnership with U by Kotex for Generation Know while helping to empower girls. I've always been a motivational resource for my younger sisters and hope I can positively impact and inspire other young girls too.
6a0e615c-0694-40f8-83e4-8a4ad9478aea.author: Khloe Kardashian

cf2847aa-db77-4645-bddc-3d19f33b0b6c.quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
cf2847aa-db77-4645-bddc-3d19f33b0b6c.author: George S. Patton

0b356dc3-1356-44ae-beae-4caa55ef7398.quote: I think the end goal, hopefully, is to take advantage of the attention I've gotten along the way and use it for good and build some communities, and as I get older I can continue to do things and be surrounded by things that are inspirational to me.
0b356dc3-1356-44ae-beae-4caa55ef7398.author: Reggie Watts

bc97f419-b9ea-47ad-9c7b-3adba45ba928.quote: Aside from a handful of guys boxing is missing the good trainers, that's why our sport is so in the air now because we don't have people who have the capability to not only train fighters but also train and create decent respectable citizens of the world.
bc97f419-b9ea-47ad-9c7b-3adba45ba928.author: Alexis Arguello

b6f71198-3fdd-47f9-a57c-e8d0eb9a421f.quote: Band members have a special bond. A great band is more than just some people working together. It's like a highly specialized army unit, or a winning sports team. A unique combination of elements that becomes stronger together than apart.
b6f71198-3fdd-47f9-a57c-e8d0eb9a421f.author: Steven Van Zandt

11bbfe5a-2b99-492d-a334-67b6d8de0cbf.quote: The most beautiful thing in the world is, of course, the world itself.
11bbfe5a-2b99-492d-a334-67b6d8de0cbf.author: Wallace Stevens

149e9c1b-d773-47c6-80a9-e8d9edb83216.quote: Bin Laden wasn't all that central to the terrorist network any more, but taking him down created a kind of national catharsis. It's been a really, really long time since we had something to celebrate that didn't involve a sports team. I'd rather it had been a non-death-related occasion, but we'll take what we can get.
149e9c1b-d773-47c6-80a9-e8d9edb83216.author: Gail Collins

b11a25b6-28c1-4fb4-929f-49a4f8d0bad5.quote: Someone who wants to write should make an effort to write a little something every day. Writing in this sense is the same as athletes who practice a sport every day to keep their skills honed.
b11a25b6-28c1-4fb4-929f-49a4f8d0bad5.author: Anita Desai

a88f765e-2be6-41ff-b18c-dacbaa5b7dcc.quote: Other sports play once a week but this sport is with us every day.
a88f765e-2be6-41ff-b18c-dacbaa5b7dcc.author: Peter Ueberroth

976973d2-78f2-4c5c-bd1c-47e1da5fe35a.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
976973d2-78f2-4c5c-bd1c-47e1da5fe35a.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

1f79b5f2-48e1-4360-9cde-7b762e414a8f.quote: I have long understood that losing always comes with the territory when you wander into the gambling business, just as getting crippled for life is an acceptable risk in the linebacker business. They both are extremely violent sports, and pain is part of the bargain. Buy the ticket, take the ride.
1f79b5f2-48e1-4360-9cde-7b762e414a8f.author: Hunter S. Thompson

49f4dd8a-23d2-4e57-a44a-2679ea9bb1c1.quote: Public scandals are America's favorite parlor sport. Learning about the flaws and misdeeds of the rich and famous seems to satisfy our egalitarian yearnings.
49f4dd8a-23d2-4e57-a44a-2679ea9bb1c1.author: Robert Dallek

312027aa-a27a-474b-9058-4f55a2a03f83.quote: Basketball isn't as popular in Canada as it is in the US. Hockey is by far the most popular sport in Canada.
312027aa-a27a-474b-9058-4f55a2a03f83.author: Steve Nash

5c81fd9c-96a7-4895-8a6d-645cc5fea94b.quote: Do not weep; do not wax indignant. Understand.
5c81fd9c-96a7-4895-8a6d-645cc5fea94b.author: Baruch Spinoza

3ab7a8f7-d434-44c5-94f8-94315d57a155.quote: I've actually tried to roast somebody that I don't like, and it doesn't go well. Either they're a bad sport or I'm not as funny as I could be.
3ab7a8f7-d434-44c5-94f8-94315d57a155.author: Jeff Ross

7f8f1d91-148b-45f5-8bf9-b95c8059b08e.quote: Overall, I think Michael Jordan is the greatest athlete in any particular sport. He dominated the game for the Chicago Bulls and brought the NBA to its greatest peak of popularity.
7f8f1d91-148b-45f5-8bf9-b95c8059b08e.author: Will McDonough

b941cffe-1fce-474a-8d35-3d31706df3e9.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
b941cffe-1fce-474a-8d35-3d31706df3e9.author: Maya Angelou

adf3e399-5d18-4d84-b54b-c52ee4ae4812.quote: When a man wants to murder a tiger he calls it sport; when a tiger wants to murder him he calls it ferocity.
adf3e399-5d18-4d84-b54b-c52ee4ae4812.author: George Bernard Shaw

dafe09da-90e6-4f7b-922c-55a034f93537.quote: I never really was that passionate about playing sports. But when I was at this Mt. Herman school, I did have the ability to throw the frisbee. So when this sport evolved, it was fun because I was good at it.
dafe09da-90e6-4f7b-922c-55a034f93537.author: Joel Silver

2c23b429-a880-49a9-9cce-bd5c7cd97177.quote: I've always thought of acting as more of an exercise in empathy, which is not to be confused with sympathy. You're trying to get inside a certain emotional reality or motivational reality and try to figure out what that's about so you can represent it.
2c23b429-a880-49a9-9cce-bd5c7cd97177.author: Edward Norton

4f1695f6-2aa3-4a20-b8e5-9fc788130793.quote: When deeds speak, words are nothing.
4f1695f6-2aa3-4a20-b8e5-9fc788130793.author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon

9b59610f-b468-43ab-a9df-91f9eb73ea73.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
9b59610f-b468-43ab-a9df-91f9eb73ea73.author: Walter Elliot

5a336eed-c898-4799-8b9c-a5b5cf75a0e3.quote: I grew up with six brothers, and I'm from Chicago, so princesses and Barbie dolls were not around the house. It was more like sports and comic books, so getting to work for Marvel is like my version of being able to be a princess.
5a336eed-c898-4799-8b9c-a5b5cf75a0e3.author: Chloe Bennet

524759b5-338e-407b-9f21-8fa5f20c0ecf.quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
524759b5-338e-407b-9f21-8fa5f20c0ecf.author: Amelia Earhart

f90dfc2e-8003-41fc-acf3-d39a96f75093.quote: I hate ready-made suits, button-down collars, and sports shirts.
f90dfc2e-8003-41fc-acf3-d39a96f75093.author: Bobby Fischer

08e2d7b7-5074-48bb-bee8-0a7583f8e52f.quote: We are here to make another world.
08e2d7b7-5074-48bb-bee8-0a7583f8e52f.author: W. Edwards Deming

e9ffbb44-2d29-4229-8924-5229fdf88f2d.quote: I know where I'm going and I know the truth, and I don't have to be what you want me to be. I'm free to be what I want.
e9ffbb44-2d29-4229-8924-5229fdf88f2d.author: Muhammad Ali

7145fe66-db61-409a-bc8a-cf9ff2a2b86d.quote: Olympism is the marriage of sport and culture.
7145fe66-db61-409a-bc8a-cf9ff2a2b86d.author: Juan Antonio Samaranch

ddc16faf-f67c-4c61-a44e-7662477dc308.quote: I always look back to my first Olympic medal in 2004 in Athens. I was very new to the sport, and it was my first big win at the Olympics.
ddc16faf-f67c-4c61-a44e-7662477dc308.author: Allyson Felix

1e6f78d3-852f-4bcc-a501-136b68b370b1.quote: Golf is a day spent in a round of strenuous idleness.
1e6f78d3-852f-4bcc-a501-136b68b370b1.author: William Wordsworth

fe78faaa-2c0b-4ee6-853b-d51a875fe87b.quote: I have the opportunity to be part of swimming history. To take the sport to a new level would be an honor for me. There's no better time to try this than now.
fe78faaa-2c0b-4ee6-853b-d51a875fe87b.author: Michael Phelps

56589fa8-620f-49b4-9176-26e302b3f6f0.quote: Floyd Mayweather is in the sport to give great performances.
56589fa8-620f-49b4-9176-26e302b3f6f0.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

1a545bdb-3785-4e25-a527-d786542301e0.quote: Every song you're trying to find something that going to connect in different ways but for me the songs that I'm really drawn to are inspirational, songs that lift you and that everybody can relate to no matter where you're from.
1a545bdb-3785-4e25-a527-d786542301e0.author: Rodney Atkins

7ea6da75-f4b6-41c7-8aa6-d218d04774cc.quote: At ten I was playing against 18-year-old guys. At 15 I was playing professional ball with the Birmingham Black Barons, so I really came very quickly in all sports.
7ea6da75-f4b6-41c7-8aa6-d218d04774cc.author: Willie Mays

504cb9dc-5c22-441f-984c-27de85777816.quote: There are two aspects to being competitive; one is to do with sports, and the other is about technical skills. Being able to recollect the moves and apply them when necessary is a critical aspect.
504cb9dc-5c22-441f-984c-27de85777816.author: Viswanathan Anand

e36af21d-12a6-40d3-9a18-c7912a2850bc.quote: He has the finest, fundamentally sound golf swing I've ever seen.
e36af21d-12a6-40d3-9a18-c7912a2850bc.author: Jack Nicklaus

708fd031-dcba-4a8a-9a37-5d0e2b2959f6.quote: The sport needs a personality, not a fighter. We've got plenty of great fighters in the sport, but no personalities. No one is standing for anything. The last personality we had was Mike Tyson. He stood for something. It wasn't much, but he stood for something.
708fd031-dcba-4a8a-9a37-5d0e2b2959f6.author: George Foreman

2dd8286a-8fd6-477e-9831-937b962b76cd.quote: I grew up in a very spiritual home in a Liberty City neighborhood of Miami, FL. I was raised in the church, and my mother was a very inspirational person in my life.
2dd8286a-8fd6-477e-9831-937b962b76cd.author: Robert Battle

15f88ad1-34f4-4177-bd75-36adb8714aad.quote: I view art as an inspirational tool.
15f88ad1-34f4-4177-bd75-36adb8714aad.author: Thomas Kincade

80943dd4-ecf8-4531-a0c3-97af1cb4b46a.quote: Oh God, I'm awful at sports. In gym I just try and avoid getting hit in the face.
80943dd4-ecf8-4531-a0c3-97af1cb4b46a.author: Tavi Gevinson

c24f6415-f081-4c7f-963d-8944e15b0483.quote: Economics is about creating win-win situations. But in sports, someone loses.
c24f6415-f081-4c7f-963d-8944e15b0483.author: Stan Kroenke

a71892ac-e64c-4d3a-8f28-2239d49ca814.quote: I'm about 5' 10", and my hair is the length of my whole body now. We grow our hair because of faith, but it's getting heavy. Most of the rastas I know with hair my length are elders, and they keep it tied up, but for a young person who's active and running around, the weight is a big thing. So to play sports, I put it in a backpack.
a71892ac-e64c-4d3a-8f28-2239d49ca814.author: Damian Marley

1b182e50-469e-4573-9776-12a15aecb243.quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
1b182e50-469e-4573-9776-12a15aecb243.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

23564870-f36a-47e4-a2ad-8a0e8d855d40.quote: As Americans, we have traditionally been the optimists sporting the 'can-do' attitude. But when it comes to addressing climate adaptation and resiliency, we seem to be more 'can't do' than 'can-do.'
23564870-f36a-47e4-a2ad-8a0e8d855d40.author: Paul Tonko

8331c403-cb4a-4270-8725-414f118b74bd.quote: Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close.
8331c403-cb4a-4270-8725-414f118b74bd.author: John Ruskin

aff42888-063e-4242-b905-9477ab424221.quote: The key to any good sports story is identifying the defining moment. In football games or a boxing match, it's usually pretty obvious. But in golf, sometimes it happens on Thursday. Usually it's Sunday, but guys who don't know the game, they can miss it.
aff42888-063e-4242-b905-9477ab424221.author: Dan Jenkins

dd582e98-a30b-4156-8c12-8903972613bf.quote: One may miss the mark by aiming too high as too low.
dd582e98-a30b-4156-8c12-8903972613bf.author: Thomas Fuller

35be4b22-3bbb-4814-8be6-52a9161de8f5.quote: I grew up in New York City, where we played highly unorganized sports: stick ball, stoop ball, and the occasional game of baseball with no adult supervision.
35be4b22-3bbb-4814-8be6-52a9161de8f5.author: Jeff Greenfield

68238edf-b1b0-4ef3-8d15-8d71b6c801f1.quote: It is better to go skiing and think of God, than go to church and think of sport.
68238edf-b1b0-4ef3-8d15-8d71b6c801f1.author: Fridtjof Nansen

3a7bfb73-bae4-4e05-aa50-1a7de07e7e0b.quote: God made me fast. And when I run, I feel His pleasure.
3a7bfb73-bae4-4e05-aa50-1a7de07e7e0b.author: Eric Liddell

ff76b896-b271-426d-9e08-aea31939b632.quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
ff76b896-b271-426d-9e08-aea31939b632.author: Wayne Dyer

2ec9c70c-bb1f-437c-b88e-279366d3244f.quote: Tears of joy are like the summer rain drops pierced by sunbeams.
2ec9c70c-bb1f-437c-b88e-279366d3244f.author: Hosea Ballou

89fac291-ba58-4f2c-a579-8274c2984fc6.quote: Archery is not a sport for everyone. The equipment costs a lot, and it is not easy for everyone to find a place to play. It is perhaps similar to golf, but of course there are more golf courses than archery fields.
89fac291-ba58-4f2c-a579-8274c2984fc6.author: Im Dong-Hyun

d9e7498c-ef8a-432e-8b35-884efbee5af0.quote: Act like you expect to get into the end zone.
d9e7498c-ef8a-432e-8b35-884efbee5af0.author: Christopher Morley

438a920e-cb1a-44b1-a36a-88026e637896.quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
438a920e-cb1a-44b1-a36a-88026e637896.author: George S. Patton

6b8a6c05-7d72-4b38-b47d-831215e8d303.quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.
6b8a6c05-7d72-4b38-b47d-831215e8d303.author: Lao Tzu

1e81efc0-c8a4-40f0-945b-f3166f894561.quote: Bowling is all physics and energy distribution. It's F = ma. So it is actually one of the most science-y sports, because it literally is just a ball and a surface and objects to knock down.
1e81efc0-c8a4-40f0-945b-f3166f894561.author: Chris Hardwick

44965aee-740f-47ca-b0b7-ed29038058a1.quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
44965aee-740f-47ca-b0b7-ed29038058a1.author: Thomas Jefferson

de6cabcc-d4e0-49b6-8e7b-3c81feb1d1cd.quote: The truth is on the march and nothing will stop it.
de6cabcc-d4e0-49b6-8e7b-3c81feb1d1cd.author: Emile Zola

b5d33434-c0d8-400e-b97b-af118fd67e7d.quote: Ever since that day when I was 11 years old, and I wasn't allowed in a photo because I wasn't wearing a tennis skirt, I knew that I wanted to change the sport.
b5d33434-c0d8-400e-b97b-af118fd67e7d.author: Billie Jean King

16fe5b24-7858-413e-ab8c-3edc42953461.quote: Sport is a universal language, building more bridges between people than anything else I can think of.
16fe5b24-7858-413e-ab8c-3edc42953461.author: Sebastian Coe

e45d00eb-a78b-4888-88ff-16cc67eca1b0.quote: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.
e45d00eb-a78b-4888-88ff-16cc67eca1b0.author: Jim Rohn

d6f90519-fa31-45b9-a038-cbbcca07b30a.quote: I had spindly little ankles, and growing up in Canada, I couldn't skate. I was no good at any sports so was very much a pariah through those adolescent years.
d6f90519-fa31-45b9-a038-cbbcca07b30a.author: Neil Peart

a963e6be-d619-475a-9623-884d8ac69afd.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
a963e6be-d619-475a-9623-884d8ac69afd.author: Jim Rohn

471e75b6-9552-4538-9828-d19b13c61028.quote: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.
471e75b6-9552-4538-9828-d19b13c61028.author: Muhammad Iqbal

cb479413-b66a-4c3a-9453-dda87e779b17.quote: I admire a lot of people, but in terms of sport I've always loved the mentality of Tiger Woods on a golf course. I always love his eyes when he's setting himself and focusing on his decision; he has a really strong, focused face and believes that he can make the shot.
cb479413-b66a-4c3a-9453-dda87e779b17.author: Rafael Nadal

60b76cfd-d15e-45d6-a64a-935230838a42.quote: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.
60b76cfd-d15e-45d6-a64a-935230838a42.author: Thomas Merton

732a250d-858b-4a9a-8857-8682a2aeefae.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
732a250d-858b-4a9a-8857-8682a2aeefae.author: Walt Disney

b84cac1d-461a-42ab-bcf4-a88a8b71c2a1.quote: A woman can beat any man; it's difficult to imagine another kind of sport where a woman can beat a man. That's why I like chess.
b84cac1d-461a-42ab-bcf4-a88a8b71c2a1.author: Alexandra Kosteniuk

a9a1912c-6bc1-4a66-ad29-e2f4a950c8cc.quote: The weird thing about rap is that you don't get compared in the same way that athletes do, even though it's probably the most competitive sport in music. In basketball, they look at a player and say: 'This guy was the best in his prime at this sport.' But in rap it's not until you're dead or retired that people think about it like that.
a9a1912c-6bc1-4a66-ad29-e2f4a950c8cc.author: Chance The Rapper

8d744d3e-0c61-403d-8dad-de297c2c65a9.quote: Football is a team sport and not an individual sport. We win as a team, and every individual is better if we are part of the team.
8d744d3e-0c61-403d-8dad-de297c2c65a9.author: Fernando Torres

f7c460b1-400a-445b-b4f1-69ce9a2217be.quote: Growing up, if I hadn't had sports, I don't know where I'd be. God only knows what street corners I'd have been standing on and God only knows what I'd have been doing, but instead I played hockey and went to school and stayed out of trouble.
f7c460b1-400a-445b-b4f1-69ce9a2217be.author: Bobby Orr

ed4025dc-8f11-431f-986c-3e767514a50f.quote: I had pro offers from the Detroit Lions and Green Bay Packers, who were pretty hard up for linemen in those days. If I had gone into professional football the name Jerry Ford might have been a household word today.
ed4025dc-8f11-431f-986c-3e767514a50f.author: Gerald R. Ford

cb8c9bff-abbb-4198-b523-db96e35b2f43.quote: Pro wrestling is not fake; it's sports entertainment. We go out there and we perform, and a lot of what we do out there is real, but we're not going to insult anyone's intelligence - there is a predetermined winner. It's just the fans don't know who it is, and that's what makes it so intriguing.
cb8c9bff-abbb-4198-b523-db96e35b2f43.author: Kurt Angle

25343adb-716b-41e8-ac73-1d9b8ad40f99.quote: What drew me towards team sport were the camaraderie and friendship. The chance to celebrate victory and success with a group of other people is something I have enjoyed doing.
25343adb-716b-41e8-ac73-1d9b8ad40f99.author: Rahul Dravid

9dac0242-d7ac-4def-bb5d-c7e5911b59c9.quote: I'm reverent toward my sources. History is a team sport, and references are how you support your teammates.
9dac0242-d7ac-4def-bb5d-c7e5911b59c9.author: Rick Perlstein

2b579893-503e-4117-a2ad-e336461af6d6.quote: It is incredible how far women have come and women in sports have come.
2b579893-503e-4117-a2ad-e336461af6d6.author: Jennie Finch

99bd51cf-f68a-4483-97e3-9b63677bf5b9.quote: That's one of the magical things about the Olympics, Team GB will have someone challenging in a sport that we've never watched and all of a sudden it'll be the biggest thing ever.
99bd51cf-f68a-4483-97e3-9b63677bf5b9.author: Gary Lineker

1c14058f-6004-4c71-a091-51f9347dfac0.quote: At Barca, players were banned from driving their sports cars to training.
1c14058f-6004-4c71-a091-51f9347dfac0.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

201adb2b-606a-416a-b55a-bb102183c512.quote: Sport is the habitual and voluntary cultivation of intensive physical effort.
201adb2b-606a-416a-b55a-bb102183c512.author: Pierre de Coubertin

04e755a6-bcd4-4dd6-94df-71f5796ef64e.quote: Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happen - that stillness becomes a radiance.
04e755a6-bcd4-4dd6-94df-71f5796ef64e.author: Morgan Freeman

b8165b12-cb64-445d-9416-eba4e6a8bac5.quote: Many are called but few get up.
b8165b12-cb64-445d-9416-eba4e6a8bac5.author: Oliver Herford

2e62e884-e790-4f87-af86-4a667b48d73e.quote: The American people are sheep. They're comfortable, rich, working. It's like the Romans, they're happy with bread and their spectator sports. The Super Bowl means more to them than any right.
2e62e884-e790-4f87-af86-4a667b48d73e.author: Jack Kevorkian

5245b7f4-21ba-44db-9938-af07993c201e.quote: Every great batter works on the theory that the pitcher is more afraid of him than he is of the pitcher.
5245b7f4-21ba-44db-9938-af07993c201e.author: Ty Cobb

16c6117a-3480-4add-998d-34052b6bd5ed.quote: The best kids are going to become the best. But the best thing about it is that you're going to learn lessons in playing those sports about winning and losing and teamwork and teammates and arguments and everything else that are going to affect you positively for the rest of your life.
16c6117a-3480-4add-998d-34052b6bd5ed.author: Carl Lewis

8401f4be-fad0-45d4-9cd1-a3c9ee0b9445.quote: In the United States, we spend millions of dollars on sports because it promotes teamwork, discipline, and the experience of learning to make great progress in small increments. Learning to play music does all this and more.
8401f4be-fad0-45d4-9cd1-a3c9ee0b9445.author: Linda Ronstadt

9179dbe0-59d0-416e-863f-729c9ffea85c.quote: You will never win if you never begin.
9179dbe0-59d0-416e-863f-729c9ffea85c.author: Helen Rowland

7130f05e-5bd0-45e6-88a1-d7f4bc17089c.quote: It is cycling as a professional sport that represents the problem. It can transform someone into a liar.
7130f05e-5bd0-45e6-88a1-d7f4bc17089c.author: Greg LeMond

eb99bef6-a8a7-430c-9092-c132ad783687.quote: Some of the companies we helped start are names you know. An office supply company called Staples - where I'm pleased to see the Obama campaign has been shopping; The Sports Authority, which became a favorite of my sons. We started an early childhood learning center called Bright Horizons that First Lady Michelle Obama rightly praised.
eb99bef6-a8a7-430c-9092-c132ad783687.author: Mitt Romney

70af0a67-b2e0-4159-a3fc-80e88f66e8c6.quote: Just as you wouldn't leave the house without taking a shower, you shouldn't start the day without at least 10 minutes of sacred practice: prayer, meditation, inspirational reading.
70af0a67-b2e0-4159-a3fc-80e88f66e8c6.author: Marianne Williamson

3aeda88a-4d79-4b34-8126-54f2602c5d9c.quote: I was focused on athletics, outdoors, sports.
3aeda88a-4d79-4b34-8126-54f2602c5d9c.author: Joe Namath

91e41314-feff-486d-9834-0f5374626610.quote: Don't sell yourself short because without that you can't go far in life because after sports the only thing you know is sports and you can't do anything else with that.
91e41314-feff-486d-9834-0f5374626610.author: Bo Jackson

ee4aed78-e9e7-4f6c-95ed-f7fd0d17bbac.quote: I don't think there's anything that is a greater area of discrimination against women today than the fact that nowhere in the world is there a female role model in team sports that more than half of a general audience would recognize.
ee4aed78-e9e7-4f6c-95ed-f7fd0d17bbac.author: Warren Farrell

aad8093b-da6f-48ec-8c40-b85515d297b9.quote: I pull a lot of the stuff that I play off the rhythm tracks - and Keith Richards has been one of the main contributors to my inspirational playing.
aad8093b-da6f-48ec-8c40-b85515d297b9.author: Bobby Keys
