0a6fdc14-8edc-4ff0-8339-a6a2838945dd.quote: Yeah, I think it motivates you as people start to count you out. It doesn't make you play any harder, because every time you go out on the field you give 110 percent, but it does give you more of an edge mentally, knowing that you were in the same situation, because in sports you always find yourself behind.
0a6fdc14-8edc-4ff0-8339-a6a2838945dd.author: Joe Montana

b7c43ae9-b8fd-4d1b-bcba-125096213b32.quote: I never excelled at one sport or had a very strong passion for anything other than wrestling and bodybuilding.
b7c43ae9-b8fd-4d1b-bcba-125096213b32.author: Dave Bautista

d33415aa-1d59-486e-8492-fa34b513811a.quote: If someone says 'grunge' or 'punk,' you know what the sound is, but if you say 'No Wave,' it's kind of mysterious. That was the most interesting part and should have been the most inspirational thing about it... here's this collective sonic insanity, and none of it sounds anything alike.
d33415aa-1d59-486e-8492-fa34b513811a.author: Lydia Lunch

655b9bb7-d011-4842-9c5b-8b1757d5802b.quote: I feel like skateboarding is as much of a sport as a lifestyle, and an art form, so there's so much that that transcends in terms of music, fashion, and entertainment.
655b9bb7-d011-4842-9c5b-8b1757d5802b.author: Tony Hawk

4fd8c7fc-1c6d-4e3f-9ac5-6650d0ba9579.quote: We've just got to be careful - with all sports, let alone cricket - I think there's so much emphasis on doing the right thing all the time, but I think the public want to be entertained when they come to watch sport.
4fd8c7fc-1c6d-4e3f-9ac5-6650d0ba9579.author: Shane Warne

7865e86d-8f94-44b1-aa11-e59877d47c3e.quote: The first thing I learned in boxing is to not get hit. That's the art of boxing. Execute your opponent without getting hit. In sports school, we were putting our hands behind our backs and having to defend ourselves with our shoulders, by rolling, by moving round the ring, moving out feet.
7865e86d-8f94-44b1-aa11-e59877d47c3e.author: Wladimir Klitschko

9b2bc80c-8272-48c7-98db-7e5feacf2bc8.quote: When Maurice touched a keyboard, it was like something from a movie, magical. He would always give you something from a movie, and you'd go, what did you just play... immediately inspirational writings, amazing. That's what we're going to miss.
9b2bc80c-8272-48c7-98db-7e5feacf2bc8.author: Robin Gibb

84fe6b0a-9872-4a3f-aa49-8b73550df3ac.quote: My father was an army champion boxer... in the British army. And so he loved boxing and talked it up as a sport. But then when my brother and I were beating the crap out of each other, he was always trying to tone it down. But I am a fan of boxing.
84fe6b0a-9872-4a3f-aa49-8b73550df3ac.author: Hugh Jackman

a6f6d45f-18dd-441b-89b2-062a063fa1b3.quote: You change your life by changing your heart.
a6f6d45f-18dd-441b-89b2-062a063fa1b3.author: Max Lucado

a12b1597-e916-41a4-bee0-7a8abc1e502c.quote: I was born with an extremely negative attitude. I was the kid who wouldn't smile in Christmas photos, was a poor sport, and hated a lot of things. I eventually grew out of my negativity when I matured.
a12b1597-e916-41a4-bee0-7a8abc1e502c.author: Colton Haynes

22a70626-a19f-4c65-8100-fde6a39dd491.quote: I learned that we can do anything, but we can't do everything... at least not at the same time. So think of your priorities not in terms of what activities you do, but when you do them. Timing is everything.
22a70626-a19f-4c65-8100-fde6a39dd491.author: Dan Millman

a98f6495-b41a-471b-b5d5-7ddcd043a1da.quote: Characters in TV and theatre tend to experience a lot of conflict, so I push myself through sport to physical and emotional levels that hurt so I've some other reference for extreme experience that isn't me shouting at my girlfriend or my mum. It's a way of controlling the uncontrollable.
a98f6495-b41a-471b-b5d5-7ddcd043a1da.author: Elliot Cowan

fb1a323d-9313-42e2-ae31-510c3aef3327.quote: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
fb1a323d-9313-42e2-ae31-510c3aef3327.author: Tony Robbins

c5702b6f-f51c-4c1b-8b9a-95e2ce7130d4.quote: Baseball is a game where a curve is an optical illusion, a screwball can be a pitch or a person, stealing is legal and you can spit anywhere you like except in the umpire's eye or on the ball.
c5702b6f-f51c-4c1b-8b9a-95e2ce7130d4.author: James Patrick Murray

22983ae1-b125-4f63-92cf-9c8b6bfc9b6d.quote: I think that, generally, you need to live with your sport 24 hours a day.
22983ae1-b125-4f63-92cf-9c8b6bfc9b6d.author: Sergei Bubka

990fa3c2-ea3c-4cc2-a243-7882aa10f014.quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
990fa3c2-ea3c-4cc2-a243-7882aa10f014.author: Arthur C. Clarke

5549607e-cabe-4fa5-b44d-4d3bcdec1021.quote: Tennis doesn't owe me anything. Tennis is one of the fairest sports. It's given me so many extraordinary feelings.
5549607e-cabe-4fa5-b44d-4d3bcdec1021.author: David Ferrer

c55a75c6-be0c-47cb-ac46-3766455d5bf6.quote: The power of pop culture stories should not be underestimated, and there is an enormous potential for inspirational stories that can have a positive, transformative effect on our lives.
c55a75c6-be0c-47cb-ac46-3766455d5bf6.author: Anita Sarkeesian

5ee8312d-568f-45a3-a189-9e422be0b313.quote: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
5ee8312d-568f-45a3-a189-9e422be0b313.author: Ted Turner

b71cfc30-f3b0-409c-af97-9ec45d05e6aa.quote: He hits it long. His shoulders are impressively quick through the ball. That's where he's getting his power from. He's young and has great elasticity.
b71cfc30-f3b0-409c-af97-9ec45d05e6aa.author: Nick Faldo

fd50b26d-ccdb-4405-8e56-758cc79dc17b.quote: We used to flock to watch gladiators, public torture and executions. In more recent times, our appetite for mortal violence has been sublimated in sports, photorealistic video games, film and literature.
fd50b26d-ccdb-4405-8e56-758cc79dc17b.author: Kenneth Oppel

f18bbc8f-e38f-463d-9352-f27a7a503e84.quote: More enduringly than any other sport, wrestling teaches self-control and pride. Some have wrestled without great skill - none have wrestled without pride.
f18bbc8f-e38f-463d-9352-f27a7a503e84.author: Dan Gable

4846bf37-3d88-4482-811c-f223c13f6a8c.quote: At home I have a copy of the April 21, 1986, issue of 'Sports Illustrated.' I'm on the cover with the blurb, 'Can Lou Do It?' I'd just arrived at Notre Dame, and with spring football underway, I was the focal point of that week's coverage.
4846bf37-3d88-4482-811c-f223c13f6a8c.author: Lou Holtz

c2c5ad14-6e82-4718-8bcc-2a95b6d4b5e3.quote: The sportsman knows that a sport is a recreation, a game, an amusement and a pastime, but his eyes are fixed on a higher goal, on the most important thing in his life, which is his education or his vocation.
c2c5ad14-6e82-4718-8bcc-2a95b6d4b5e3.author: Avery Brundage

08667342-5159-4768-b32e-93c03f75b412.quote: Hope is but the dream of those who wake.
08667342-5159-4768-b32e-93c03f75b412.author: Matthew Prior

6ad3b5b9-5152-4870-89c7-1ad6113aa3f1.quote: Roosevelt's declaration that Americans had 'nothing to fear but fear itself' was a glorious piece of inspirational rhetoric and just as gloriously wrong.
6ad3b5b9-5152-4870-89c7-1ad6113aa3f1.author: Russell Baker

b170d640-4372-436b-9f12-51caa96965bf.quote: There's so much denial in gymnastics. It's a beautiful sport but the other part is numbing. You become machinelike. They'll refute this, but I've been around it. I know.
b170d640-4372-436b-9f12-51caa96965bf.author: Cathy Rigby

fb2b8e0b-746c-47ed-b710-75734fc121e5.quote: Sport fosters many things that are good; teamwork and leadership.
fb2b8e0b-746c-47ed-b710-75734fc121e5.author: Daley Thompson

e3d6b228-77c6-4687-a73b-905a6440f9be.quote: I love sports. Whenever I can, I always watch the Detroit Tigers on the radio.
e3d6b228-77c6-4687-a73b-905a6440f9be.author: Gerald R. Ford

8ccd4696-44d6-40fb-a41c-7f088b56e343.quote: My dad told us up front, 'Guys, if you want to play sports, go ahead, but it's your decision.'
8ccd4696-44d6-40fb-a41c-7f088b56e343.author: Peyton Manning

b2725f0c-105f-4487-a7f9-4d0575694bb1.quote: To have a healthy culture, you have to have stable health care financing and stable arts financing and stable sports financing, and if you don't have that, your culture becomes a parking lot.
b2725f0c-105f-4487-a7f9-4d0575694bb1.author: Douglas Coupland

2e70ee46-5da5-4427-bd58-f28266fd5864.quote: The essential elements of giving are power and love - activity and affection - and the consciousness of the race testifies that in the high and appropriate exercise of these is a blessedness greater than any other.
2e70ee46-5da5-4427-bd58-f28266fd5864.author: Mark Hopkins

0de8e5a4-0395-43c6-a5f4-b533d0dca8e4.quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
0de8e5a4-0395-43c6-a5f4-b533d0dca8e4.author: Napoleon Hill

842d2cdb-c9ce-426b-838c-796a80a3e141.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
842d2cdb-c9ce-426b-838c-796a80a3e141.author: Billie Jean King

c5aa2a82-a395-4a29-918f-b3536598125e.quote: If you're giving me tickets to the football game, baseball game or hockey game, I'm taking the tickets to the hockey game. For me, it's by far the most fun sport to go and watch live and be part of. I just don't know why it doesn't translate as well on TV.
c5aa2a82-a395-4a29-918f-b3536598125e.author: Tom Glavine

bfc22df9-3ce1-4cc8-8720-8a94157336ed.quote: I've always tried to go a step past wherever people expected me to end up.
bfc22df9-3ce1-4cc8-8720-8a94157336ed.author: Beverly Sills

2a78a48c-2564-419b-b49e-f8350fa48084.quote: All sports must be treated on the basis of equality.
2a78a48c-2564-419b-b49e-f8350fa48084.author: Pierre de Coubertin

cb52c4b9-1673-4ab6-8522-c3eaff9e11b6.quote: I was a ballplayer, but only for a limited time. I grew up playing in Wisconsin. It's a very sports-centric part of the country that I grew up in and I played a lot of sports, but baseball first and foremost. I played through high school. I was a middle-infielder.
cb52c4b9-1673-4ab6-8522-c3eaff9e11b6.author: Chad Harbach

266c19ce-393e-4cbc-807e-696dffea5e82.quote: All the intelligence and talent in the world can't make a singer. The voice is a wild thing. It can't be bred in captivity. It is a sport, like the silver fox. It happens.
266c19ce-393e-4cbc-807e-696dffea5e82.author: Willa Cather

6fa99ae3-9b38-4fef-a58f-ec11ab885c0f.quote: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.
6fa99ae3-9b38-4fef-a58f-ec11ab885c0f.author: Audrey Hepburn

e7ffa775-cb2f-49e6-b1c9-2735daa1d344.quote: Nobody's a natural. You work hard to get good and then work to get better. It's hard to stay on top.
e7ffa775-cb2f-49e6-b1c9-2735daa1d344.author: Paul Coffey

97e90e40-3b54-423e-a645-28b87833ae43.quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
97e90e40-3b54-423e-a645-28b87833ae43.author: Mark Caine

9418cc50-86eb-4613-b8a2-ccae1357bdc3.quote: I've done a lot of albums and I kinda know when I'm onto something that was inspirational for me to record and create, and this was one of those projects where I really enjoyed making the album.
9418cc50-86eb-4613-b8a2-ccae1357bdc3.author: Lee Ritenour

00d11aa9-a2de-46aa-a9e0-b70e76e10456.quote: I'm very down-to-earth and approachable, and I can be one of the guys and watch sports... I like to cook - I'm like the girl next door.
00d11aa9-a2de-46aa-a9e0-b70e76e10456.author: Marisa Miller

0951931b-4165-4134-afd2-4a9688d7c7db.quote: I always turn to the sports pages first, which records people's accomplishments. The front page has nothing but man's failures.
0951931b-4165-4134-afd2-4a9688d7c7db.author: Earl Warren

0822e5d7-e986-404f-8b73-35faa2da48f8.quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
0822e5d7-e986-404f-8b73-35faa2da48f8.author: Philip Sidney

622ae6df-b243-4d18-87b2-c1cd86887022.quote: I want to rip out his heart and feed it to Lennox Lewis. I want to kill people. I want to rip their stomachs out and eat their children.
622ae6df-b243-4d18-87b2-c1cd86887022.author: Mike Tyson

5c5f3f19-d367-4a5f-bbfd-ac0b454c13fe.quote: Killing a baby seal is about the easiest thing you can do if you're inclined to be sadistic; you certainly can't say there's any sport in it - the animal is totally defenceless.
5c5f3f19-d367-4a5f-bbfd-ac0b454c13fe.author: Paul Watson

097593a0-0409-43e4-84e0-a3b6263d064e.quote: It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up.
097593a0-0409-43e4-84e0-a3b6263d064e.author: Muhammad Ali

06c7ba43-8af9-4a64-b333-2854e720c010.quote: That's one thing you learn in sports. You don't give up; you fight to the finish.
06c7ba43-8af9-4a64-b333-2854e720c010.author: Louis Zamperini

05e47f87-d74d-4768-9f58-ec5101a49719.quote: All of the sports have a safety net, but boxing is the only sport that has none. So when the fighter is through, he is through. While he was fighting his management was very excited for him, but now that he is done, that management team is moving on.
05e47f87-d74d-4768-9f58-ec5101a49719.author: Gerry Cooney

0862f5b2-65a8-47da-a150-bfe9170e4820.quote: In fact, I wouldn't really call this a Gospel album, I call it more an inspirational album.
0862f5b2-65a8-47da-a150-bfe9170e4820.author: Smokey Robinson

c156770c-aa31-4290-ab8b-58e3e409472b.quote: I started doing motivational tours. I've seen all kinds of people, from the CEOs to the lowest executive, opening up to their fears. We don't introspect as much as we should.
c156770c-aa31-4290-ab8b-58e3e409472b.author: Anupam Kher

89f55c53-ce26-4665-894b-cc76d0588739.quote: I was very pleased that the positive things about me and my game outshone the aggressive style of play I use. I would never tone that down, because I believe in that style of play, and I believe that you can play rough on the court and still be a good sport.
89f55c53-ce26-4665-894b-cc76d0588739.author: Sue Wicks

af835bd1-b6eb-4e3b-bd8e-1b14bb7dd02b.quote: I played sports year around: basketball, soccer, softball and I ran track year around, from the time I was, like, six, seven.
af835bd1-b6eb-4e3b-bd8e-1b14bb7dd02b.author: Gabrielle Union

27d723dc-0eff-42b2-b89f-e934c278f68b.quote: You have to make it happen.
27d723dc-0eff-42b2-b89f-e934c278f68b.author: Denis Diderot

ecdbff4c-05c9-400b-afed-323609caf6f8.quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
ecdbff4c-05c9-400b-afed-323609caf6f8.author: Alfred A. Montapert

b892e09e-e8e2-4512-a4ef-f85512383c16.quote: My motto was always to keep swinging. Whether I was in a slump or feeling badly or having trouble off the field, the only thing to do was keep swinging.
b892e09e-e8e2-4512-a4ef-f85512383c16.author: Hank Aaron

6f559726-b766-4d10-9b0f-cb3d9e7e55fd.quote: I was lucky enough when it came to sports and work ethic to be taught some basics that continue to be important.
6f559726-b766-4d10-9b0f-cb3d9e7e55fd.author: Joe Namath

f084096b-9ecb-496a-9788-f1b002425cce.quote: I receive huge support from Irish and British sports fans alike and it is greatly appreciated. Likewise I feel I have a great affinity with the American sports fans. I play most of my golf in the U.S. nowadays and I am incredibly proud to have won the U.S. Open and U.S. PGA Championship in the last two years.
f084096b-9ecb-496a-9788-f1b002425cce.author: Rory McIlroy

24d66ad1-0f72-4d2f-85ce-c05d7421e413.quote: Don't fight the problem, decide it.
24d66ad1-0f72-4d2f-85ce-c05d7421e413.author: George C. Marshall

4733f237-9f0d-43c5-8200-30643c1f03ff.quote: I played team sport as a kid and loved it. I played basketball and football throughout high school into college in the intramurals and I loved it. There was nothing like a team.
4733f237-9f0d-43c5-8200-30643c1f03ff.author: Tom Watson

6dd12cf0-64e2-4c1d-94db-8d3aedb49ddf.quote: I would say I'm an inspirational guidelines book. You can take my life story or scenarios or songs and relate to them and apply them to your everyday life.
6dd12cf0-64e2-4c1d-94db-8d3aedb49ddf.author: Chris Brown

86b28183-096a-42a9-9cde-3de0f4fdc9cd.quote: I believe that any type of education can be great, but an education about ourselves can create something wonderful. I am a comedian, but people have called me a motivational speaker. I don't really consider myself that at all.
86b28183-096a-42a9-9cde-3de0f4fdc9cd.author: Andy Andrews

262c9ffa-1359-4e20-bd0b-98ecf9acf78c.quote: It's too bad that one has to conceive of sports as being the only arena where risks are, for all of life is risk exercise. That's the only way to live more freely, and more interestingly.
262c9ffa-1359-4e20-bd0b-98ecf9acf78c.author: William Sloane Coffin

d040675e-86f7-49f9-be31-2f62987db331.quote: With self-discipline most anything is possible.
d040675e-86f7-49f9-be31-2f62987db331.author: Theodore Roosevelt

caf0bc68-a849-4424-bbef-f5a76178bd8c.quote: I wanted to do something inspirational for my children.
caf0bc68-a849-4424-bbef-f5a76178bd8c.author: Harvey Weinstein

6b25d3ba-eab6-4b72-a3ff-529add66a132.quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
6b25d3ba-eab6-4b72-a3ff-529add66a132.author: Epictetus

54c93093-f14f-40a0-a860-a26d9f388a9d.quote: Inspirational leaders need to have a winning mentality in order to inspire respect. It is hard to trust in the leadership of someone who is half-hearted about their purpose, or only sporadic in focus or enthusiasm.
54c93093-f14f-40a0-a860-a26d9f388a9d.author: Sebastian Coe

84e6a48c-87fb-4927-a4c5-02e665805d02.quote: You always see people coming back to the sport, and I've always thought, 'Gosh, when you're done playing, wouldn't you just want to stay at home?'
84e6a48c-87fb-4927-a4c5-02e665805d02.author: Lindsay Davenport

b8a992d9-7faa-4681-af42-70cbe6977268.quote: Chess as a sport requires a lot of mental stamina, and this is what that makes it different from a physical sport. Chess players have a unique ability of taking in a lot of information and remembering relevant bits. So, memory and mental stamina are the key attributes.
b8a992d9-7faa-4681-af42-70cbe6977268.author: Viswanathan Anand

a77b04a9-b51e-4633-8299-8726eb9d1e08.quote: My father thought sport was something fun - he didn't know it was a way to make money. Then I won a Mercedes at the world championships and I gave it to him. From the moment it arrived my father said: 'Good, you can support not just yourself but me too'.
a77b04a9-b51e-4633-8299-8726eb9d1e08.author: Haile Gebrselassie

e7bd419d-9e5b-46ec-9a8e-cb8decaa545f.quote: I do a lot of inspirational talks for kids, to motivate them to change their lives and give them hope.
e7bd419d-9e5b-46ec-9a8e-cb8decaa545f.author: Adam Beach

1816a5ce-a306-419e-9a85-fb00e15ef7ca.quote: My dad's method in his madness was to try every sport and then observe what I liked. I played football, tennis, golf, cricket but I loved my snooker.
1816a5ce-a306-419e-9a85-fb00e15ef7ca.author: Ronnie O'Sullivan

21e359ca-86f1-48d7-a95c-3f03fcf307b8.quote: Rock and roll is a contact sport. I enjoy playing the tunes that really get the people going.
21e359ca-86f1-48d7-a95c-3f03fcf307b8.author: Richie Sambora

0826573e-bc83-41e2-988c-15ed36d7caa3.quote: I grew up in a very strong, nuclear family. My father was a sportsman. He represented South Africa in a couple of sports, so he was a very positive person and someone who encouraged you to be your best and give your best with everything that you do.
0826573e-bc83-41e2-988c-15ed36d7caa3.author: Gail Kelly

5522fb76-aa5e-4d69-9f51-1e9d1e900bba.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
5522fb76-aa5e-4d69-9f51-1e9d1e900bba.author: Theodore Roosevelt

9bc1e58b-f671-4a00-b84b-21fcf5cc7348.quote: The commercialization of sport is the democratization of sport.
9bc1e58b-f671-4a00-b84b-21fcf5cc7348.author: Andrew Young

0c133eb8-5ac2-4bcc-9116-6d2ad7283e96.quote: I sort of try to write everything for me. I'm a huge sports fan but have no interest in minutiae. I don't remember who won Super Bowls five years ago or listen to sports talk radio. I'm trying to make sure the jokes are self-contained so they're accessible to everyone.
0c133eb8-5ac2-4bcc-9116-6d2ad7283e96.author: Norm MacDonald

4d680151-803d-422c-8275-fb104e692b10.quote: You always want to win. That is why you play tennis, because you love the sport and try to be the best you can at it.
4d680151-803d-422c-8275-fb104e692b10.author: Roger Federer

b3b6e965-d31d-4056-bc52-b8c963f74876.quote: A geek isn't the skinny kid with a pocket protector and acne. There can be computer geeks, video game geeks, car geeks, military geeks, and sports geeks. Being a geek just means that you're passionate about something.
b3b6e965-d31d-4056-bc52-b8c963f74876.author: Olivia Munn

85945f31-5a75-43de-92a5-e3e2f7d8f424.quote: I'm not an inspirational quote kind of person.
85945f31-5a75-43de-92a5-e3e2f7d8f424.author: Christine Teigen

2bf8bab0-374f-4218-8e90-56b40f981aa7.quote: For reasons that baffle me still, my high school sports coaches put me in the first division of the rugby, cricket, and soccer teams.
2bf8bab0-374f-4218-8e90-56b40f981aa7.author: Hamish Bowles

4a2bc3b0-b711-4e64-bc91-f767119f85a1.quote: Love and desire are the spirit's wings to great deeds.
4a2bc3b0-b711-4e64-bc91-f767119f85a1.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

1bc060ba-2e6a-46dd-9658-9fa2d89eb747.quote: My life in Hollywood surrounded by celebrities became a point of view for me - sports, fashion, music, film, arts, and politics as a media play.
1bc060ba-2e6a-46dd-9658-9fa2d89eb747.author: John Van Hamersveld

fdbe374f-9288-443b-be42-3ef0c4e86af9.quote: Reading was my hobby, my sport and my activity of choice. It was the prime pleasure of my days, an unfailing escape from whatever realities were distressing me, and the only source of pride I knew, other vanities lying beyond my grasp. I couldn't do anything else well, but I could do words.
fdbe374f-9288-443b-be42-3ef0c4e86af9.author: Cynthia Voigt

f27baace-d4f1-4c81-9301-2b202c3bbe13.quote: The only athletic sport I ever mastered was backgammon.
f27baace-d4f1-4c81-9301-2b202c3bbe13.author: Douglas William Jerrold

c2bfb7ba-4988-49f8-a90b-3fda411276a8.quote: Many of those who have paid the ultimate price for freedom have come through the wrestling ranks. We need to honor them and win this decision to have wrestling - the world's oldest sport - remain a part of the most prestigious athletic competition in the world, the Olympics.
c2bfb7ba-4988-49f8-a90b-3fda411276a8.author: Dan Gable

c1f5304a-2417-4fa2-969b-beb4bce9f3be.quote: It sounds like a cliche, but it... you do sing about what you know about. And I grew up in a small town, and I grew up in a place where your whole world revolved around friends, family, school, and church, and sports.
c1f5304a-2417-4fa2-969b-beb4bce9f3be.author: Kenny Chesney

846cc7fc-22ce-4d79-b22b-27f1d23f31c4.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
846cc7fc-22ce-4d79-b22b-27f1d23f31c4.author: Norman Vincent Peale

ff9ad920-5820-4367-b3a0-43de066de785.quote: I am not afraid... I was born to do this.
ff9ad920-5820-4367-b3a0-43de066de785.author: Joan of Arc

fa733b03-043b-4fd6-8277-329a319ee378.quote: These days the temptation to use steroids in sports has become too great for many young athletes.
fa733b03-043b-4fd6-8277-329a319ee378.author: Jim Sensenbrenner

a03cf601-b0a1-4aae-a4d0-de7d6c957bc9.quote: I love the UFC. I love it. If they had had that back when I was coming up, in 1966, it would have been my sport. Man, I love it. And you know what? Nobody would have pulled the rope-a-dope on me.
a03cf601-b0a1-4aae-a4d0-de7d6c957bc9.author: George Foreman

58c57b92-bf5e-4ab4-8c7b-1d331f5705a5.quote: Tennis is a hard sport. There is a lot of competition all year and you play alone.
58c57b92-bf5e-4ab4-8c7b-1d331f5705a5.author: Rafael Nadal

b53e2d99-809f-4a59-a5dc-aafb21de8302.quote: Golf is a game in which you yell 'fore,' shoot six, and write down five.
b53e2d99-809f-4a59-a5dc-aafb21de8302.author: Paul Harvey

bbe0a0f7-6d50-4627-84c4-6a203fbb7e80.quote: You can make a lot of money in this game. Just ask my ex-wives. Both of them are so rich that neither of their husbands work.
bbe0a0f7-6d50-4627-84c4-6a203fbb7e80.author: Lee Trevino

ab6b601d-6ec2-433a-9367-6672e95110aa.quote: You can't get real happy or real depressed when you play baseball. Baseball is a great sport in that it offers a player a lot of opportunities for atonement.
ab6b601d-6ec2-433a-9367-6672e95110aa.author: Mike Piazza

fe8ae39c-3c63-4d90-9c25-6190c19bd736.quote: Football is such a team sport, so no one individual does it. No one coach or no one assistant coach or no one player, it's a great team sport, so I don't get carried away with a bunch of accolades.
fe8ae39c-3c63-4d90-9c25-6190c19bd736.author: Jimmy Johnson

39731265-3bf3-46d6-9a51-8971af676146.quote: You don't suffer, kill yourself and take the risks I take just for money. I love bike racing.
39731265-3bf3-46d6-9a51-8971af676146.author: Greg LeMond

23b0c7ac-3ae4-4833-a99d-81b9a587ff0e.quote: Show me a good loser, and I'll show you a loser.
23b0c7ac-3ae4-4833-a99d-81b9a587ff0e.author: Vince Lombardi

a20d47bb-6133-4b9c-9482-65ced3244a5d.quote: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.
a20d47bb-6133-4b9c-9482-65ced3244a5d.author: Flip Wilson

3491d05b-1805-4da0-b12c-1c023800605b.quote: All equestrians, if they last long enough, learn that riding in whatever form is a lifelong sport and art, an endeavor that is both familiar and new every time you take the horse out of his stall or pasture.
3491d05b-1805-4da0-b12c-1c023800605b.author: Jane Smiley

96fde74c-c304-4202-b298-8e61d2012ca4.quote: Our subliminal mental processes operate outside awareness because they arise in these portions of our mind that are inaccessible to our conscious self; their inaccessibility is due to the architecture of the brain rather than because they have been subject to Freudian motivational forces like repression.
96fde74c-c304-4202-b298-8e61d2012ca4.author: Leonard Mlodinow

414cbd9d-cb2b-4a11-9bea-d28d7869ebca.quote: I am a sports enthusiast, and if given an opportunity, I want to be a sportsman, even today. I want to promote the sport that is indigenous to India. Kabaddi is a matter of national pride. Why can't cricket, hockey, football and kabaddi be given equal platforms and co-exist? I believe that can happen.
414cbd9d-cb2b-4a11-9bea-d28d7869ebca.author: Abhishek Bachchan

3eb1aba9-9673-4034-a577-9dbe6ba95422.quote: I've lost count of the number of times that I've been approached by strangers wanting to tell me that they think I'm brave or inspirational, and this was long before my work had any kind of public profile.
3eb1aba9-9673-4034-a577-9dbe6ba95422.author: Stella Young

29e316e8-d50f-4119-a806-1f04b3e3a523.quote: Compared to politics, I think sports is funnier, because it's inconsequential. And politics can be real important and all that. The more pointless something is, the funnier it is, you know? And the more grave or important things are... You know, some comedians can get this disease where they get serious all the time.
29e316e8-d50f-4119-a806-1f04b3e3a523.author: Norm MacDonald

600acacf-6f7b-4235-940a-ff4e1350b20b.quote: Architecture is not an inspirational business, it's a rational procedure to do sensible and hopefully beautiful things; that's all.
600acacf-6f7b-4235-940a-ff4e1350b20b.author: Harry Seidler

7ea87581-077a-489a-b56c-64f4072f6c16.quote: I'm a boxer who believes that the object of the sport is to hit and not get hit.
7ea87581-077a-489a-b56c-64f4072f6c16.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

d35e8a30-99c9-4de2-99e3-accb08b49f08.quote: I grew up as a sports fan, and I know that a hall of fame is very different than an award for being the best of the year. It's a nod to the longevity of our accomplishment.
d35e8a30-99c9-4de2-99e3-accb08b49f08.author: Chuck D

e718f395-ef3c-4eb7-82ef-ad65daeadbf4.quote: I'm nothing more than a sports slave.
e718f395-ef3c-4eb7-82ef-ad65daeadbf4.author: Dennis Rodman

a6aec542-f890-4c24-9819-d4187a74d364.quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
a6aec542-f890-4c24-9819-d4187a74d364.author: Victor Kiam

f17ee391-a471-4a7e-a6cd-f35ae0e08ead.quote: There isn't quite a feeling you get from playing video games that you get when you're playing sports, which is like a sense of euphoria. You just get the satisfaction of doing something active and feeling good after.
f17ee391-a471-4a7e-a6cd-f35ae0e08ead.author: Patrick Chan

15ca626b-f38e-4e45-981a-0e9ad0de53af.quote: Joy descends gently upon us like the evening dew, and does not patter down like a hailstorm.
15ca626b-f38e-4e45-981a-0e9ad0de53af.author: Jean Paul

bcf45188-b69b-4f39-992c-8868c3c923b8.quote: I'm riveted by extreme sports like big-wave surfing, 'megaramp' skateboarding and half-pipe snowboarding. I'm fascinated partly because the sports are so exhilaratingly acrobatic. But I'm also captivated by the fear that a terrible accident might happen at any moment. And accidents do happen.
bcf45188-b69b-4f39-992c-8868c3c923b8.author: Lucy Walker

54f40406-f995-43ee-999e-aa7b548fd89c.quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.
54f40406-f995-43ee-999e-aa7b548fd89c.author: Allen Ginsberg

3431d0bc-22a4-4af0-bd22-5129420eb26f.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
3431d0bc-22a4-4af0-bd22-5129420eb26f.author: Walt Whitman

777c5d4a-ca3d-436c-9927-71d8b1c375c6.quote: The World Cup is not just a great global sporting event, it is also inscribed with much deeper cultural and political importance.
777c5d4a-ca3d-436c-9927-71d8b1c375c6.author: Martin Jacques

497b2b71-c111-41ed-8263-79fe320ac2a4.quote: It's as if inside the White House the belief in Obama's inspirational charisma is still such that every time the ugliness of brute politics intrudes, it's a startling revelation.
497b2b71-c111-41ed-8263-79fe320ac2a4.author: Tina Brown

cf43adc2-812b-47a9-8118-bde4f0212170.quote: I've always wanted to buy a sports car. After the England series, I went up to my dad and said that I wanted to buy a sports car and got his consent. On his birthday, I surprised him by bringing it home. It's a Porsche Boxter Limited Edition, and my family was thrilled to see it.
cf43adc2-812b-47a9-8118-bde4f0212170.author: Suresh Raina

bd1c861b-3acf-4318-ab7d-83f6bf23de0a.quote: Give light and people will find the way.
bd1c861b-3acf-4318-ab7d-83f6bf23de0a.author: Ella Baker

45531bff-996f-4184-82c8-cd88c8178bff.quote: Always continue the climb. It is possible for you to do whatever you choose, if you first get to know who you are and are willing to work with a power that is greater than ourselves to do it.
45531bff-996f-4184-82c8-cd88c8178bff.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

299dd587-5c4c-4c92-83b5-3f868c526129.quote: I believe God created sports for a good reason. It's recreation. It's something that we enjoy. It teaches us a lot as well... I believe God is a sports fan.
299dd587-5c4c-4c92-83b5-3f868c526129.author: Luke Scott

f16fff18-34ff-4f10-92b8-21f7298e95f9.quote: Nothing is worth more than this day.
f16fff18-34ff-4f10-92b8-21f7298e95f9.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

4c3e37c5-699e-45fb-bd13-11d812f24bb1.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
4c3e37c5-699e-45fb-bd13-11d812f24bb1.author: Robert H. Schuller

8e2ffabe-3001-4e39-bcd1-9031fff5398f.quote: There's ups and downs with boxing, layoffs are part of the sport and they can either help or hurt a guy.
8e2ffabe-3001-4e39-bcd1-9031fff5398f.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

cab4f367-d1a5-47fc-9134-0fad3f8a840c.quote: Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.
cab4f367-d1a5-47fc-9134-0fad3f8a840c.author: Jules Renard

8cf933ef-8ea8-4ee8-b991-c71ba00dc367.quote: Traveling around the country, meeting fans and hearing their stories in person and on my radio show has reenergized my commitment to creating honest and inspirational content that not only serves my own creative purposes but can help and touch others as well.
8cf933ef-8ea8-4ee8-b991-c71ba00dc367.author: Nikki Sixx

10349763-cbd7-44ff-8918-e2f1c35fd492.quote: Writing is like a contact sport, like football. You can get hurt, but you enjoy it.
10349763-cbd7-44ff-8918-e2f1c35fd492.author: Irwin Shaw

58156078-d6db-46b4-8146-3fc7d2b1ad7c.quote: Rap music's been around for too long now to be inspirational. The words are, but the music isn't.
58156078-d6db-46b4-8146-3fc7d2b1ad7c.author: Alexander McQueen

33d4c279-21fe-405b-b5c3-c1a1dbf85d77.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
33d4c279-21fe-405b-b5c3-c1a1dbf85d77.author: Ayn Rand

8d89a3f6-c386-4d71-b7b0-3fdefda78e0f.quote: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.
8d89a3f6-c386-4d71-b7b0-3fdefda78e0f.author: Diane Sawyer

7623fc41-d013-4be0-8b08-15572e5a4dfc.quote: Baseball is a public trust. Players turn over, owners turn over and certain commissioners turn over. But baseball goes on.
7623fc41-d013-4be0-8b08-15572e5a4dfc.author: Peter Ueberroth

46717125-b9a0-48b8-aa6c-b2e86a17a4cd.quote: I had no interest in sports so I didn't make friends in that traditional way where kids are in public school and they go and they join clubs, and play sports. So I kind of had to find my own way to make friends and get attention and so I just was the class clown.
46717125-b9a0-48b8-aa6c-b2e86a17a4cd.author: Zach Braff

af08b96f-1151-46d2-a548-df3835331912.quote: I'm excited to join my brother-in-law Ken Thomson every Tuesday night on SiriusXM to recap all of the awesome NFL action, and to find out what in the Wylde world of sports is going on.
af08b96f-1151-46d2-a548-df3835331912.author: Zakk Wylde

a4522633-c4b3-4113-8717-53b52f644a1d.quote: What were once only hopes for the future have now come to pass; it is almost exactly 13 years since the overwhelming majority of people in Ireland and Northern Ireland voted in favour of the agreement signed on Good Friday 1998, paving the way for Northern Ireland to become the exciting and inspirational place that it is today.
a4522633-c4b3-4113-8717-53b52f644a1d.author: Queen Elizabeth II

7d49bd96-f657-4fd2-a199-8610c2aefd4e.quote: Even if I did have, you know, a 'Sports Illustrated' body, I'd still wear elegant clothes.
7d49bd96-f657-4fd2-a199-8610c2aefd4e.author: Adele

c9369763-1dbf-4c91-a2a4-e1dce53974e0.quote: I do genuinely believe that young people who play sport at a competitive level, sensibly controlled, sensibly organised, that has to be a good thing. It will teach them to win, it will teach them to lose with dignity and magnanimity - all the things you want. It's a pretty good metaphor for life.
c9369763-1dbf-4c91-a2a4-e1dce53974e0.author: Sebastian Coe

3ca7a9ba-893b-471c-bb24-605d3e5f9689.quote: The integrity of the game is everything.
3ca7a9ba-893b-471c-bb24-605d3e5f9689.author: Peter Ueberroth

17566d78-867b-48d1-80fa-5143d11db371.quote: Both my parents were amateur badminton players. My father is a scientist and wanted me to be a doctor. But my mom was very aggressive and loved badminton. She pushed me right from the age of nine to take up the sport.
17566d78-867b-48d1-80fa-5143d11db371.author: Saina Nehwal

9fdc61c3-e812-4b59-a0ae-db30352542da.quote: Beginning today, treat everyone you meet as if they were going to be dead by midnight. Extend to them all the care, kindness and understanding you can muster, and do it with no thought of any reward. Your life will never be the same again.
9fdc61c3-e812-4b59-a0ae-db30352542da.author: Og Mandino

185fd691-1bf8-4feb-9031-67065003da25.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
185fd691-1bf8-4feb-9031-67065003da25.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

54e452f6-8362-4365-8771-7e959636e7a5.quote: It's so important for kids to get involved with sports in general at a young age.
54e452f6-8362-4365-8771-7e959636e7a5.author: Lindsey Vonn

972db9ab-af66-4786-a043-b0cd07ac8501.quote: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story.
972db9ab-af66-4786-a043-b0cd07ac8501.author: Casey Stengel

f604ab06-5cc9-4252-b966-50c32ef02572.quote: Baseball players are smarter than football players. How often do you see a baseball team penalized for too many men on the field?
f604ab06-5cc9-4252-b966-50c32ef02572.author: Jim Bouton

0c6719ce-d136-4d51-86ce-0e97def44f64.quote: There are thousands of inspirational stories waiting to be told about young women who yearn for a great education. They are stories of struggle and stories of success, and they will inspire others to take action and work to change lives.
0c6719ce-d136-4d51-86ce-0e97def44f64.author: Soledad O'Brien

005c4fec-9767-4ad0-b2cb-59a6819b53e3.quote: In sports, you simply aren't considered a real champion until you have defended your title successfully. Winning it once can be a fluke; winning it twice proves you are the best.
005c4fec-9767-4ad0-b2cb-59a6819b53e3.author: Althea Gibson

08495b74-45e5-49b2-b544-9c6aad40dc57.quote: Try not to get lost in comparing yourself to others. Discover your gifts and let them shine! Softball is amazing that way as a sport. Everyone on the field has a slightly different ability that makes them perfect for their position.
08495b74-45e5-49b2-b544-9c6aad40dc57.author: Jennie Finch

02800311-c0d5-431d-ac3b-6ba0055ac715.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
02800311-c0d5-431d-ac3b-6ba0055ac715.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

c488eaa3-f68f-4d55-88e0-8bfc9c534b50.quote: As a sportsman, my aim was to help sportspersons grow. The idea is to see what is good for sport rather than what's good for individuals.
c488eaa3-f68f-4d55-88e0-8bfc9c534b50.author: Kapil Dev

ca91c198-0abf-4bee-b315-86ebb7e2bf87.quote: Badminton is not a popular sport in India.
ca91c198-0abf-4bee-b315-86ebb7e2bf87.author: Saina Nehwal

3cecf86b-16fa-4537-9976-64ad8a146a55.quote: If the Age of Sport has been all champagne and roses hitherto, then expect our love affair with its newly-acquired prominence to become increasingly tainted by scandals about cheating. Sport is losing its shine and allure.
3cecf86b-16fa-4537-9976-64ad8a146a55.author: Martin Jacques

be29027c-8112-46a4-bd1a-638b2829274a.quote: Be Impeccable With Your Word. Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others. Use the power of your word in the direction of truth and love.
be29027c-8112-46a4-bd1a-638b2829274a.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

3c5c44ca-162a-48a9-86fe-dd617bc69222.quote: If I miss anything about the sport, it's the camaraderie of old teammates.
3c5c44ca-162a-48a9-86fe-dd617bc69222.author: Bo Jackson

d2f3b19a-99c2-4677-b840-611266366cb2.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
d2f3b19a-99c2-4677-b840-611266366cb2.author: Jim Rohn

b7ee1647-337d-4f6f-a603-9b608261b466.quote: Polo is the most inviting sport I've ever seen.
b7ee1647-337d-4f6f-a603-9b608261b466.author: Nacho Figueras

d2434090-2a63-4816-b9bc-191528c65972.quote: I guess there is nothing that will get your mind off everything like golf. I have never been depressed enough to take up the game, but they say you get so sore at yourself you forget to hate your enemies.
d2434090-2a63-4816-b9bc-191528c65972.author: Will Rogers

3e4e5d86-ad44-457c-88e5-0ade0f3494b8.quote: Hockey is a unique sport in the sense that you need each and every guy helping each other and pulling in the same direction to be successful.
3e4e5d86-ad44-457c-88e5-0ade0f3494b8.author: Wayne Gretzky

cb4d2b72-4e5a-4b18-b305-71b170486472.quote: Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around.
cb4d2b72-4e5a-4b18-b305-71b170486472.author: Henry David Thoreau

c14f0672-5e64-4c4c-998e-fe71abf5e0cc.quote: The Olympics remain the most compelling search for excellence that exists in sport, and maybe in life itself.
c14f0672-5e64-4c4c-998e-fe71abf5e0cc.author: Dawn Fraser

284420a8-29e8-46f8-aa1a-aac9cb494bb4.quote: Sport is an important part of the development of kids, and hence, it should be made a part of their curriculum.
284420a8-29e8-46f8-aa1a-aac9cb494bb4.author: Gagan Narang

a6be6725-6699-4fdc-9fd7-43320d2b58d1.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
a6be6725-6699-4fdc-9fd7-43320d2b58d1.author: Arthur Ashe

5e7cf8ef-9321-44b1-858f-02637c9b62df.quote: The sport of horse racing which, at its best, showcases the majestic beauty of this animal and the athleticism of jockeys, has reached an alarming level of corruption and exploitation.
5e7cf8ef-9321-44b1-858f-02637c9b62df.author: Tom Udall

198e64be-d712-4dbc-b5af-2ae2f7c1f094.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
198e64be-d712-4dbc-b5af-2ae2f7c1f094.author: Og Mandino

7fadfae6-86f2-4592-8af9-217cb7396e58.quote: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.
7fadfae6-86f2-4592-8af9-217cb7396e58.author: Khalil Gibran

27c76314-9fae-450c-ae0b-ea84ea2d4402.quote: I wish I had played team sports. I think every kid should. Teamwork builds character - teaches people about leadership and cooperation.
27c76314-9fae-450c-ae0b-ea84ea2d4402.author: Mo Rocca

6176d59b-957f-4f2c-b3a7-a917addb3a06.quote: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.
6176d59b-957f-4f2c-b3a7-a917addb3a06.author: Pope Paul VI

39c8c4b1-b8f3-4b9c-a393-be46515c5f01.quote: You cannot win if you cannot run.
39c8c4b1-b8f3-4b9c-a393-be46515c5f01.author: Hank Stram

1c873c9b-5c79-467b-a4fd-5034703f4bc1.quote: You look at boxing being an international, world-famous sport, right up there next with soccer, and there's only two fighters the people want to see fight. Two little fellows, Manny Pacquiao and Floyd Mayweather.
1c873c9b-5c79-467b-a4fd-5034703f4bc1.author: Emanuel Steward

f305b301-6f08-400d-a1b8-841b4c07af91.quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
f305b301-6f08-400d-a1b8-841b4c07af91.author: Steve Jobs

94751081-3ce3-4625-9568-82f4fa4b61d7.quote: One finds limits by pushing them.
94751081-3ce3-4625-9568-82f4fa4b61d7.author: Herbert Simon

ae782f98-71f7-40eb-b042-ed5f782949d5.quote: I don't mind the sparkle - I think it's kind of a tradition in skating. I don't think the men really need sparkles, but for the women it's part of the glamour of our sport.
ae782f98-71f7-40eb-b042-ed5f782949d5.author: Kristi Yamaguchi

8972abbe-a181-42ff-88bf-a6cd14669e27.quote: Find out who you are and be that person. That's what your soul was put on this Earth to be. Find that truth, live that truth and everything else will come.
8972abbe-a181-42ff-88bf-a6cd14669e27.author: Ellen DeGeneres

995fe421-79d2-4a47-83bc-43528a7c1d2b.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
995fe421-79d2-4a47-83bc-43528a7c1d2b.author: Audrey Hepburn

750e50af-3b21-401e-8b75-b0d3c7b837ad.quote: I don't know anyone in the hunting or sporting arena that goes out with an assault rifle.
750e50af-3b21-401e-8b75-b0d3c7b837ad.author: Joe Manchin

12c73df7-7370-468a-b1cb-3ba55da31835.quote: In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand. Nobody on earth can give you either the key or the door to open, except yourself.
12c73df7-7370-468a-b1cb-3ba55da31835.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

7ab81180-3a6c-4ea5-8480-3acf3812491e.quote: It's important to just kind of get away from your sport until you miss it. It's about taking time to enjoy other aspects of life or learn new things. It helps rejuvenate.
7ab81180-3a6c-4ea5-8480-3acf3812491e.author: Misty May-Treanor

872266a8-f81f-43b5-9dd9-20a7ddf2bbd4.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
872266a8-f81f-43b5-9dd9-20a7ddf2bbd4.author: St. Jerome

fc7efe55-8d4b-42fe-a67e-9fc06a5290a2.quote: When we started in the early '60s, football had a little bit of a tradition. But, they didn't have a mythology. And NFL Films, through our music and our scripts and our photography, created a mythology for the sport.
fc7efe55-8d4b-42fe-a67e-9fc06a5290a2.author: Steve Sabol

e299653d-d8ab-4e06-ad87-e8cf5d1c8cf4.quote: I grew up in a bookless house - my parents didn't read poetry, so if I hadn't had the chance to experience it at school I'd never have experienced it. But I loved English, and I was very lucky in that I had inspirational English teachers, Miss Scriven and Mr. Walker, and they liked us to learn poems by heart, which I found I loved doing.
e299653d-d8ab-4e06-ad87-e8cf5d1c8cf4.author: Carol Ann Duffy

cae2bbc8-ee5a-44c1-a881-98bf0642b2d3.quote: It's inspirational to see someone who is dying smile.
cae2bbc8-ee5a-44c1-a881-98bf0642b2d3.author: Arlen Specter

affaf947-dcbf-46e8-9e9f-a1f6097fa49e.quote: I wanted to perform well for my mom and dad, because in high school, I didn't have a job. My brothers, they worked at Pizza Hut or places like that, but sports, that was my way of giving back.
affaf947-dcbf-46e8-9e9f-a1f6097fa49e.author: Junior Seau

bf91366d-7732-4b74-88b2-3ef73eba0352.quote: When I think about dropping team sports and picking up surfing and also then geeking out radio control planes and gadgetry and all that stuff I love, that's what really now has led me in big part to GoPro.
bf91366d-7732-4b74-88b2-3ef73eba0352.author: Nick Woodman

70948d4b-0974-49a0-af55-d27c0808e3cb.quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
70948d4b-0974-49a0-af55-d27c0808e3cb.author: Tony Robbins

31485237-8c5d-47d7-aa1a-c0ee1c262f8a.quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
31485237-8c5d-47d7-aa1a-c0ee1c262f8a.author: William James

c93d34ab-d365-48df-a28e-edf1f71cf08f.quote: A career in sport is almost impossible to manage without the support, and guidance, and reassurance of family and friends. During tough times, and there always are, this is whom we go to.
c93d34ab-d365-48df-a28e-edf1f71cf08f.author: Rahul Dravid

76832362-56c2-4405-98eb-9744b1552491.quote: Boxing is a sport. We allow each other to hit each other, but I'm not treating my opponent like my enemy. We're doing a job to entertain people.
76832362-56c2-4405-98eb-9744b1552491.author: Manny Pacquiao

50b63fd9-9881-4eee-b3cc-b58d9295f9fb.quote: Inside, I've got a real purist desire and dream about the music. I like the idea of being able to carve out a kind of magical, colourful, artistic, inspirational life. And the reality just turns out to be quite different, working with the business to bring this thing you have created into the world.
50b63fd9-9881-4eee-b3cc-b58d9295f9fb.author: Damien Rice

71979d2c-d7cf-4e4f-94b2-e3563fd6674a.quote: Gold medals aren't really made of gold. They're made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.
71979d2c-d7cf-4e4f-94b2-e3563fd6674a.author: Dan Gable

422f4ca7-e6b4-4500-ae39-684742435f53.quote: My stance has always been that there's no place in our sport for drug users. I've always said it's a ban for life if you come up positive. I stand by that.
422f4ca7-e6b4-4500-ae39-684742435f53.author: Maurice Greene

c505a7f3-6307-4bef-a56f-40f8537ff7a0.quote: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.
c505a7f3-6307-4bef-a56f-40f8537ff7a0.author: Morihei Ueshiba

8b523817-2be5-4675-851d-184c1af3e082.quote: How do you know you're going to do something, untill you do it?
8b523817-2be5-4675-851d-184c1af3e082.author: J. D. Salinger

e73f0ef2-479f-4ac2-9782-56f115b9bbed.quote: Sports is like rock 'n' roll. Both are dominant cultural forces, both speak an international language, and both are all about emotions.
e73f0ef2-479f-4ac2-9782-56f115b9bbed.author: Phil Knight

086c065e-002c-41ea-a84b-c6ba6fbc4a4e.quote: It's interesting. I've known quite a few good athletes that can't begin to play a beat on the drum set. Most team sport is about the smooth fluidity of hand-eye coordination and physical grace, where drumming is much more about splitting all those things up.
086c065e-002c-41ea-a84b-c6ba6fbc4a4e.author: Neil Peart

585c3bb0-07fc-4adc-86b3-a5e54e8e4405.quote: Figure skating is a mixture of art and sport.
585c3bb0-07fc-4adc-86b3-a5e54e8e4405.author: Katarina Witt

3414a356-03dd-4fa6-9289-8973955ab79d.quote: No other game combines the wonder of nature with the discipline of sport in such carefully planned ways. A great golf course both frees and challenges a golfer's mind.
3414a356-03dd-4fa6-9289-8973955ab79d.author: Tom Watson

129a649c-eeee-417e-8712-1377bf45509d.quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
129a649c-eeee-417e-8712-1377bf45509d.author: Aldous Huxley

82a87b92-b132-4f63-ba53-25cda0d8527b.quote: Have you noticed that whatever sport you're trying to learn, some earnest person is always telling you to keep your knees bent?
82a87b92-b132-4f63-ba53-25cda0d8527b.author: Dave Barry

5743234f-dc55-4c83-8ef2-0dd01e95a22e.quote: Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others.
5743234f-dc55-4c83-8ef2-0dd01e95a22e.author: Rosa Parks

1eb24c5d-3a78-47ce-beab-839e53ba70f6.quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
1eb24c5d-3a78-47ce-beab-839e53ba70f6.author: Napoleon Hill

18d1cfa8-e73a-4261-ae5d-3dfe48057b94.quote: There are a few things that people all around the world need to admit to themselves. Trade restraints slow economic growth, the euro is not a reserve currency, and scoreless sports ties are boring.
18d1cfa8-e73a-4261-ae5d-3dfe48057b94.author: P. J. O'Rourke

7791e2c1-6097-4ba2-a197-bb733f14f02f.quote: Football is an incredible game. Sometimes it's so incredible, it's unbelievable.
7791e2c1-6097-4ba2-a197-bb733f14f02f.author: Tom Landry

1979e8de-f6bc-4349-ab8b-52eccfd38129.quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
1979e8de-f6bc-4349-ab8b-52eccfd38129.author: Amelia Barr

6478d75a-e61e-402c-8302-a5809d391267.quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
6478d75a-e61e-402c-8302-a5809d391267.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

bb2260ff-d662-4a2e-9554-7a1c4346b3cc.quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
bb2260ff-d662-4a2e-9554-7a1c4346b3cc.author: Swami Sivananda

5bfa4e70-7ec6-4f96-9e4e-88360d251894.quote: Sport is a great equalizer that can build bridges, transcend borders and cultures, and render even the fiercest conflicts temporarily irrelevant.
5bfa4e70-7ec6-4f96-9e4e-88360d251894.author: Richard Attias

a085932f-b01a-4c0c-aa9a-63ff58669509.quote: Swimming is a confusing sport, because sometimes you do it for fun, and other times you do it to not die. And when I'm swimming, sometimes I'm not sure which one it is.
a085932f-b01a-4c0c-aa9a-63ff58669509.author: Demetri Martin

d4b829af-ae9c-4585-87ce-0376d6e56672.quote: If I was invincible, maybe I would take up some extreme sports.
d4b829af-ae9c-4585-87ce-0376d6e56672.author: Tom Welling

932ef48e-2f71-4110-b202-9d61d787aeb5.quote: It is never too late to get into tennis! While I started playing at the age of 8 when my parents gave me a tennis racquet for Christmas, tennis is a lifelong sport that can be enjoyed by people of almost any age. It's also something you never forget once you learn.
932ef48e-2f71-4110-b202-9d61d787aeb5.author: Samantha Stosur

7cab5393-11ae-4ee9-86a5-e78472573add.quote: Just what future the Designer of the universe has provided for the souls of men I do not know, I cannot prove. But I find that the whole order of Nature confirms my confidence that, if it is not like our noblest hopes and dreams, it will transcend them.
7cab5393-11ae-4ee9-86a5-e78472573add.author: Henry Norris Russell

c9df8ed2-a815-4cf2-9b54-6ffb559b2d77.quote: Sooner or later a rider will emerge who will win more Tours. In every sport we have seen how the records eventually get broken and cycling is no exception.
c9df8ed2-a815-4cf2-9b54-6ffb559b2d77.author: Miguel Indurain

dd199527-247d-40f9-aef4-5c5d2bcbfa36.quote: The books that help you most are those which make you think that most. The hardest way of learning is that of easy reading; but a great book that comes from a great thinker is a ship of thought, deep freighted with truth and beauty.
dd199527-247d-40f9-aef4-5c5d2bcbfa36.author: Pablo Neruda

083422ea-a8a0-4438-8908-bfcff127e942.quote: The uglier a man's legs are, the better he plays golf - it's almost a law.
083422ea-a8a0-4438-8908-bfcff127e942.author: H. G. Wells

4c6130c2-ff54-4eaa-ba48-85d6a368519e.quote: The dog that trots about finds a bone.
4c6130c2-ff54-4eaa-ba48-85d6a368519e.author: Golda Meir

20245073-04b4-45c5-aabf-57154e56683c.quote: I am building a fire, and everyday I train, I add more fuel. At just the right moment, I light the match.
20245073-04b4-45c5-aabf-57154e56683c.author: Mia Hamm

6b771c8b-0ac9-4fc2-9b78-a6bd2f423af7.quote: Despite the amazing diversity we're blessed with in this country, schools are still in large part segregated because of economic disparity. Sports are one of the few areas where kids are really given the opportunity to interact with those of different races and religions.
6b771c8b-0ac9-4fc2-9b78-a6bd2f423af7.author: Steve Kerr

954445f5-a615-466f-b201-168149c5ee9d.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
954445f5-a615-466f-b201-168149c5ee9d.author: Jimmy Dean

2bb99aea-91be-4ccf-bf56-a5d7a98d2a1b.quote: As you become a legend in the game, you build more doubters than you build supporters. And that's fine. I think that comes with anything that's challenging. I think it even comes with sports. The older that Michael Jordan got, I think the more doubted he became.
2bb99aea-91be-4ccf-bf56-a5d7a98d2a1b.author: Nelly

29342773-9226-4686-ba93-ae88587aa73e.quote: The wise does at once what the fool does at last.
29342773-9226-4686-ba93-ae88587aa73e.author: Baltasar Gracian

8aa97bca-e589-4e21-97c2-63a4a420753c.quote: Cricket, like all sport, offers glory to few and a lifetime of it to even fewer. For the investment it demands, it offers short careers that end when people in other professions are starting to flourish.
8aa97bca-e589-4e21-97c2-63a4a420753c.author: Harsha Bhogle

2c6769bb-3e0d-462f-a6c8-c010436dde32.quote: Jagdish Singh was my basic coach, and he trained me from my very early days in boxing, teaching me the fundamentals of the sport. He was the one who shaped me into a boxer, disciplined me when I required disciplining.
2c6769bb-3e0d-462f-a6c8-c010436dde32.author: Vijender Singh

1d3ec569-bf97-42f5-b8d1-ac5194c8ca0d.quote: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride - and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
1d3ec569-bf97-42f5-b8d1-ac5194c8ca0d.author: Paul Bryant

3b287f02-5dc8-4a47-a360-850cf29f2a2f.quote: There have been many different artists that have been inspirational. I suppose the question is directed to what was the reason why I went into fantasy illustration.
3b287f02-5dc8-4a47-a360-850cf29f2a2f.author: Boris Vallejo

7175a32a-7bb4-4ff8-a167-84deae53033f.quote: Deacon Jones has been the most inspirational person in my football career.
7175a32a-7bb4-4ff8-a167-84deae53033f.author: Jack Youngblood

7783defe-7ea0-46af-92ae-9e027f02ca6b.quote: Boxing has become America's tragic theater.
7783defe-7ea0-46af-92ae-9e027f02ca6b.author: Joyce Carol Oates

bc82ebbd-946a-41ea-9d21-0d80a3138200.quote: Wild animals never kill for sport. Man is the only one to whom the torture and death of his fellow creatures is amusing in itself.
bc82ebbd-946a-41ea-9d21-0d80a3138200.author: James Anthony Froude

090dc0a0-5100-48a9-869a-be9e768f5577.quote: Serious sport has nothing to do with fair play. It is bound up with hatred, jealousy, boastfulness, disregard of all rules and sadistic pleasure in witnessing violence. In other words, it is war minus the shooting.
090dc0a0-5100-48a9-869a-be9e768f5577.author: George Orwell

7d9063fe-772a-4b4b-9101-b53d42d04621.quote: Rivalries don't necessarily mean races being close at major championships. I had a rivalry with Butch Reynolds for many years. I won all the races, but Butch was the world record holder before I came into the sport, he was extremely talented and he was the only other man running 43 seconds.
7d9063fe-772a-4b4b-9101-b53d42d04621.author: Michael Johnson

56bf19c6-350f-4ea7-98bd-19362b832be5.quote: Silent pictures show us how we lived and what our attitudes were. And as an art form, they can be wonderfully entertaining and often inspirational.
56bf19c6-350f-4ea7-98bd-19362b832be5.author: Kevin Brownlow

a8ca1232-ddb4-4acb-9341-3d4d6e296bf6.quote: A single woman with a very narrow income must be a ridiculous, disagreeable old maid - the proper sport of boys and girls; but a single woman of good fortune is always respectable, and may be as sensible and pleasant as anybody else.
a8ca1232-ddb4-4acb-9341-3d4d6e296bf6.author: Jane Austen

08b4c871-d5b4-4f23-919a-3062c36bcc2d.quote: I don't want to be competing in a sport where I feel that I'm here not on my talent and my hard work but because of a piece of equipment.
08b4c871-d5b4-4f23-919a-3062c36bcc2d.author: Oscar Pistorius

0bdeba10-b953-403a-bc6f-1552bdc9d7f9.quote: When things could've gone really bad, rugby caught my interest and I really stuck with it. The sport brought me, maybe off the streets where we'd be fighting, into putting in a good effort in the rugby field where you're kind of rewarded for that rough behaviour instead of in trouble with the law.
0bdeba10-b953-403a-bc6f-1552bdc9d7f9.author: Daniel Cudmore

8e0190c3-c3f8-4f5a-ad00-1fcf7c57188e.quote: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
8e0190c3-c3f8-4f5a-ad00-1fcf7c57188e.author: George S. Patton

43054136-3b71-4e55-94dd-16b6101f2920.quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
43054136-3b71-4e55-94dd-16b6101f2920.author: Andre Gide

816e849f-bca1-4992-98c5-6ed0b1b266df.quote: I took up boxing as a fitness thing. I got obsessed, and I would go every day when I wasn't working. It's just an insane sport when you get into it.
816e849f-bca1-4992-98c5-6ed0b1b266df.author: Lena Headey

12b3829c-d3aa-41d8-bbc3-f646d3a1ddf1.quote: I'm very fond of the British cinema. I'm a big fan of Martin Campbell and Daniel Craig. I actually find Daniel very inspirational, especially on the physical side of things. He really inspired me to get back into shape when I started to add on a few pounds. I think he's a great role model.
12b3829c-d3aa-41d8-bbc3-f646d3a1ddf1.author: Steven Bauer

21d77167-bddf-49ea-a458-692caf776f7c.quote: Health is the greatest possession. Contentment is the greatest treasure. Confidence is the greatest friend. Non-being is the greatest joy.
21d77167-bddf-49ea-a458-692caf776f7c.author: Lao Tzu

6b50c389-c2cd-4bbc-a7d3-2ae3bcdd4bac.quote: Involvement in my kids' sports teams is something I have made time for over the years. I've also been able to coach all three of them in baseball and basketball, something that has strengthened our bonds and given me indescribable joy. I wouldn't trade it for anything.
6b50c389-c2cd-4bbc-a7d3-2ae3bcdd4bac.author: Thomas Perez

b49cefde-ccfd-4e40-9665-77f5d9ca10c5.quote: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
b49cefde-ccfd-4e40-9665-77f5d9ca10c5.author: Napoleon Hill

ebc92447-5623-4b61-8170-3b3e7a77653e.quote: As the National Football League and other pro sports increasingly reckon with the early dementia, mental health issues, suicides and even criminal behavior of former players, the risk of what's known as chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE), is becoming clear.
ebc92447-5623-4b61-8170-3b3e7a77653e.author: Jeffrey Kluger

f24368ed-f645-450e-bc78-d49ba538037c.quote: Poker has the feeling of a sport, but you don't have to do push-ups.
f24368ed-f645-450e-bc78-d49ba538037c.author: Penn Jillette

7b0db726-21be-4686-a2bc-39d620999b86.quote: The first question which the priest and the Levite asked was: 'If I stop to help this man, what will happen to me?' But... the good Samaritan reversed the question: 'If I do not stop to help this man, what will happen to him?'
7b0db726-21be-4686-a2bc-39d620999b86.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

7ce72cbf-b970-4fdd-a4e9-3712493b3777.quote: Nurture your minds with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes.
7ce72cbf-b970-4fdd-a4e9-3712493b3777.author: Benjamin Disraeli

dd266e49-32bb-412b-bdd3-f3f2af73f889.quote: Youth sports could not exist without millions of volunteers and modestly paid coaches who teach our children how to skate and catch and dribble and also how to get along with others.
dd266e49-32bb-412b-bdd3-f3f2af73f889.author: George Vecsey

1534fe68-cd99-499e-8207-e5d63c8a0a22.quote: He's going to be around a long, long time, if his body holds up. That's always a concern with a lot of players because of how much they play. A lot of guys can't handle it. But it looks like he can.
1534fe68-cd99-499e-8207-e5d63c8a0a22.author: Jack Nicklaus

9d143755-3031-40b4-bba6-dda469bb5edf.quote: If you meet the Buddha in the lane, feed him the ball.
9d143755-3031-40b4-bba6-dda469bb5edf.author: Phil Jackson

d9e55a24-0fbb-49b1-b152-d65196075ccc.quote: I'd like to design something like a city or a museum. I want to do something hands on rather than just play golf which is the sport of the religious right.
d9e55a24-0fbb-49b1-b152-d65196075ccc.author: Brad Pitt

622ca9f1-31d2-4294-8b2e-e9d8d63b2248.quote: The great thing coming from sports is you understand the concept of a team. It leaves no room for being selfish, and that's something I picked up from home.
622ca9f1-31d2-4294-8b2e-e9d8d63b2248.author: Michael Strahan

7e0087f3-c8b1-4411-b788-64895084c23a.quote: What's a good tournament for him? Winning it. He's good enough.
7e0087f3-c8b1-4411-b788-64895084c23a.author: Greg Norman

68fb6a64-cc7c-446b-b216-569e061ee616.quote: Religious speech is extreme, emotional, and motivational. It is anti-literal, relying on metaphor, allusion, and other rhetorical devices, and it assumes knowledge within a community of believers.
68fb6a64-cc7c-446b-b216-569e061ee616.author: Amy Waldman

80885dca-2a49-43b4-b008-f18519ce96bb.quote: Success is the only motivational factor that a boy with character needs.
80885dca-2a49-43b4-b008-f18519ce96bb.author: Woody Hayes

8ed22ec8-5e76-4faf-a4fa-e91b70a6cd61.quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
8ed22ec8-5e76-4faf-a4fa-e91b70a6cd61.author: John D. Rockefeller

f6f67737-114a-46d3-bdf7-9db1e9a70686.quote: I've always made weird sounds with my mouth. I've always been fascinated by the sound design, what you can do with your mouth. I was the kid dancing around in third grade on the basketball court. While everyone would be playing sports, I would be jumping around.
f6f67737-114a-46d3-bdf7-9db1e9a70686.author: Charlie Puth

8e13735f-208b-4ef1-804c-1f8187d8ef85.quote: I think fans of the sport have a good understanding now of how fit Formula One drivers need to be.
8e13735f-208b-4ef1-804c-1f8187d8ef85.author: Jenson Button

ba6e4474-9855-407a-a18f-c2754e065f8d.quote: The sport in Scouting is to find the good in every boy and develop it.
ba6e4474-9855-407a-a18f-c2754e065f8d.author: Robert Powell

30cf3a85-2f35-4771-8a2c-c30cf30c946f.quote: If a man watches three football games in a row, he should be declared legally dead.
30cf3a85-2f35-4771-8a2c-c30cf30c946f.author: Erma Bombeck

04abdcc0-9a95-4868-9bbf-aa185e7d28f0.quote: I'm a golfer, and what are the two sports you can do till you drop? Golf and surfing. They're great for you limber-wise, they're great for you health-wise, and they put you in sweet locations.
04abdcc0-9a95-4868-9bbf-aa185e7d28f0.author: Matthew McConaughey

b47183d8-b85e-4ee3-92dc-718857155313.quote: Be thine own palace, or the world's thy jail.
b47183d8-b85e-4ee3-92dc-718857155313.author: John Donne

cdd4f867-35cf-43b2-93a1-55d180abff74.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
cdd4f867-35cf-43b2-93a1-55d180abff74.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

b602e955-5a4f-4806-8eba-dc87d5ec7d4a.quote: Most ball games are lost, not won.
b602e955-5a4f-4806-8eba-dc87d5ec7d4a.author: Casey Stengel

9871e933-b535-4847-9907-ef8160002be7.quote: I would love to fall in love and get married and have beautiful children. I mean that's one of the goals in life, I think, to have, and it's a beautiful thing. My sister has kids and all my friends have kids. They show me their, you know their report cards. And I can show them my sports car.
9871e933-b535-4847-9907-ef8160002be7.author: Tiesto

737c6553-448b-4402-b3b3-23791ff8d6ff.quote: You know, if you need 100 rounds to kill a deer, maybe hunting isn't your sport.
737c6553-448b-4402-b3b3-23791ff8d6ff.author: Elayne Boosler

b43cb421-f39f-4687-8518-91761194590b.quote: I am never without my lyric book. If anything inspirational happens, I have it there so nothing's forgotten.
b43cb421-f39f-4687-8518-91761194590b.author: Gabrielle Aplin

c3267951-a1a7-4aae-901e-7fa237bd6907.quote: When my TV show, 'Sports Jobs with Junior Seau,' assigned me to be a 'Sports Illustrated' reporter for a weekend, I didn't realize I'd have to squeeze it in around another sports job. I had planned to retire from the NFL to enjoy the cushy lifestyle of a full-time reality TV star, but I wound up getting run over by a bull.
c3267951-a1a7-4aae-901e-7fa237bd6907.author: Junior Seau

2db0e23e-b6c0-4b1f-9ab3-13da10e03cde.quote: You're not going to eliminate concussions. Anytime you hit your head, you have a chance of getting a concussion, in any sport, too. I think we have to learn more about it. Part of it is rules, part of it is equipment, part of it is medical studies, knowing more about the brain.
2db0e23e-b6c0-4b1f-9ab3-13da10e03cde.author: John Madden

f20a0ae8-7be7-4ece-9b16-a7d6d1205606.quote: American sports are quite masculine. And football - although it's still played by men all over the world - football compared to American football is quite feminine in its artistry. And there's no padding. It's America's loss, though.
f20a0ae8-7be7-4ece-9b16-a7d6d1205606.author: Noel Gallagher

8c9d5039-d846-40a6-8612-59ab6edf5391.quote: Baseball is almost the only orderly thing in a very unorderly world. If you get three strikes, even the best lawyer in the world can't get you off.
8c9d5039-d846-40a6-8612-59ab6edf5391.author: Bill Veeck

17759d31-68af-4b0f-85da-7261ec5ccdc9.quote: Watching baseball under the lights is like observing dogs indoors, at a pedigree show. In both instances, the environment is too controlled to suit the species.
17759d31-68af-4b0f-85da-7261ec5ccdc9.author: Melvin Maddocks

32a841fc-4d0a-44fa-9f2d-091216fc6248.quote: I'll let the racket do the talking.
32a841fc-4d0a-44fa-9f2d-091216fc6248.author: John McEnroe

d16ceca1-e72d-4718-b72b-103e669510bf.quote: The spirit of the Olympic movement is great for young people because it teaches them about the training and discipline required to compete. Even if they don't make the teams, they can rededicate their lives to the art of sport, discipline, and physical fitness.
d16ceca1-e72d-4718-b72b-103e669510bf.author: Richard M. Daley

cd5441c8-5d03-45a7-8a99-41dd0237eb39.quote: I think the sport of wrestling, which I became involved with at the age of 14... I competed until I was 34, kind of old for a contact sport. I coached the sport until I was 47. I think the discipline of wrestling has given me the discipline I have to write.
cd5441c8-5d03-45a7-8a99-41dd0237eb39.author: John Irving

99dac7ac-062e-45c1-adad-734141237904.quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.
99dac7ac-062e-45c1-adad-734141237904.author: Confucius

f7bfbb30-5a71-46c2-995a-1cfb43aebe6c.quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
f7bfbb30-5a71-46c2-995a-1cfb43aebe6c.author: Warren Buffett

7eb2107c-609a-4ed3-adc9-c35812f2a1d2.quote: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.
7eb2107c-609a-4ed3-adc9-c35812f2a1d2.author: Carl Sandburg

d6816695-0e42-4b57-97b3-a123bfc50863.quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
d6816695-0e42-4b57-97b3-a123bfc50863.author: John W. Gardner

558f8a4c-e72b-429c-b927-4edb3ecf3c54.quote: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
558f8a4c-e72b-429c-b927-4edb3ecf3c54.author: Babe Ruth

02b7c9ea-77b4-4f5f-88f0-7ae338540be7.quote: As long as I'm not selling out the people that ride or die with me, I'm glad I'm not an MC. I'm a motivational speaker. I'm not that rapper dude.
02b7c9ea-77b4-4f5f-88f0-7ae338540be7.author: Young Jeezy

15887bae-d327-4001-85c1-054f88843493.quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
15887bae-d327-4001-85c1-054f88843493.author: Wayne Dyer

c42ad8f8-b989-4ac9-a602-fbd04cc5941c.quote: Poverty was the greatest motivating factor in my life.
c42ad8f8-b989-4ac9-a602-fbd04cc5941c.author: Jimmy Dean

25d86cc0-dcb0-44a5-9236-4ed1ce230052.quote: By now, you've probably caught on to something: my mother is always standing by with just the right Scripture or inspirational saying to get me through any tough situation.
25d86cc0-dcb0-44a5-9236-4ed1ce230052.author: Gabby Douglas

ec8776a6-b20d-43f6-96a3-63566acea4e5.quote: It's a moment that I'm after, a fleeting moment, but not a frozen moment.
ec8776a6-b20d-43f6-96a3-63566acea4e5.author: Andrew Wyeth

b5a329d1-6e22-4946-a07c-9fd0acf84146.quote: I think the biggest things I am looking forward to is getting new faces into the sport. Getting kids who could be afraid of water to feel comfortable in the pool.
b5a329d1-6e22-4946-a07c-9fd0acf84146.author: Michael Phelps

f33652c0-e24c-41a0-aea5-93eb413b38c4.quote: Our ideals are our better selves.
f33652c0-e24c-41a0-aea5-93eb413b38c4.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

1db763e2-be28-4761-ade6-03a6e9b916b8.quote: How does one control weight? By not overeating. How does one stay in shape? One plays sports. There are no magic pills here.
1db763e2-be28-4761-ade6-03a6e9b916b8.author: Vladimir Putin

dbc38f03-b78c-49a8-8a4e-219446c9dad6.quote: To me, teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one. You become selfless.
dbc38f03-b78c-49a8-8a4e-219446c9dad6.author: Mike Krzyzewski

9d4f3286-03ae-481f-a2a5-d41699b7134a.quote: Overall the fundamentals seem to be there and he's obviously got a very mature head on his shoulders. He's got a kind of presence.
9d4f3286-03ae-481f-a2a5-d41699b7134a.author: Nick Price

d227af10-d498-430b-a1bc-ec41ba86802b.quote: It always seems impossible until its done.
d227af10-d498-430b-a1bc-ec41ba86802b.author: Nelson Mandela

08a6fe76-593e-4690-bb0c-eecd99a18ed3.quote: 'All in With Laila Ali' is educational, inspirational, compelling programming profiling individuals that have reached for the sky, pushed themselves to the limit and did things that you would think were impossible.
08a6fe76-593e-4690-bb0c-eecd99a18ed3.author: Laila Ali

02d576b2-4d37-4bd0-9c8f-1a783f9d8231.quote: I like sports, and swimming is my favorite. Doing physical exercises keeps one fit and healthy and helps one work more efficiently. I think we all need to strike a balance between work and relaxation. This can keep us energetic and help us do our job better.
02d576b2-4d37-4bd0-9c8f-1a783f9d8231.author: Xi Jinping

5305cbfd-45a0-4337-a1b0-e01d989f0a70.quote: My father is a huge horse racing fan, so I was introduced to the sport long before 'Seabiscuit.' But the role made me an even bigger fan. Horse racing is one of my favorite sports.
5305cbfd-45a0-4337-a1b0-e01d989f0a70.author: Elizabeth Banks

63af7e0c-5643-4fbd-8d58-83f987179e82.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
63af7e0c-5643-4fbd-8d58-83f987179e82.author: Bo Jackson

ad12808b-d0a1-41d9-ba68-5c6ff5385d4f.quote: They can conquer who believe they can.
ad12808b-d0a1-41d9-ba68-5c6ff5385d4f.author: Virgil

b47c6229-686c-441e-ae3d-da959103956d.quote: Boxing is a sport, but it's also entertainment. I wanted to transcend the sport and be considered just not as a fighter, or a champion, but someone very special.
b47c6229-686c-441e-ae3d-da959103956d.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

bb8537fb-7735-4b86-bf79-4cf70f575b67.quote: I play in the low 80s. If it's any hotter than that, I won't play.
bb8537fb-7735-4b86-bf79-4cf70f575b67.author: Joe E. Lewis

a71e7f71-9754-4a7e-94e1-f141bb1fc59c.quote: Golf is played by twenty million mature American men whose wives think they are out having fun.
a71e7f71-9754-4a7e-94e1-f141bb1fc59c.author: Jim Bishop

5acc6da4-b0f3-441b-ad2f-ca332624eca9.quote: I think video games are a huge part of our society now. Having kids play baseball video games helps them understand and love the game. It could actually push them to get out there and play the game for real. That's great for the sport.
5acc6da4-b0f3-441b-ad2f-ca332624eca9.author: Justin Verlander

83ba3b62-21d2-4b89-a6fc-81d61feb3fe0.quote: I'm the biggest fighter in the history of the sport. If you don't believe it, check the cash register.
83ba3b62-21d2-4b89-a6fc-81d61feb3fe0.author: Mike Tyson

b1111a49-c674-4c9c-9421-e62e3f50a4af.quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
b1111a49-c674-4c9c-9421-e62e3f50a4af.author: Stephen Hawking

f93c12be-10d9-4c6b-89e2-307137cfe2f4.quote: Plant thy foot firmly in the prints which His foot has made before thee.
f93c12be-10d9-4c6b-89e2-307137cfe2f4.author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

68edbd58-2218-41aa-98a9-73bf5b42624c.quote: Especially with sports cars, when you have got so many cars on the track with various degrees of competitiveness, then something will happen. It's the nature of racing, the law of averages. If you want to be a front-runner then you are going to have to push very hard, and collisions can happen.
68edbd58-2218-41aa-98a9-73bf5b42624c.author: Allan McNish

ef25939a-b080-4865-835d-b55c94752bcd.quote: In sport there is never any moment that is the same as the other. I have been in Formula One for 12 years, and out of that I had one year with the perfect car.
ef25939a-b080-4865-835d-b55c94752bcd.author: Michael Schumacher

f98d6712-8f9a-42e6-a3da-427609aad128.quote: Eighteen holes of match play will teach you more about your foe than 18 years of dealing with him across a desk.
f98d6712-8f9a-42e6-a3da-427609aad128.author: Grantland Rice

b9ce37ef-e8da-4c3a-a36b-939c74e5fa6c.quote: It's a blast to watch. It's a lot more interesting live than it is on record. I mean, it really is a theatrical event. It's a sporting event! Cause you never know what's gonna happen.
b9ce37ef-e8da-4c3a-a36b-939c74e5fa6c.author: John Zorn

3928c057-e241-48fa-aa80-5d633e6d5368.quote: I have been requesting the government because it is the government which has to allocate the land to build public courses. I am willing to meet the minister and discuss ways to make courses public and more accessible to the regular sports enthusiasts.
3928c057-e241-48fa-aa80-5d633e6d5368.author: Jeev Milkha Singh

80926d18-ccaa-430b-bfcb-635d5d5d7278.quote: Tennis and golf are best played, not watched.
80926d18-ccaa-430b-bfcb-635d5d5d7278.author: Roger Kahn

ea11c3ce-e567-4616-a9f9-5d5df16e22fc.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
ea11c3ce-e567-4616-a9f9-5d5df16e22fc.author: Maya Angelou

11d05811-65ff-491f-ab77-57d8fde2aaa2.quote: Show me your hands. Do they have scars from giving? Show me your feet. Are they wounded in service? Show me your heart. Have you left a place for divine love?
11d05811-65ff-491f-ab77-57d8fde2aaa2.author: Fulton J. Sheen

dc5245f4-fb85-4e39-941b-43252db5e240.quote: In any team sport, the best teams have consistency and chemistry.
dc5245f4-fb85-4e39-941b-43252db5e240.author: Roger Staubach

3e5549b1-0fde-448f-82f4-ee4ac1a72136.quote: I have long recognized a link between fitness and mental health and I think we need to encourage young people to take part in sports and team activities because we know it has such positive results.
3e5549b1-0fde-448f-82f4-ee4ac1a72136.author: Tipper Gore

8f0e7fc8-6bb5-4f7a-880b-85eb5a4b3c53.quote: Along with my passion for horse breeding, I was a horse racing enthusiast... In 1974 I was elected as a committee member and subsequently as a steward of the Turf Club. I had a burning desire to clean up the sport, which had always carried the stigma of gambling and manipulation.
8f0e7fc8-6bb5-4f7a-880b-85eb5a4b3c53.author: Cyrus S. Poonawalla

8d849a87-7140-4ec9-a535-8bfa21fd2aec.quote: If you drink don't drive. Don't even putt.
8d849a87-7140-4ec9-a535-8bfa21fd2aec.author: Dean Martin

7e9098d7-5dca-46f7-9b9b-f562b2403038.quote: Everything I have in this world, I owe to the sport of boxing, and I won't ever forget that.
7e9098d7-5dca-46f7-9b9b-f562b2403038.author: Oscar De La Hoya

79a503bf-94e0-487e-baf5-2f0514bec554.quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
79a503bf-94e0-487e-baf5-2f0514bec554.author: Lao Tzu

b0e14148-4322-4ceb-a705-ea001956a9aa.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
b0e14148-4322-4ceb-a705-ea001956a9aa.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

91833ee5-7e1c-4fe5-a0a8-f07c890d4585.quote: Football is violence and cold weather and sex and college rye.
91833ee5-7e1c-4fe5-a0a8-f07c890d4585.author: Roger Kahn

6ecb68fb-2c77-41dc-85af-cbcec7065f8f.quote: Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out.
6ecb68fb-2c77-41dc-85af-cbcec7065f8f.author: Christopher Reeve

b62876ba-39b5-4525-be89-59a1967e4c8a.quote: The sport of competitive memorizing is driven by a kind of arms race where every year somebody comes up with a new way to remember more stuff more quickly, and then the rest of the field has to play catch-up.
b62876ba-39b5-4525-be89-59a1967e4c8a.author: Joshua Foer

d28941cf-c6b2-44b7-a708-c6e2e92a4389.quote: In the field of sports you are more or less accepted for what you do rather than what you are.
d28941cf-c6b2-44b7-a708-c6e2e92a4389.author: Althea Gibson

e45bb96e-b775-43d4-a1c3-944a2e1a058a.quote: There is always room at the top.
e45bb96e-b775-43d4-a1c3-944a2e1a058a.author: Daniel Webster

9ad4f7cd-9e8e-4057-b9a2-23a1478b9c96.quote: I like the order and simplicity of sports. They have an ending. You can argue with your friends about it, but in the end, you still like sports. I almost love the fantasy world of sports more than the real world.
9ad4f7cd-9e8e-4057-b9a2-23a1478b9c96.author: Norm MacDonald

d6bbff92-6fec-48b7-b02a-b677ffa055af.quote: Sports without music is just a game. Music makes it entertaining.
d6bbff92-6fec-48b7-b02a-b677ffa055af.author: Ice Cube

0a7270d0-4ba2-469d-9dbb-4795958a3bfd.quote: People need to take as much interest in other sports as they take in cricket, and that's where we come across a vicious cycle of performance, sponsorship, recognition, jobs and TV visibility. It's a typical chicken-and-egg story; each one is directly related to the other without an answer for what comes first.
0a7270d0-4ba2-469d-9dbb-4795958a3bfd.author: Gagan Narang

ad02d2b2-edde-4031-8571-c9269695902c.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
ad02d2b2-edde-4031-8571-c9269695902c.author: Anne Frank

d06579c4-e96f-47ab-afd3-ddc21dfec068.quote: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.
