d06579c4-e96f-47ab-afd3-ddc21dfec068.author: Alan Alda

ed09c2a4-e0db-45ab-8194-dcbe083562dd.quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.
ed09c2a4-e0db-45ab-8194-dcbe083562dd.author: Dale Carnegie

20606516-0610-437d-a2c5-fc4d712cfff7.quote: Give me golf clubs, fresh air and a beautiful partner, and you can keep the clubs and the fresh air.
20606516-0610-437d-a2c5-fc4d712cfff7.author: Jack Benny

bb738745-4247-4236-a9d3-96c9cccc3a9e.quote: I tried all kinds of sports when I was a kid, like soccer and tennis and golf, and, in fact, started skating to be able to play hockey.
bb738745-4247-4236-a9d3-96c9cccc3a9e.author: Patrick Chan

43321f36-96d0-454c-9af1-7644aecf2f20.quote: Julie, Mia and I just met for a couple days, doing some work but really under the guise of having fun. We do events like the Women's Sports Foundation Dinner, where we get to not only do a good thing for the community but we get to hang out with one another again.
43321f36-96d0-454c-9af1-7644aecf2f20.author: Brandi Chastain

70dababb-436e-47b3-935f-fbf1f3ec61c3.quote: Sports nurtures dreams of achieving self confidence and masculine striving for the skinny kid watching a boxer dance around the ring with sublime ease.
70dababb-436e-47b3-935f-fbf1f3ec61c3.author: Armstrong Williams

ba49344d-ea89-4350-aa2d-ff380d237722.quote: The turning point was when I hit my 30th birthday. I thought, if really want to write, it's time to start. I picked up the book How to Write a Novel in 90 Days. The author said to just write three pages a day, and I figured, I can do this. I never got past Page 3 of that book.
ba49344d-ea89-4350-aa2d-ff380d237722.author: James Rollins

6382587a-d843-400d-9367-035cc5189612.quote: I enjoy going to the Y. I take all the fitness classes that my dad takes; that's sort of our bonding - anything athletic, anything sports related.
6382587a-d843-400d-9367-035cc5189612.author: Alyson Stoner

7e9e91dd-b554-41c6-a7b1-5581513753ca.quote: I like rugby - I watch it from time to time. It's basically football without pads but probably a little bit more dangerous than football. You've got to be a lot tougher in that sport - but I definitely like watching rugby and watching those guys knock each other around. It looks like a fun sport.
7e9e91dd-b554-41c6-a7b1-5581513753ca.author: Reggie Bush

6e276309-0fd1-4a6b-8c86-e538515ccf39.quote: Space is an inspirational concept that allows you to dream big.
6e276309-0fd1-4a6b-8c86-e538515ccf39.author: Peter Diamandis

0c25da78-0269-490f-862d-dbcd0fe52ab8.quote: The Internet is changing what entertainment and sports is. It's not just a few people authoring an experience for others. It's really growing out of what everybody does.
0c25da78-0269-490f-862d-dbcd0fe52ab8.author: Gabe Newell

21d33ccc-f83f-4429-8388-f33ae84ccc88.quote: I love to shop, especially in retro stores. I have about a million pairs of old-school sports shoes like Adidas, so that's probably my biggest vice.
21d33ccc-f83f-4429-8388-f33ae84ccc88.author: Carrot Top

ac254b69-b2e4-4ffc-a545-852bc313b89b.quote: The more things you do, the more you can do.
ac254b69-b2e4-4ffc-a545-852bc313b89b.author: Lucille Ball

d03243b4-1569-4195-afdb-5a0931ee3152.quote: I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
d03243b4-1569-4195-afdb-5a0931ee3152.author: Robert H. Schuller

28308ba8-54af-45fc-bb27-948645755f8b.quote: Vitality shows in not only the ability to persist but the ability to start over.
28308ba8-54af-45fc-bb27-948645755f8b.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

6cfe34f1-fa3e-4727-bc7a-9e6af3d2c2cd.quote: Tennis is such an individual and competitive sport, but it is great being part of a team and getting to know the girls outside of tennis - even though we are all competing for the same thing!
6cfe34f1-fa3e-4727-bc7a-9e6af3d2c2cd.author: Dominika Cibulkova

0f4481db-4de1-47eb-b88c-b23ce97044c3.quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
0f4481db-4de1-47eb-b88c-b23ce97044c3.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

4fa12da1-2228-4320-beca-c13a46ba1638.quote: Democracy is not a spectator sport, it's a participatory event. If we don't participate in it, it ceases to be a democracy.
4fa12da1-2228-4320-beca-c13a46ba1638.author: Michael Moore

be263965-9f2a-4955-933e-e93abc95a5a1.quote: Gray skies are just clouds passing over.
be263965-9f2a-4955-933e-e93abc95a5a1.author: Frank Gifford

c72d2cc1-4154-4d89-ace8-bd39c6b1ce3a.quote: For some in Washington, it's become sport to pick on the federal workforce. I think they do so unjustly. The very foundation of a stable America is having a government that functions well. Many countries have dysfunctional governments, because they don't have a good government workforce.
c72d2cc1-4154-4d89-ace8-bd39c6b1ce3a.author: Ken Salazar

b3f85f73-081e-4886-bb83-86ebbcd22197.quote: The dullest Olympic sport is curling, whatever 'curling' means.
b3f85f73-081e-4886-bb83-86ebbcd22197.author: Andy Rooney

a7ec2dcb-a08c-42bf-bcb8-8658b34c58ba.quote: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any. It is wonderful how much may be done if we are always doing.
a7ec2dcb-a08c-42bf-bcb8-8658b34c58ba.author: Thomas Jefferson

458fa0ec-6657-4e9c-836f-079c469f3373.quote: I don't gamble at all, all my life. I am only interested in sports.
458fa0ec-6657-4e9c-836f-079c469f3373.author: Stanley Ho

d19a3b6a-dde2-4c23-9f81-4fdebc61085f.quote: Tennis is a perfect combination of violent action taking place in an atmosphere of total tranquillity.
d19a3b6a-dde2-4c23-9f81-4fdebc61085f.author: Billie Jean King

933dab81-729f-4b20-9a08-eabe0247a705.quote: I had hoped when my life was chronicled, it would be an inspirational story.
933dab81-729f-4b20-9a08-eabe0247a705.author: Om Puri

b7322a20-b410-4881-8cec-3dca6a97a63c.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
b7322a20-b410-4881-8cec-3dca6a97a63c.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

0b6ae568-89aa-4fcd-b5da-5196dfc6d97a.quote: Sports teaches you character, it teaches you to play by the rules, it teaches you to know what it feels like to win and lose-it teaches you about life.
0b6ae568-89aa-4fcd-b5da-5196dfc6d97a.author: Billie Jean King

a4b23971-f799-40eb-91c6-00814d33b31a.quote: I believe there's an inner power that makes winners or losers. And the winners are the ones who really listen to the truth of their hearts.
a4b23971-f799-40eb-91c6-00814d33b31a.author: Sylvester Stallone

1227a2a5-f544-4b91-a005-4e07b13f39df.quote: The BBC sports department when I was there was seriously to the right of Ghengis Khan, and if people think I am strange, they should have met some of the production staff I worked with. Margaret Thatcher and the Queen were the pin up girls for many of them.
1227a2a5-f544-4b91-a005-4e07b13f39df.author: David Icke

f5cdbad5-4f09-4fc0-b297-042c9e1dfacb.quote: I really think that it's disgusting that Paris is the only place where it is illegal for paps to follow you around. It actually took someone losing their life - Diana, an inspirational woman - and then it changed, but they still won't change it in London! It's horrible!
f5cdbad5-4f09-4fc0-b297-042c9e1dfacb.author: Cara Delevingne

f43dfe16-5d6d-415b-a16c-9bc688125f94.quote: I think that from the time you start playing sports as a child you see that your responsibility to your team is to play the best that you can play as an individual... and yet, not take anything away from being part of a team.
f43dfe16-5d6d-415b-a16c-9bc688125f94.author: Wayne Gretzky

5b174b1f-33ce-4f83-8198-af43980cf671.quote: The two most important things in life are good friends and a strong bullpen.
5b174b1f-33ce-4f83-8198-af43980cf671.author: Bob Lemon

31a4f293-e9e8-49c0-89d4-d518682bbb86.quote: You can win all the tournaments you want, but the majors are what you're remembered for. It's how you're measured as a champion in our sport. The majors are where it's at.
31a4f293-e9e8-49c0-89d4-d518682bbb86.author: Tiger Woods

e89a7a2e-6d32-454c-a2c8-01cacf7f6c7e.quote: So I wanted to sing inspirational music, and that's exactly how I approached it - only the words have been changed to declare my relationship with God.
e89a7a2e-6d32-454c-a2c8-01cacf7f6c7e.author: Smokey Robinson

42defed7-f04c-446b-8f86-1a37c96d9546.quote: Baseball is not a sport you can achieve individually.
42defed7-f04c-446b-8f86-1a37c96d9546.author: Curt Schilling

1f73a2c3-2b26-4cf1-8198-903bba103cfd.quote: I'd just as soon play tennis with the net down.
1f73a2c3-2b26-4cf1-8198-903bba103cfd.author: Robert Frost

d1d1ffca-d220-4491-b9ad-4d46961cfc4a.quote: I think it's good for sporting justice that Ronaldo scored twice in the final.
d1d1ffca-d220-4491-b9ad-4d46961cfc4a.author: Just Fontaine

9e48d02f-b124-4d9d-83d3-e46c79dc875b.quote: You see so many different personalities and mind-sets in the world of sports, just like you do with actors.
9e48d02f-b124-4d9d-83d3-e46c79dc875b.author: Marc Blucas

f88cc459-0b22-430a-8769-2beffbdd06a2.quote: He's got an overall flair for the game. It looks to me like he really loves what he does and he can't wait to get up in the morning, go hit some balls and go play.
f88cc459-0b22-430a-8769-2beffbdd06a2.author: Gary McCord

ae849d6a-8a28-486c-98d6-b39421232394.quote: I know why I am here and my only real focused goal is to live each day to the fullest and to try and honor God and be an encouragement to others. What the future holds is firmly in God's hands, and I am very happy about that!
ae849d6a-8a28-486c-98d6-b39421232394.author: Ken Hensley

f53f95f4-4c3c-48de-9ba7-b0fb77240fdf.quote: Baseball is a red-blooded sport for red-blooded men. It's no pink tea, and mollycoddles had better stay out. It's a struggle for supremacy, a survival of the fittest.
f53f95f4-4c3c-48de-9ba7-b0fb77240fdf.author: Ty Cobb

fc09943f-53d2-474a-bd56-aa14f3846b0d.quote: Violent predators are not like the rest of us. They kill for fun, for sport, for the sake of it. To compare them to animals is an insult to animals. To expect that we can rehabilitate them assumes a will to change.
fc09943f-53d2-474a-bd56-aa14f3846b0d.author: Susan Estrich

b5f0a733-26c3-4342-bdc9-ad2b732feff3.quote: The cardinal sin in sports, what could really wreck it, is not cheating to win, which has gone on forever, but cheating to lose. That threatens a fundamental aspect of sports' appeal, which is their spontaneity. If games are fixed, they're no different from movies; they're scripted.
b5f0a733-26c3-4342-bdc9-ad2b732feff3.author: Michael Mandelbaum

226892ce-5d5f-4d9c-ad60-01db839aed8b.quote: I've been looking at companies that are on a positive path vs. a negative path and I've come to use the language of sports, winning streaks and losing streaks.
226892ce-5d5f-4d9c-ad60-01db839aed8b.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

9aaa65a8-5e58-4901-994a-e56c66825c87.quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
9aaa65a8-5e58-4901-994a-e56c66825c87.author: Jim Rohn

aff8a687-9eac-4dd3-b50c-ba78bd097e76.quote: The first acting thing I ever did was my senior year I decided not to play a sport in the Spring and, in that Spring B.J. Novak who went to school with me, asked if I'd be in this show that was a parody of all the teachers in the school, 'sure!' That was the first acting thing I did.
aff8a687-9eac-4dd3-b50c-ba78bd097e76.author: John Krasinski

d834dbca-461b-4d23-8220-6481d38754bf.quote: Don Chew is the owner of the Orange County Badminton Club, the location where I train. He played badminton when he was young and always had the passion for it. He never made it at the international level, but he wanted to give back to the sport. The majority of the elite players train at Orange County Badminton Club.
d834dbca-461b-4d23-8220-6481d38754bf.author: Howard Bach

4c29b6ab-02fd-4beb-bc51-eaa2077b1ad5.quote: We wanted Nike to be the world's best sports and fitness company. Once you say that, you have a focus. You don't end up making wing tips or sponsoring the next Rolling Stones world tour.
4c29b6ab-02fd-4beb-bc51-eaa2077b1ad5.author: Phil Knight

41c3b6ad-78f1-463c-97eb-395a8128e508.quote: I like motivational books, because I like the go-getting American spirit - your destiny is in your own hands, life is what you make it, don't accept your limitations, jump before you're pushed, leap before you look.
41c3b6ad-78f1-463c-97eb-395a8128e508.author: Louise Mensch

ef69ec36-6a9f-42f3-9939-caea83b6afa4.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
ef69ec36-6a9f-42f3-9939-caea83b6afa4.author: Plutarch

9954fd18-54df-4fd0-a579-2852c615963b.quote: Bobby Knight told me this: 'There is nothing that a good defense cannot beat a better offense.' In other words a good offense wins.
9954fd18-54df-4fd0-a579-2852c615963b.author: Dan Quayle

50410a6f-5d31-412b-8a66-f2b7eb04d352.quote: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.
50410a6f-5d31-412b-8a66-f2b7eb04d352.author: Arthur Ashe

879fe157-5679-4c73-82f2-32dc7c9c8619.quote: Hockey is a sport for white men. Basketball is a sport for black men. Golf is a sport for white men dressed like black pimps.
879fe157-5679-4c73-82f2-32dc7c9c8619.author: Tiger Woods

79487730-c804-4dc2-888f-9697e34b3396.quote: I think everybody has something that takes them away or makes them happier. To some people it's baseball or sports or knitting or the movies.
79487730-c804-4dc2-888f-9697e34b3396.author: Sutton Foster

ca3f7d30-d614-4341-9a41-73296bbdaaa9.quote: It took me a few years to explain to my colleagues and my mentors and the people that I looked up to and I wrestled that I'm not in wrestling anymore. I'm in sports entertainment. Pro' wrestling doesn't mean that we're saying we're a step up above amateur wrestling, because there's nothing above Olympic wrestling.
ca3f7d30-d614-4341-9a41-73296bbdaaa9.author: Kurt Angle

826dc549-4b72-4be4-8a73-02d8f82d958e.quote: I love eating it - grilled chicken, pasta, rice, and other foods that give me long term energy. Every once in a while, my sweet tooth gets the best of me and I have to snack on some candy. Beverage wise, I stick to sports drinks, water, milk, and juice.
826dc549-4b72-4be4-8a73-02d8f82d958e.author: Derrick Rose

e645a391-1130-49ea-9845-875fa13bd823.quote: The only journey is the one within.
e645a391-1130-49ea-9845-875fa13bd823.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

b2e27c6f-6183-43dd-90e2-f3f85d856a29.quote: A team sport is not very good for me, because I can't take losing.
b2e27c6f-6183-43dd-90e2-f3f85d856a29.author: Donovan Bailey

f6233c7b-180b-4381-a66e-27bbc8f1293b.quote: For many sports fans, the onset of fall only means one thing: It's football season!
f6233c7b-180b-4381-a66e-27bbc8f1293b.author: Marcus Samuelsson

2799e8bd-88f8-4c7b-854b-e8cc9fafd3ee.quote: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
2799e8bd-88f8-4c7b-854b-e8cc9fafd3ee.author: Kevyn Aucoin

b08b6835-2db8-44cc-828e-7e123b864cfd.quote: Who cares if your outfit is black and you're sporting a brown belt? Wear it, rock it, love it - and others will, too. Nothing beats a belt.
b08b6835-2db8-44cc-828e-7e123b864cfd.author: Rachel Nichols

30184bfe-19dd-4e52-a686-faa3ed11cc9b.quote: In response to the challenge of strangers, sport arose as a sublimated representation of a community's armed might as well as its pride of place and clan.
30184bfe-19dd-4e52-a686-faa3ed11cc9b.author: John Thorn

e44547b9-8874-4eb6-b421-ef3f8cc10541.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
e44547b9-8874-4eb6-b421-ef3f8cc10541.author: John F. Kennedy

6eb317c7-a46c-4e6b-bcce-4226d2ad5b2f.quote: Very much like that, and very much a loner, do you know and I didn't fit really into sport or all kind of group activities as a kid, I couldn't find a niche. And music was not really part of the kind of village curriculum it would, you know.
6eb317c7-a46c-4e6b-bcce-4226d2ad5b2f.author: Eric Clapton

88c2513c-8bdc-4495-82fa-bba2395d60d9.quote: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself.
88c2513c-8bdc-4495-82fa-bba2395d60d9.author: Octavia E. Butler

a1f26e50-5906-4988-acc8-6a276b849db3.quote: I am not afraid of tomorrow, for I have seen yesterday and I love today!
a1f26e50-5906-4988-acc8-6a276b849db3.author: William Allen White

2176d1e0-0ca9-41d5-b030-08cece9601c7.quote: Of course, no one wants to ban the vote. Voting should remain available for sporting and recreational purposes. But certain types of votes clearly should be curtailed - 'assault votes,' for example, in which the only purpose of the vote is to harm others.
2176d1e0-0ca9-41d5-b030-08cece9601c7.author: P. J. O'Rourke

5248112a-55ef-4cd2-982f-b0aaa10a0692.quote: Selling an electric sports car creates an opportunity to fundamentally change the way America drives.
5248112a-55ef-4cd2-982f-b0aaa10a0692.author: Elon Musk

41d7fd1c-c339-43c8-ac49-e18e9a4a8052.quote: I live by 'Go big or go home.' That's with everything. It's like either commit and go for it or don't do it at all. I apply that to everything. I apply that to relationships, I apply that to like sports, I apply that to everything. That's what I live by. That's how I like it.
41d7fd1c-c339-43c8-ac49-e18e9a4a8052.author: Paul Walker

ffc5c70a-a8ef-4399-a333-3719d54c05c1.quote: I see great things in baseball. It's our game - the American game.
ffc5c70a-a8ef-4399-a333-3719d54c05c1.author: Walt Whitman

6474e1a5-2a05-466a-b3cd-213acc1fb1b1.quote: If you watch a game, it's fun. If you play it, it's recreation. If you work at it, it's golf.
6474e1a5-2a05-466a-b3cd-213acc1fb1b1.author: Bob Hope

363e172d-c67d-4a63-b89c-5cb507ad0625.quote: I grew up in the Boys & Girls Club. That's where I really started playing all sports, and that's why I'm a big advocate for the work they do.
363e172d-c67d-4a63-b89c-5cb507ad0625.author: Frank Thomas

f3677323-4a1c-4894-a878-8d9d133fedcb.quote: There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves.
f3677323-4a1c-4894-a878-8d9d133fedcb.author: Richard Rorty

5401bb2e-35f3-4456-9c14-fc79b6c496e8.quote: You create your opportunities by asking for them.
5401bb2e-35f3-4456-9c14-fc79b6c496e8.author: Shakti Gawain

9543b501-642f-45e0-9dd7-6b46f5ce5e24.quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.
9543b501-642f-45e0-9dd7-6b46f5ce5e24.author: Corita Kent

ebfc6cf7-ed50-4569-9bc2-7cba494620f6.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
ebfc6cf7-ed50-4569-9bc2-7cba494620f6.author: Confucius

8ab9a77f-c886-4ac1-a6a1-400f9d3149d4.quote: One afternoon when I was 9, my dad told me I'd be skipping school the next day. Then we drove 12 hours from Melbourne to Sydney for the Centenary Test, a once-in-a-lifetime commemorative cricket match. It was great fun - especially for a kid who was a massive sports fan.
8ab9a77f-c886-4ac1-a6a1-400f9d3149d4.author: Hugh Jackman

e253fda4-4318-468b-9938-b224dd53b076.quote: Volleyball is a Jewish sport. It's fun, and nobody can get hurt.
e253fda4-4318-468b-9938-b224dd53b076.author: Gail Parent

e83c9896-38d6-408f-9c5b-793524de7806.quote: I have been a sports fan my whole life. To be able to talk about sports in an intelligent, journalistic fashion and to do things of a serious nature is a dream job.
e83c9896-38d6-408f-9c5b-793524de7806.author: Bryant Gumbel

79eb8e8a-d93c-431d-aa71-38bcbeb9c27f.quote: There's not a long track record of people leaving professional sports to become a software developer.
79eb8e8a-d93c-431d-aa71-38bcbeb9c27f.author: Curt Schilling

51a8f727-77a5-4ab7-9d8c-f8b6e1ac6920.quote: I love outdoor sports, like volleyball, and I play them whenever I can.
51a8f727-77a5-4ab7-9d8c-f8b6e1ac6920.author: Gisele Bundchen

e8002872-b8f8-4dc9-835e-f9a3f9b5f948.quote: I wanted to be a sportswriter because I loved sports and I could not hit the curve ball, the jump shot, or the opposing ball carrier.
e8002872-b8f8-4dc9-835e-f9a3f9b5f948.author: Dick Schaap

0d766a0f-2902-451d-8b80-028cb044e016.quote: The difference between the old ballplayer and the new ballplayer is the jersey. The old ballplayer cared about the name on the front. The new ballplayer cares about the name on the back.
0d766a0f-2902-451d-8b80-028cb044e016.author: Steve Garvey

238d7f13-8282-4dde-9b50-f8ed984e4ace.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
238d7f13-8282-4dde-9b50-f8ed984e4ace.author: Walt Disney

249b7d14-772e-427f-a312-913e5e9d2c83.quote: If a lot of people gripped a knife and fork the way they do a golf club, they'd starve to death.
249b7d14-772e-427f-a312-913e5e9d2c83.author: Sam Snead

cb83c791-0a22-4c1e-93e9-f3eac805c2c0.quote: How can I intimidate Tiger Woods? I mean, the guy's got 75 or whatever PGA Tour wins, 14 majors. He's been the biggest thing ever in our sport. How could some little 23-year-old from Northern Ireland with a few wins come up and intimidate him.
cb83c791-0a22-4c1e-93e9-f3eac805c2c0.author: Rory McIlroy

e998118b-9c55-4761-abd9-5303c2270d34.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
e998118b-9c55-4761-abd9-5303c2270d34.author: Ralph Marston

f450ebf8-c308-4b8a-9d04-b6ad7799b371.quote: The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.
f450ebf8-c308-4b8a-9d04-b6ad7799b371.author: Leo Buscaglia

b2aaca3e-a11c-4983-a31b-6344797c71d6.quote: People always accuse me of being motivational in a way, like it was a bad thing, but that's just how I was raised. My mom raised me in a positive environment, with lots of love in my heart, and that reflects in my music.
b2aaca3e-a11c-4983-a31b-6344797c71d6.author: Lenny Kravitz

2cdc7a55-b589-49d5-b52b-4b0177543a57.quote: In high school, in sport, I had a coach who told me I was much better than I thought I was, and would make me do more in a positive sense. He was the first person who taught me not to be afraid of failure.
2cdc7a55-b589-49d5-b52b-4b0177543a57.author: Mike Krzyzewski

64c8acda-98ad-4735-9011-1072818a699b.quote: Have you ever noticed what golf spells backwards?
64c8acda-98ad-4735-9011-1072818a699b.author: Al Boliska

5cb6ab7b-d0aa-4552-879b-976d7c857a94.quote: I think maybe people see bands and musicians as some sort of superhero unrealistic sport that happens in another dimension where it's not real people and not real emotions. So, I grew up listening to Beatles records on my floor. That's how I learned how to play guitar. If it weren't for them, I wouldn't be a musician.
5cb6ab7b-d0aa-4552-879b-976d7c857a94.author: Dave Grohl

00dcb52d-ed83-4069-bb84-1b364b595c89.quote: A lot of people like to think that golf is a lazy man's sport. Or it's a rich man's sport, or it's a sport that they can't be involved in.
00dcb52d-ed83-4069-bb84-1b364b595c89.author: Shia LaBeouf

e92c9c1d-5333-438f-a697-5ecc5ffa996f.quote: The NFL is such a large, multibillion dollar enterprise with fan loyalty because they have provided not only entertainment for sports fans, but memories, good memories, family memories to these fans, that can only bring about good will.
e92c9c1d-5333-438f-a697-5ecc5ffa996f.author: Wendell Pierce

f747f14d-1ab3-4f41-bebe-8ea43d768f8c.quote: There was no money in the sport but we'd be out there day in, day out, rain or shine, doing it.
f747f14d-1ab3-4f41-bebe-8ea43d768f8c.author: Linford Christie

14e2f3f4-e807-41b3-b048-1db11f0eece2.quote: It was not long before I was struck with the idea that base ball was just the game for a national sport for Americans.
14e2f3f4-e807-41b3-b048-1db11f0eece2.author: Henry Chadwick

6c64d58c-ab23-4d28-87d1-7d708a2aa3e1.quote: I try not to put anything political on the forefront of what I'm trying to do creatively. At the same time, I do think it's wonderful when I hear people say that it's inspirational that I'm an Indian woman on camera. My life is very diverse, and my friends are a diverse group of people.
6c64d58c-ab23-4d28-87d1-7d708a2aa3e1.author: Mindy Kaling

55bac55f-109b-4aff-8cb5-97a7de56e230.quote: I have a Stella McCartney Adidas sports bra. I feel like I'm totally comfortable running. No problem. I have support where I need it.
55bac55f-109b-4aff-8cb5-97a7de56e230.author: Pamela Anderson

9d0ded93-f237-4322-926d-df23bc21a5a0.quote: I think girls have a harder time than guys do if you're switching schools. Guys don't get picked on as long as you're OK in sports.
9d0ded93-f237-4322-926d-df23bc21a5a0.author: Pierce Brown

f552db9c-f209-410f-a7b2-b8e66608c74e.quote: But sports carried me away from being in a gang, or being associated with drugs. Sports was my way out.
f552db9c-f209-410f-a7b2-b8e66608c74e.author: LeBron James

56c0748e-c00e-4010-bd73-7d50a1c76a76.quote: 'Madden' is all about speed, and the Falcons have it on both sides of the ball. I love playing sports games. I played my PlayStation so much, I pretty much wore it out.
56c0748e-c00e-4010-bd73-7d50a1c76a76.author: Carl Crawford

8359c201-3266-4497-af45-15859884853e.quote: Pumping iron is not what it used to be. It doesn't have the personality it used to. When we started out, people who worked out had nothing. Now there is so much money involved; back then it was the love of the sport. We appreciated what we have. Today it's not the same.
8359c201-3266-4497-af45-15859884853e.author: Lou Ferrigno

ddb6b1da-c949-4b2c-a098-b8e5e5e9c1c3.quote: In sports teams, apart from talk of sporting prowess and the imparting of inspirational thought, an extraordinary amount of time is spent discussing, and flaunting, material possessions.
ddb6b1da-c949-4b2c-a098-b8e5e5e9c1c3.author: Harsha Bhogle

ffb69e23-d7c4-4067-9ff8-1cafceec3174.quote: Baseball may be our national pastime, but the age-old tradition of taking a swing at Congress is a sport with even deeper historical roots in the American experience. Since the founding of our country, citizens from Ben Franklin to David Letterman have made fun of their elected officials.
ffb69e23-d7c4-4067-9ff8-1cafceec3174.author: Evan Bayh

0f7f19c0-014a-47c2-8f1f-5299fb99099c.quote: I know I am getting better at golf because I am hitting fewer spectators.
0f7f19c0-014a-47c2-8f1f-5299fb99099c.author: Gerald R. Ford

ac07086b-b59b-41c8-8ddf-8c6c9d5bfeb6.quote: It is only in sorrow bad weather masters us; in joy we face the storm and defy it.
ac07086b-b59b-41c8-8ddf-8c6c9d5bfeb6.author: Amelia Barr

83de1d25-29c8-4b8b-b9a3-aa725d19ad0a.quote: I went to Dartmouth College, graduated, and had the opportunity to play two professional sports - I played for the New England Patriots in the NFL and professional lacrosse for the Boston Blazers. I had an injury, so I had to stop so I could heal. But when I was playing football, I wasn't making a lot of money; I wasn't a superstar.
83de1d25-29c8-4b8b-b9a3-aa725d19ad0a.author: Brian J. White

cc6c8149-541a-4540-b245-c505d1070c15.quote: Being nerdy just means being passionate about something, including everyone - the coolest people on Earth are passionate and therefore nerdy about something whatever it is, whether it's sports, or gaming, or technology, or fashion, or beauty, or food, or whatever.
cc6c8149-541a-4540-b245-c505d1070c15.author: Zachary Levi

3cb012c8-5f7f-48f0-866d-2c8ca890f2d3.quote: You may love football, but that doesn't mean you have any business trying to play the sport. It's the same thing with filmmaking... everybody has a great idea for a movie, but do you have the stamina to get good at your craft and deal with how heartbreaking it is?
3cb012c8-5f7f-48f0-866d-2c8ca890f2d3.author: Adam Green

a926f0d9-65ff-44ff-bd7d-a8f30e68743d.quote: You will never have great tennis champions from England because of the cold and dark, but most of all because people only care about the sport for two weeks a year, and then they're on to something else. There's just not a great love of the sport there.
a926f0d9-65ff-44ff-bd7d-a8f30e68743d.author: Monica Seles

712ea425-95d5-4f0f-92b5-033e7f0a9dce.quote: From its brilliancy everything is illuminated.
712ea425-95d5-4f0f-92b5-033e7f0a9dce.author: Guru Nanak

d4ffb24d-2fd1-4766-ade0-11c275b2bda3.quote: My concentration level blocks out everything. Concentration is why some athletes are better than others. You develop that concentration in training and concentrate in a meet.
d4ffb24d-2fd1-4766-ade0-11c275b2bda3.author: Edwin Moses

9623030a-3635-4ff0-ae36-fbfc6d8d6f34.quote: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.
9623030a-3635-4ff0-ae36-fbfc6d8d6f34.author: Brian Tracy

60a2c20e-807c-4d8b-bb08-c472c5782e92.quote: Photography is a demanding action sport. The light can change so quickly. I often find myself sprinting so that I can catch the perfect light falling on a photogenic subject.
60a2c20e-807c-4d8b-bb08-c472c5782e92.author: Steven Pinker

30af901b-600e-4b0c-a7d0-b12f16fff5ca.quote: Eventually you won't think of 'the Internet business.' You'll think of it more like news, weather, sports, but even that taxonomy isn't clear.
30af901b-600e-4b0c-a7d0-b12f16fff5ca.author: Bill Gates

e27df2bd-c52d-4dfa-a3eb-b67dbea9a099.quote: I was showing early symptoms of becoming a professional baseball man. I was lying to the press.
e27df2bd-c52d-4dfa-a3eb-b67dbea9a099.author: Roger Kahn

44c3d5de-1ac5-4741-a50a-5ac6af512368.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
44c3d5de-1ac5-4741-a50a-5ac6af512368.author: Joseph Campbell

ad78b4c7-0ba9-4d59-9e3d-1066e60778c7.quote: I love sports. I love animals. I love kids. I want to save the world. So how do I combine all those things? I don't know.
ad78b4c7-0ba9-4d59-9e3d-1066e60778c7.author: Joan Jett

f7acabef-7136-45c6-9a04-20b11779ec79.quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
f7acabef-7136-45c6-9a04-20b11779ec79.author: Buddha

e9051b55-6e75-4dd8-8627-757d91570890.quote: We live in a world where finding fault in others seems to be the favorite blood sport. It has long been the basis of political campaign strategy. It is the theme of much television programming across the world. It sells newspapers. Whenever we meet anyone, our first, almost unconscious reaction may be to look for imperfections.
e9051b55-6e75-4dd8-8627-757d91570890.author: Henry B. Eyring

f01855cc-2f22-4e1f-b932-4850486b28b3.quote: Giving back, doing motivational speeches and stuff like that, that's always made me feel good. If you repeatedly go out there, and you are the change that you want to see, then that's what you are.
f01855cc-2f22-4e1f-b932-4850486b28b3.author: Keke Palmer

0976e551-5325-41d6-842c-e05a22d93304.quote: I grew up very much in a sporting background. I always wanted to be an actor, but my escapism always came in sports.
0976e551-5325-41d6-842c-e05a22d93304.author: Bradley James

dcb9cf05-4621-439d-a78f-d398db3117a0.quote: Football is only once a week. NASCAR is once a week. Those sports are insanely popular. Horse racing is oversaturated. Unless tracks cut back to three days a week of full fields, a lot of people will really hurt down the road. Horse racing, to survive, has to go to that. Let's face it: Churchill Downs only does well on Derby Week.
dcb9cf05-4621-439d-a78f-d398db3117a0.author: Rick Pitino

8e8130b0-2940-4703-9f72-e80e20a7cc52.quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
8e8130b0-2940-4703-9f72-e80e20a7cc52.author: Rabindranath Tagore

5589a3d7-41d5-459f-b03f-14adaa0afe83.quote: My main idea was to create a sports facility for the basics. This is why I established the club.
5589a3d7-41d5-459f-b03f-14adaa0afe83.author: Sergei Bubka

b3f93e8c-8262-447c-a3fd-a8bc93c7e877.quote: As a youngster, I enjoyed sport and my ambition was to be a great sportsman.
b3f93e8c-8262-447c-a3fd-a8bc93c7e877.author: Lynn Davies

822d8c82-e6dd-4467-be59-039ca8253ebf.quote: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
822d8c82-e6dd-4467-be59-039ca8253ebf.author: William Arthur Ward

9ea7d157-02a3-44c5-b5f4-720898d1bb90.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
9ea7d157-02a3-44c5-b5f4-720898d1bb90.author: Winston Churchill

e9e77fb4-a374-4240-8145-02fe36e9d7e8.quote: The government will see that human spaceflight is useful - for science and the economy - and inspirational.
e9e77fb4-a374-4240-8145-02fe36e9d7e8.author: Helen Sharman

a4c544fe-2ae1-4f89-8b48-2ae4a586313a.quote: The bell that tolls for all in boxing belongs to a cash register.
a4c544fe-2ae1-4f89-8b48-2ae4a586313a.author: Bob Verdi

adc52780-ee4d-4935-a7e1-ea8f896dd48a.quote: Whatever ought to be, can be.
adc52780-ee4d-4935-a7e1-ea8f896dd48a.author: James Rouse

78f43fd2-530d-4e92-b1a2-7e1e81f4a346.quote: The ideal life is in our blood and never will be still.
78f43fd2-530d-4e92-b1a2-7e1e81f4a346.author: Phillips Brooks

61c07821-c9ae-4e39-8ed2-5b3238ccc091.quote: Keep all special thoughts and memories for lifetimes to come. Share these keepsakes with others to inspire hope and build from the past, which can bridge to the future.
61c07821-c9ae-4e39-8ed2-5b3238ccc091.author: Mattie Stepanek

6eb64c83-8760-461d-97f8-93738baafb87.quote: Honestly, I don't listen to nobody else's music but my own. It's kind of like sports to me. You don't see Kobe Bryant at a LeBron James game - he just works on his own game. And that's what I do. I only listen to me, so I can criticize and analyze and all those things.
6eb64c83-8760-461d-97f8-93738baafb87.author: Lil Wayne

1deb42d3-ed8b-481e-a0cb-8ba36da4880b.quote: The leaders who we admire who have been able to bring great change in the past - Gandhi, Martin Luther King, Nelson Mandela - they're all inspirational religious leaders and smart tacticians. It would be nice to find the Muslim Gandhi, wouldn't it?
1deb42d3-ed8b-481e-a0cb-8ba36da4880b.author: Dennis C. Blair

13b0af61-807d-45e3-9fcf-154ddb27cf89.quote: I'm a football fan, a sports fan, a fan of competition.
13b0af61-807d-45e3-9fcf-154ddb27cf89.author: Matthew McConaughey

f262f1e7-e66b-4ea7-b73b-0548fbc93e5a.quote: I think if there's something one needs to change with oneself, it doesn't have to happen in the New Year. You can do that any time you please - not that it's not a good inspirational tactic for the people that it works for.
f262f1e7-e66b-4ea7-b73b-0548fbc93e5a.author: Brittany Murphy

5e7b09db-0489-4518-8037-55b8602d8e4a.quote: I'm really into extreme sports and just having fun.
5e7b09db-0489-4518-8037-55b8602d8e4a.author: Kellan Lutz

a7772db6-42f8-46e6-b6a5-eaf3f6898f7a.quote: I thought 'Moulin Rouge' was inspirational, and 'Jesus Christ Superstar' I loved.
a7772db6-42f8-46e6-b6a5-eaf3f6898f7a.author: Pierce Brosnan

34b7d618-7f2d-4293-aec8-66f4621d830b.quote: Pro football is like nuclear warfare. There are no winners, only survivors.
34b7d618-7f2d-4293-aec8-66f4621d830b.author: Frank Gifford

b21ab24a-7735-49df-8cba-0d9f3572d9fc.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
b21ab24a-7735-49df-8cba-0d9f3572d9fc.author: C. S. Lewis

69c55b60-4d9c-4b9b-b0a3-d19af20b458a.quote: I don't ride a sport bike. If I'm riding a sport bike and trying to do tricks, and going 200 miles down the highway, that's probably pretty stupid. But when you're riding a Harley or a chopper, and you're riding with a group of people and you're not on the highway and you're cruising, you're relaxing.
69c55b60-4d9c-4b9b-b0a3-d19af20b458a.author: Ben Roethlisberger

f04a5a78-e416-4bed-8d81-1ce4d4bbc591.quote: You know that a given in life in human nature, is that at a sporting event, a baseball game, a football game, you never introduce a politician, is because he'll be booed. I don't care if he's the most beloved person in the world, its part of the game.
f04a5a78-e416-4bed-8d81-1ce4d4bbc591.author: Mark Russell

3d16663a-f2c2-4953-85a2-0234600a4cb5.quote: Through the years I have received my share of recognition for efforts in the fields of sports, the arts, the struggle for full citizenship for the Negro people, labor's rights and the fight for peace.
3d16663a-f2c2-4953-85a2-0234600a4cb5.author: Paul Robeson

7865e4ae-2fdc-4b1e-bb64-c93c30c4e7a3.quote: Sport was an integral part of school life. The most influential teachers were not necessarily the PE teachers, but the teachers who helped me in sport because they had an understanding of what you were going through.
7865e4ae-2fdc-4b1e-bb64-c93c30c4e7a3.author: Sebastian Coe

352c23ee-f5f8-4203-bcaf-4b8f868492dd.quote: If you think you can do it, you can.
352c23ee-f5f8-4203-bcaf-4b8f868492dd.author: John Burroughs

aa3063be-9cbc-4552-896e-748417eaefae.quote: It is almost impossible to remember how tragic a place the world is when one is playing golf.
aa3063be-9cbc-4552-896e-748417eaefae.author: Robert Wilson Lynd

d0b3d655-98a8-4d8c-b10c-01e2a1149c7c.quote: Teachers need to be more inspirational. But it's also up to engineering to make itself more interesting.
d0b3d655-98a8-4d8c-b10c-01e2a1149c7c.author: Bruce Dickinson

a4758108-266e-49f3-bda6-02fa4e540686.quote: I don't follow sports that much now, but I was a Phoenix Suns fanatic in the early '90s.
a4758108-266e-49f3-bda6-02fa4e540686.author: Jesse Eisenberg

c93a2997-75f3-4667-8a57-e05d24c68656.quote: Sometimes people say that coach is a winner, but everyone wants to win. You must know how to behave in victory and in defeat, to look after what is our sport, football.
c93a2997-75f3-4667-8a57-e05d24c68656.author: Vicente del Bosque

5fe7128c-fba4-406d-a3f0-524a9c5b4dd1.quote: During my childhood, I played just about every sport imaginable, which became less feasible at Juilliard... Although I remember our annual dodge-ball game as a highlight. The Juilliard 'Fighting Penguins' are a force to be reckoned with.
5fe7128c-fba4-406d-a3f0-524a9c5b4dd1.author: Seth Numrich

70f7c439-13f8-4d37-a370-39c9b902ea7c.quote: I went to a fight the other night, and a hockey game broke out.
70f7c439-13f8-4d37-a370-39c9b902ea7c.author: Rodney Dangerfield

e7b17547-0963-4641-9388-e776b5dd5389.quote: Sporting competitions seem to be what we obsess over, frankly. So if we can put engineering, science, technology into a format of healthy, fun competition, we can attract all sorts of kids that might not see the kind of activity we do as accessible or rewarding.
e7b17547-0963-4641-9388-e776b5dd5389.author: Dean Kamen

ea9864a9-86c8-4428-bee3-ac3cb2e8b748.quote: Coming to Nashville has been so motivating and inspirational. Just watching people live and breathe their music and create something that they can feel from start to finish.
ea9864a9-86c8-4428-bee3-ac3cb2e8b748.author: Madi Diaz

315fcad4-cd3d-4424-a120-08e46d3c6735.quote: There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!
315fcad4-cd3d-4424-a120-08e46d3c6735.author: Edgar Cayce

8e45e99c-eeae-40f4-98c9-a453115af390.quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
8e45e99c-eeae-40f4-98c9-a453115af390.author: Rabindranath Tagore

af115925-3127-4a83-a33d-ded7e47ab9bf.quote: I am addicted to sport. Without sport, I feel bad.
af115925-3127-4a83-a33d-ded7e47ab9bf.author: Mikhail Prokhorov

b29ee09c-39ba-400a-a11c-89d58995258b.quote: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.
b29ee09c-39ba-400a-a11c-89d58995258b.author: William James

76a5c2e0-ca48-440a-ada5-813e789b1ef8.quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
76a5c2e0-ca48-440a-ada5-813e789b1ef8.author: Bradley Whitford

8d8629a4-35c3-4be9-86bf-1eb23dc74827.quote: If you look at a building by Mies van der Rohe, it might look very simple, but up close, the sheer quality of construction, materials and thought are inspirational.
8d8629a4-35c3-4be9-86bf-1eb23dc74827.author: David Chipperfield

142d075a-975d-4820-becf-3a42dba8e0b3.quote: From my tribe I take nothing, I am the maker of my own fortune.
142d075a-975d-4820-becf-3a42dba8e0b3.author: Tecumseh

a33c4d17-0f9b-42e3-a744-bca0c6204903.quote: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.
a33c4d17-0f9b-42e3-a744-bca0c6204903.author: Jim Rohn

ee32bf70-ac6f-4e02-ac2b-0e23eaf2f028.quote: I get asked this a lot: Why has soccer not succeeded? My answer is, soccer has succeeded. It is already the fastest growing youth participation sport in the U.S. It has already succeeded at the youth level, no question.
ee32bf70-ac6f-4e02-ac2b-0e23eaf2f028.author: Lamar Hunt

13879a66-1c75-4b30-a676-8dc7106047e0.quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.
13879a66-1c75-4b30-a676-8dc7106047e0.author: Desmond Tutu

9e452349-a898-4b0f-8940-f37a2583280c.quote: Fishing is much more than fish. It is the great occasion when we may return to the fine simplicity of our forefathers.
9e452349-a898-4b0f-8940-f37a2583280c.author: Herbert Hoover

49198c67-5082-455d-86ec-442330763a7c.quote: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.
49198c67-5082-455d-86ec-442330763a7c.author: Khalil Gibran

28a13e05-5eb6-4151-8927-5241d554b2c6.quote: I have a 16 year-old son, so I'm now a soccer mom. I stand on the sidelines and I hear the things parents are saying, so I want them to understand what it is their kids are feeling in any sports environment.
28a13e05-5eb6-4151-8927-5241d554b2c6.author: Brandi Chastain

58ec2783-09fc-490a-a332-c86dec09cc2a.quote: If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud.
58ec2783-09fc-490a-a332-c86dec09cc2a.author: Emile Zola

8b7b8ced-a524-4ada-b194-dc1798d3d1cb.quote: As parents, we need to send our kids back to 'old-fashioned' outdoor summer camps, which have been on the decline as the demand for sports and academics-based camps has risen. We need to fight budget cuts to public parks programs and resist closures of public swimming pools and playgrounds.
8b7b8ced-a524-4ada-b194-dc1798d3d1cb.author: Darell Hammond

fda99a5d-a563-457a-87c2-6c61135e7da5.quote: The game of basketball has been everything to me. My place of refuge, place I've always gone where I needed comfort and peace. It's been the site of intense pain and the most intense feelings of joy and satisfaction. It's a relationship that has evolved over time, given me the greatest respect and love for the game.
fda99a5d-a563-457a-87c2-6c61135e7da5.author: Michael Jordan

ca1a2e46-482b-47f0-b7eb-f68c9d761155.quote: It's a round ball and a round bat, and you got to hit it square.
ca1a2e46-482b-47f0-b7eb-f68c9d761155.author: Pete Rose

9f9a69e8-585f-4cc9-9999-1643e639a1d7.quote: Racial distinctions should not play a role in sport.
9f9a69e8-585f-4cc9-9999-1643e639a1d7.author: Pierre de Coubertin

905cd14d-6bce-4d6a-b08f-c047f4b172ed.quote: I don't think there is anything wrong in earning money from the sport you love. If you work hard and get benefits from it, there is no harm. The day you feel that you are not working hard and are only looking at the benefits, that's where the problem is.
905cd14d-6bce-4d6a-b08f-c047f4b172ed.author: Virat Kohli

3127ce33-4337-430a-bb6d-b8ede3d5e197.quote: For guys playing sports at a high level, for money, I can't put my finger on it, but in a man's world of sport, there is something visceral to beating another man.
3127ce33-4337-430a-bb6d-b8ede3d5e197.author: Kurt Russell

1ef0c2f1-c1c2-40e1-8e09-88d6397b2511.quote: I think if you go from show to show without doing that big PR blitz it's helpful because people can get pretty sick of your face if you're just out there all the time. And keep a low profile, hold in your stomach and be a good sport.
1ef0c2f1-c1c2-40e1-8e09-88d6397b2511.author: Jane Curtin

c1abc2cc-e294-4695-8abb-ad6aef955a27.quote: There is a loftier ambition than merely to stand high in the world. It is to stoop down and lift mankind a little higher.
c1abc2cc-e294-4695-8abb-ad6aef955a27.author: Henry Van Dyke

03cdae37-e2a2-4e37-94d9-3b77ba02dba2.quote: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
03cdae37-e2a2-4e37-94d9-3b77ba02dba2.author: Ken Venturi

31138145-0da2-49ac-8746-701149460b73.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
31138145-0da2-49ac-8746-701149460b73.author: Francis of Assisi

7c96f3e6-68ee-4aac-8de4-64af0a2ea7ec.quote: The world of extreme sports is also one of big business. Kids might think that snowboarding is the ultimate freedom, but this freedom is being marketed to them by commercial sponsors.
7c96f3e6-68ee-4aac-8de4-64af0a2ea7ec.author: Lucy Walker

f089ddb1-db81-494e-85dc-d5e35d20178c.quote: Basketball is my favorite sport, and I'm also a very passionate football fan.
f089ddb1-db81-494e-85dc-d5e35d20178c.author: Abhishek Bachchan

9b4b03ac-2b4f-40b2-a671-72bb0287fc26.quote: Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
9b4b03ac-2b4f-40b2-a671-72bb0287fc26.author: Phillips Brooks

69f68920-6faa-48a2-98c9-80d4b5a4eea5.quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than a hundred teaching it.
69f68920-6faa-48a2-98c9-80d4b5a4eea5.author: Knute Rockne

428d17dc-306e-4b98-bd5b-9a920adbe7d1.quote: Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howl.
428d17dc-306e-4b98-bd5b-9a920adbe7d1.author: Benjamin Jowett

69cd8654-b425-435e-b7f8-c79c7b826173.quote: There's nothing masculine about being competitive. There's nothing masculine about trying to be the best at everything you do, nor is there anything wrong with it. I don't know why a female athlete has to defend her femininity just because she chooses to play sports.
69cd8654-b425-435e-b7f8-c79c7b826173.author: Rebecca Lobo

3bf5f63f-0194-4ed8-938d-3efb39b07f44.quote: The sports apparel industry was dominated by the big shoe companies. But there was a void in apparel and I decided to fill it.
3bf5f63f-0194-4ed8-938d-3efb39b07f44.author: Kevin Plank

07a4fd38-0e5c-4d74-a504-16793b441da0.quote: The mind is absolutely instrumental in achieving results, even for athletes. Sports psychology is a very small part, but it's extremely important when you're winning and losing races by hundredths and even thousandths of a second.
07a4fd38-0e5c-4d74-a504-16793b441da0.author: Michael Johnson

5b3bc497-9045-442f-b5ea-5b7023ef8ff4.quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
5b3bc497-9045-442f-b5ea-5b7023ef8ff4.author: Plato

8cfbb703-1e13-4370-b6df-db003533d047.quote: I was never a pretty girl, so I wasn't the one to get the boy. I used to cast myself as a good sport. Sometimes I wonder if I do that too much with roles I play, because if I'm absolutely truthful, I quite like being the best friend, or the supporting role, and actually I ought to gear-change and make myself the leading role.
8cfbb703-1e13-4370-b6df-db003533d047.author: Celia Imrie

d70bdd53-94e7-40fb-b08a-ec3c15440a87.quote: Any time Detroit scores more than 100 points and holds the other team below 100 points they almost always win.
d70bdd53-94e7-40fb-b08a-ec3c15440a87.author: Doug Collins

be48eaa5-7625-48bb-81c2-fdc2d1a60b0f.quote: You always get a special kick on opening day, no matter how many you go through. You look forward to it like a birthday party when you're a kid. You think something wonderful is going to happen.
be48eaa5-7625-48bb-81c2-fdc2d1a60b0f.author: Joe DiMaggio

31429fab-b75e-4dde-a55e-3b753da015d7.quote: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life: Overcome fear, behold wonder.
31429fab-b75e-4dde-a55e-3b753da015d7.author: Richard Bach

b8a807ee-0fdb-425c-8d9e-fb66fc949a5a.quote: If I had a personal wish for the new ideas in this new book it would be that every parent, every counselor, every teacher, every professor, every sports coach that deals with young people would understand the three circle concept.
b8a807ee-0fdb-425c-8d9e-fb66fc949a5a.author: James Collins

3ab4d872-fd3a-4163-8f02-5ad3badc5c41.quote: When I was first writing, I was writing mostly about sporting events, which was really what my assignments were. I was working on the Tour de France bike race and the Barcelona Olympic Games, and those songs tend to be very big, very bombastic-type music, which is the type of music that I love to write.
3ab4d872-fd3a-4163-8f02-5ad3badc5c41.author: John Tesh

8792497a-d26e-4af9-8e49-86eebd4657c8.quote: The thing I love about diving is the flowing feeling. I like a sport where the whole point is to move as little as humanly possible so your air supply will last longer. That's my kind of sport. Where the amount of effort spent is absolutely minimal.
8792497a-d26e-4af9-8e49-86eebd4657c8.author: Linus Torvalds

70ee1323-bba0-4b46-bf4a-8acf6cf9dd1e.quote: I have always liked running, so it wasn't particularly difficult to make it a habit. All you need is a pair of running shoes and you can do it anywhere. It does not require anybody to do it with, and so I found the sport perfectly fits me as a person who tends to be independent and individualistic.
70ee1323-bba0-4b46-bf4a-8acf6cf9dd1e.author: Haruki Murakami

3f135170-e46d-4bb7-9a45-c233d85215d8.quote: Sports do not build character. They reveal it.
3f135170-e46d-4bb7-9a45-c233d85215d8.author: Heywood Broun

b55042c0-e716-48d5-9761-30cbab952717.quote: I don't feel right unless I have a sport to play or at least a way to work up a sweat.
b55042c0-e716-48d5-9761-30cbab952717.author: Hank Aaron

63628c56-8842-49bb-8955-73b327ef62ea.quote: My father-in-law and I always had great interest in Indian sport. At the Athens Olympics, watching the wrestling event, we started discussing the state of Indian sport - inadequate representation, lack of satisfactory results etc. We thought we should do something about it.
63628c56-8842-49bb-8955-73b327ef62ea.author: Amit Bhatia

0e230eb4-d699-4192-9974-a1e7c7fa27ab.quote: My sports were team sports: ice hockey and baseball. The whole team dynamic is similar in business. Leadership is earned - the captain earns that role; it's not because he's the coach's son. These are all things we know, but in today's world, it's not a bad idea to remind ourselves.
0e230eb4-d699-4192-9974-a1e7c7fa27ab.author: James McNerney

8dcf9016-5aac-4f31-8d82-ee538a030853.quote: What I love most about animation is, it's a team sport, and everything we do is about pure imagination.
8dcf9016-5aac-4f31-8d82-ee538a030853.author: Jeffrey Katzenberg

bb12448b-1f90-4ace-970f-70f85faa53bd.quote: We've finally told the world that this is sports entertainment, and I think one of the best forms of entertainment is anything that's fun or funny, something that you really enjoy watching or listening to.
bb12448b-1f90-4ace-970f-70f85faa53bd.author: Jerry Lawler

6d265e42-09e7-4363-8b1f-ce961376635d.quote: Sport is part of every man and woman's heritage and its absence can never be compensated for.
6d265e42-09e7-4363-8b1f-ce961376635d.author: Pierre de Coubertin

91066016-bb64-4dfa-bbb8-59e163c3583b.quote: Many baseball fans look upon an umpire as a sort of necessary evil to the luxury of baseball, like the odor that follows an automobile.
91066016-bb64-4dfa-bbb8-59e163c3583b.author: Christy Mathewson

dd953d2e-8a48-4264-8926-24f426368691.quote: February is always a bad month for TV sports. Football is gone, basketball is plodding along in the annual midseason doldrums, and baseball is not even mentioned.
dd953d2e-8a48-4264-8926-24f426368691.author: Hunter S. Thompson

3288b932-8f9d-482b-9b9f-34e835cf88ef.quote: Now, I know you expected me to say that, well, I just kick back in the rocking chair, fished a little bit, listened to Willie Nelson tapes and watched old baseball games on the Classic Sports network. And, tell you the truth, I have done that for maybe about five total minutes.
3288b932-8f9d-482b-9b9f-34e835cf88ef.author: Dan Rather

3cada836-5e20-4f3e-95b6-7708a8b1d15d.quote: As people are walking all the time, in the same spot, a path appears.
3cada836-5e20-4f3e-95b6-7708a8b1d15d.author: John Locke

8cbe2fa4-a05d-4d63-ac5e-410dabf6e2c1.quote: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
8cbe2fa4-a05d-4d63-ac5e-410dabf6e2c1.author: George Herbert

fbc5fcc2-a36d-4397-b64d-ffad4078d5b0.quote: I'm not into extreme sports or something. I just live a quiet life.
fbc5fcc2-a36d-4397-b64d-ffad4078d5b0.author: Charlie Kaufman

509c7358-4d68-41f6-9be1-8d6f6ed8e3f6.quote: Wrestling is a team sport, and an individual sport all rolled into one.
509c7358-4d68-41f6-9be1-8d6f6ed8e3f6.author: William Baldwin

0655c5b1-5dbf-4f75-968d-6560b5c72365.quote: If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it.
0655c5b1-5dbf-4f75-968d-6560b5c72365.author: Lucy Larcom

b952d180-a483-42c8-b6f3-88d86954f56b.quote: In sports... you play from the time you're eight years old, and then you're done forever.
b952d180-a483-42c8-b6f3-88d86954f56b.author: Joe Montana

434d3c6b-c0dc-4922-a075-16e01fdf844c.quote: A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be.
434d3c6b-c0dc-4922-a075-16e01fdf844c.author: Wayne Gretzky

c580f604-e7bc-4c05-ba77-a0a352864a16.quote: The airline business is the biggest team sport in the world. When you're all consumed with fighting among yourselves, your opponents can run over you every day.
c580f604-e7bc-4c05-ba77-a0a352864a16.author: Gordon Bethune

4bff1f28-b46e-406f-864a-d2430486c6b7.quote: Sports is a metaphor for overcoming obstacles and achieving against great odds. Athletes, in times of difficulty, can be important role models.
4bff1f28-b46e-406f-864a-d2430486c6b7.author: Bill Bradley

d048a99d-0790-436b-b35d-bf405eb0a145.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
d048a99d-0790-436b-b35d-bf405eb0a145.author: Milton Berle

76cf5306-7f57-41d2-95a3-3af23f771309.quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
76cf5306-7f57-41d2-95a3-3af23f771309.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

8cd38329-ed54-4100-93f6-33be12ba8dbf.quote: Traditionally, Seattle has been a great sports town and great football town. What the Huskies have achieved over the years has been pretty amazing. That's how I got my first taste of football - when I went with my father to Husky Stadium.
8cd38329-ed54-4100-93f6-33be12ba8dbf.author: Paul Allen

5f4d9202-4378-4b0c-9eff-2879da8047b1.quote: Maybe because I am from a sports background, I don't give up easily. I am a fighter.
5f4d9202-4378-4b0c-9eff-2879da8047b1.author: Deepika Padukone

06b908c1-87cc-4978-8124-1258355df0f6.quote: Even from their infancy we frame them to the sports of love: their instruction, behavior, attire, grace, learning and all their words azimuth only at love, respects only affection. Their nurses and their keepers imprint no other thing in them.
06b908c1-87cc-4978-8124-1258355df0f6.author: Michel de Montaigne

fdfe9cc8-d518-47ed-808a-937ee7f62b3a.quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
fdfe9cc8-d518-47ed-808a-937ee7f62b3a.author: Edith Wharton

702db9b5-a319-4679-9a48-cc671d902e75.quote: Lady Gaga is the present and the future. She is the most revolutionary and inspirational artist. She is fearless and daring.
702db9b5-a319-4679-9a48-cc671d902e75.author: Donatella Versace

fc98b610-f39a-47c7-bfd2-e63ecc839ed3.quote: For me, drawing was an outlet. No one in school said, 'Oh, she can do sports,' or, 'She's pretty,' but I could draw.
fc98b610-f39a-47c7-bfd2-e63ecc839ed3.author: Roz Chast

8990c062-7931-42a5-b607-c90a790e41c8.quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
8990c062-7931-42a5-b607-c90a790e41c8.author: Julie Andrews

9f41998d-0972-41ad-9746-eebff13d5bbd.quote: Oh, this absolute loneliness and the game - loving to play the game, loving to go and tell stories to men that certainly weren't true, just for the sport of it, just to see how they would react.
9f41998d-0972-41ad-9746-eebff13d5bbd.author: Jennifer Beals

d3185363-29ed-484a-92ea-5f25a9f46033.quote: What's unfortunate about buying a pitcher for $12 million is that he carries no warranty.
d3185363-29ed-484a-92ea-5f25a9f46033.author: Bob Verdi

b3e261cd-4b4c-4cda-9e86-d696d67ca824.quote: Even though people involved in racing think that it has a big sporting stage, it is a minority sport compared to some of the other high-profile events: football, Formula One or golf.
b3e261cd-4b4c-4cda-9e86-d696d67ca824.author: Tony McCoy

107224d1-02a8-4bd9-b46f-231571980896.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
107224d1-02a8-4bd9-b46f-231571980896.author: Zig Ziglar

3219e57b-327e-4d7b-bbb0-2105ed6583aa.quote: This CD became something of a personal journey for me. The tone of the whole CD is uplifting and inspirational. It's an upper. We have enough downers in the world.
3219e57b-327e-4d7b-bbb0-2105ed6583aa.author: Roma Downey

8a0906b2-1be3-436e-8a77-012687496b3f.quote: In skating or any amateur sport, as athletes we share something in common: the cost of training is quite a burden on our parents or on the athletes themselves trying to find a way to pay for their costs.
8a0906b2-1be3-436e-8a77-012687496b3f.author: Patrick Chan

ec1a8fea-6ce2-4f89-b521-b2d2f8a687c7.quote: I think it is easier for thinner people to build on a frame once you get lean muscle. I get bored lifting weights at the gym, and it isn't enough as your body becomes stiff. So I train in different ways such as core training, cardio with weights, playing sports such as tennis, cycling, swimming and running 10 km once a week.
ec1a8fea-6ce2-4f89-b521-b2d2f8a687c7.author: Arjun Rampal

e0eef1fd-6892-4a29-9f82-1a7026ec357e.quote: I've told Billy if I ever caught him cheating, I wouldn't kill him because I love his children and they need a dad. But I would beat him up. I know where all of his sports injuries are.
e0eef1fd-6892-4a29-9f82-1a7026ec357e.author: Angelina Jolie

ea4efe3c-952e-4fb6-be16-ef17a776b6b1.quote: I didn't grow up a theatre kid, going to theatre camps. I played sports, and that was my main direction. But luckily, I never had to choose between sports and theatre.
ea4efe3c-952e-4fb6-be16-ef17a776b6b1.author: Aaron Tveit

795af234-0922-4a0a-873a-6275a2857d19.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
795af234-0922-4a0a-873a-6275a2857d19.author: Confucius

c0b0bd75-4413-4a3e-aa80-f063751597bb.quote: I like playing sport. I'm a bit of a design enthusiast, and like spending time with my girlfriend and mates.
c0b0bd75-4413-4a3e-aa80-f063751597bb.author: Nick D'Aloisio

acc24bff-0f54-4512-9e34-51a8a7fd4aa2.quote: I really believe that everyone has a talent, ability, or skill that he can mine to support himself and to succeed in life.
acc24bff-0f54-4512-9e34-51a8a7fd4aa2.author: Dean Koontz

8918b9c5-3849-41ce-a9b0-7aaa0c06fd52.quote: 85% of all video we watch is pre-recorded, so you can set your system to download it all the time. You're still going to need live television for certain things - like news, sporting events and emergencies - but increasingly it is going to be almost like the iPod, where you download content to look at later.
8918b9c5-3849-41ce-a9b0-7aaa0c06fd52.author: Vint Cerf

cd42ebf5-4dca-49aa-b335-b1865914a647.quote: Baseball happens to be a game of cumulative tension but football, basketball and hockey are played with hand grenades and machine guns.
cd42ebf5-4dca-49aa-b335-b1865914a647.author: John Leonard

4628e1e2-66fa-460e-8b5b-41f1d41601f1.quote: I'm glad you're doing this story on us and not on the WNBA. We're so much prettier than all the other women in sports.
4628e1e2-66fa-460e-8b5b-41f1d41601f1.author: Martina Hingis

5c359d9a-8ec2-43c4-bfee-a0561fe114fd.quote: We players are as normal human beings as anyone else, and we also have the right to live a normal life. I don't understand why people talk so much about the way we dress up, how we walk, what we eat, and every little detail of ours. Players are the real heroes. Sports have both respect and fame, and I am fortunate enough to be a sportsperson.
5c359d9a-8ec2-43c4-bfee-a0561fe114fd.author: Sania Mirza

17ceffe3-1f1d-47f3-8e9f-a89ee69dd211.quote: It's a fine line of doing what's good for your life and what your parents want you to do, but also following your dreams. With my parents, when I was younger, I always had to do two things. If I was acting, I always had to do a sport or something on the arts side of things along with that.
17ceffe3-1f1d-47f3-8e9f-a89ee69dd211.author: Kaley Cuoco

6af83f4e-d834-47ca-a97f-fd6bfa64a620.quote: Fitness has always been one of the top priorities in my life because that's the way I grew up, with soccer being the sport of choice.
6af83f4e-d834-47ca-a97f-fd6bfa64a620.author: Ziggy Marley

a51d09b7-f44a-4bae-b3d9-a5326a32e862.quote: I played all kinds of sports when I was young: tennis, handball, basketball, some soccer. I focused on basketball when I was 16 or 17 and then came to the U.S. when I was 20.
a51d09b7-f44a-4bae-b3d9-a5326a32e862.author: Dirk Nowitzki

837a285f-a069-4577-8e57-9470c57d8c6e.quote: I want to be motivational and inspirational for everybody: my big aim is more women on bicycles.
837a285f-a069-4577-8e57-9470c57d8c6e.author: Marianne Vos

d698c512-81b7-4a88-b489-433a4a2647da.quote: I'm the kind of guy who comes home and checks scores for everything. I'm a sports fan in general, so I pretty much keep up with who's ahead in a division and everything that's going on.
d698c512-81b7-4a88-b489-433a4a2647da.author: Chadwick Boseman

08c2b2af-37a1-41a3-ba26-db58eada32e4.quote: I'm a competitive person and I love the challenge of mastering new things.
08c2b2af-37a1-41a3-ba26-db58eada32e4.author: Sasha Cohen

3638f3fe-5914-4486-beca-850efd6185f3.quote: I had an inspirational teacher at my junior school: Peter Nixon. He was enthusiastic, knowledgeable and slightly scary - a good combination for a teacher.
3638f3fe-5914-4486-beca-850efd6185f3.author: Stephen Mangan

687a8b8e-16b3-4541-83eb-ea4180052b9a.quote: I think if you're writing about cricket, you're obviously writing about power, because cricket is such a loaded sport, much more so than soccer.
687a8b8e-16b3-4541-83eb-ea4180052b9a.author: Joseph O'Neill

f8ad2bc5-eb52-48e5-a304-f9594426ad4a.quote: Not on one strand are all life's jewels strung.
f8ad2bc5-eb52-48e5-a304-f9594426ad4a.author: William Morris

c8ea3335-3d8e-4ce0-a790-3cc63ea9e87d.quote: It's good sportsmanship to not pick up lost golf balls while they are still rolling.
c8ea3335-3d8e-4ce0-a790-3cc63ea9e87d.author: Mark Twain

0f960d0d-6ba4-4239-ad6e-ec83b9d77846.quote: The word 'geek' today does not mean what it used to mean. A geek isn't the skinny kid with a pocket protector and acne. There can be computer geeks, video game geeks, car geeks, military geeks, and sports geeks. Being a geek just means that you're passionate about something.
0f960d0d-6ba4-4239-ad6e-ec83b9d77846.author: Olivia Munn

ba509c22-df3b-46ea-9986-61f8cbad5a91.quote: I'm going to write a book, continue acting, continue motivational speaking and just share with people who I am and what I've learned in my second chance of life and pass it on to people in their first chance of life.
ba509c22-df3b-46ea-9986-61f8cbad5a91.author: J. R. Martinez

a9b58bca-1707-405f-828f-245129240603.quote: Faith, family, academics and then sports was the order of priorities in my family. My parents really stuck to these principles when raising me and my two brothers. As long as we took care of everything, they let us play as much basketball as we wanted.
a9b58bca-1707-405f-828f-245129240603.author: Jeremy Lin

4a6971ca-dc40-453b-a679-597b283181f1.quote: I was always a mean and lean athlete - not tall - not large.
4a6971ca-dc40-453b-a679-597b283181f1.author: Edwin Moses

3dc191b7-5f07-40c2-8a3f-f60a5786634e.quote: Isn't cricket supposed to be a team sport? I feel people should decide first whether cricket is a team game or an individual sport.
3dc191b7-5f07-40c2-8a3f-f60a5786634e.author: Sachin Tendulkar

ab6b410d-5456-4699-ba58-573416e9a9d8.quote: If I had to name the number one asset you could have for any sport I'd say speed. In baseball, all a guy with speed has to do is make contact.
ab6b410d-5456-4699-ba58-573416e9a9d8.author: Ron Fairly

189f79e8-9a80-4c6a-8fa9-26a1750b4841.quote: What's endlessly complicated in thinking about women's gymnastics is the way that vulnerability and power are threaded through the sport.
189f79e8-9a80-4c6a-8fa9-26a1750b4841.author: Meghan O'Rourke

080355bb-a3c6-4c9b-9b53-147ad3b929f5.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
080355bb-a3c6-4c9b-9b53-147ad3b929f5.author: Simone de Beauvoir

22f926b5-b854-4087-8841-048f8f91b109.quote: When launching a product called an Energy Drink and named Red Bull, a product that stimulates body and mind, it is a short step to the roots where Red Bull came from. We have been doing this for 20 years - now it's called adventure sports, extreme sports, and outdoor sports.
22f926b5-b854-4087-8841-048f8f91b109.author: Dietrich Mateschitz

ae7a9d98-d1e5-4bed-9abf-60a165eb05d0.quote: I think anyone who has a passion for what they love to do, and who pursue it, is inspirational for me.
ae7a9d98-d1e5-4bed-9abf-60a165eb05d0.author: Colin Morgan

997d70d6-9554-42d4-a77e-3f6c77d0b0e9.quote: Of all things visible, the highest is the heaven of the fixed stars.
997d70d6-9554-42d4-a77e-3f6c77d0b0e9.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

02ab0f85-03c8-4a28-8d32-e1a2f61e3e5a.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
02ab0f85-03c8-4a28-8d32-e1a2f61e3e5a.author: Aristotle Onassis

3db4b6c9-0229-4cb9-9f40-05627b614ab9.quote: I had my boy in Boston on Easter Sunday. That kills me, from a sports perspective. He's a Boston baby and I'm a New York guy.
3db4b6c9-0229-4cb9-9f40-05627b614ab9.author: Kevin James

f59b0bfc-7709-47f1-bec1-20e272caf6f9.quote: Sports are such a great teacher. I think of everything they've taught me: camaraderie, humility, how to resolve differences.
f59b0bfc-7709-47f1-bec1-20e272caf6f9.author: Kobe Bryant

cc494c7c-8d08-485b-849d-4917e8175dcf.quote: I was able to get along with everybody. I really enjoyed all of those guys. They were unique in their own ways, and I think that's what made the sport fun. We had a great time laughing and having fun.
cc494c7c-8d08-485b-849d-4917e8175dcf.author: Lee Haney

7f5a3624-7fbf-47f3-98ff-6f216725ebb6.quote: Cricket is not a rational sport in India, and we go overboard.
7f5a3624-7fbf-47f3-98ff-6f216725ebb6.author: Harsha Bhogle

3852623e-5a60-4a20-a470-335dd62c5525.quote: Denver is home to me, and to be recognized for my achievements in the sports community here is a great honor.
3852623e-5a60-4a20-a470-335dd62c5525.author: Carmelo Anthony

5c13c9c4-f879-469a-a2f9-5659ba75c5d1.quote: I never played sports or got into the whole guy camaraderie of, like, 'I love you, man! Seniors forever!' So suddenly being in the military with these guys who were under these very heightened circumstances, isolated from their families, living this very kind of Greek lifestyle, it changed my life in a really big way.
5c13c9c4-f879-469a-a2f9-5659ba75c5d1.author: Adam Driver

9535aea2-d02a-44b8-8f60-5dc00cb8a9d1.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
9535aea2-d02a-44b8-8f60-5dc00cb8a9d1.author: Aesop

3f45e355-fbf7-4cd4-a9b2-ff67a67b50ab.quote: Leap, and the net will appear.
3f45e355-fbf7-4cd4-a9b2-ff67a67b50ab.author: John Burroughs

4a90ddae-4bb2-416f-944e-c162532597fa.quote: I know my strengths. Painfully aware of the weaknesses. There's many. I love sports. So working towards a common goal, that's exciting to me.
4a90ddae-4bb2-416f-944e-c162532597fa.author: Kathy Ireland

470f7f0f-4de2-42d1-a3ec-38519eec1802.quote: I didn't like books where people played on a sports team and won a bunch of games, or went to summer camp and had a wonderful time. I really liked a book where a witch might cut a child's head off or a pack of angry dogs might burst through a door and terrorize a family.
470f7f0f-4de2-42d1-a3ec-38519eec1802.author: Daniel Handler

d56b8214-7061-4fe1-a799-1f3825b26fdb.quote: I consider skateboarding an art form, a lifestyle and a sport. 'Action sport' would be the least offensive categorization.
d56b8214-7061-4fe1-a799-1f3825b26fdb.author: Tony Hawk

a9a244d9-f80d-4139-9d4c-096c9eda7575.quote: The best way out is always through.
a9a244d9-f80d-4139-9d4c-096c9eda7575.author: Robert Frost

aa4b8ced-3f7f-44b5-8548-d31f76317677.quote: I think, aesthetically, car design is so interesting - the dashboards, the steering wheels, and the beauty of the mechanics. I don't know how any of it works, I don't want to know, but it's inspirational.
aa4b8ced-3f7f-44b5-8548-d31f76317677.author: Paloma Picasso

1f2c5245-a4bf-4378-b7ac-0c9e29fa7c32.quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
1f2c5245-a4bf-4378-b7ac-0c9e29fa7c32.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

07d24f90-b1ad-408d-9433-776dc729aeeb.quote: I like playing sport, and I like doing physical stuff. I like hiking and I like climbing and I like playing sport. I do a lot. But I don't like the term 'exercising.' I feel like with sport, you're playing games. But with exercise, you're literally just trying to stop yourself from dying too young. It's weird.
07d24f90-b1ad-408d-9433-776dc729aeeb.author: James McAvoy

5875e068-0086-46b8-b64a-d931ce5abc2a.quote: Sport is something that is very inspirational for young people.
5875e068-0086-46b8-b64a-d931ce5abc2a.author: Pele

20e216f3-a197-4297-ba29-f7f0f8fa724c.quote: I started playing ball when I was a kid. My dad was a pro ball player and he passed on his knowledge to me.
20e216f3-a197-4297-ba29-f7f0f8fa724c.author: Kurt Russell

8c98677c-cdda-4f68-af48-87bcba1682ce.quote: I've worked too hard and too long to let anything stand in the way of my goals. I will not let my teammates down and I will not let myself down.
8c98677c-cdda-4f68-af48-87bcba1682ce.author: Mia Hamm

ddaa761f-a1ed-478c-abd7-7c832bbf1246.quote: I used to practice at the hockey ground on synthetic surface while I was in the sports hostel, so Test cricket is certainly going to be a challenge for me.
ddaa761f-a1ed-478c-abd7-7c832bbf1246.author: Suresh Raina

7081114f-d5cb-4b1d-950a-ef3375bf7856.quote: For me, by far, the Olympics is the biggest sporting event in the world.
7081114f-d5cb-4b1d-950a-ef3375bf7856.author: Andy Murray

d5bd66b4-ff26-4d54-924e-2c5ae914f978.quote: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.
d5bd66b4-ff26-4d54-924e-2c5ae914f978.author: Aeschylus

eeae0e79-088f-4ee6-8658-54a542cc6c10.quote: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
eeae0e79-088f-4ee6-8658-54a542cc6c10.author: Vince Lombardi

75e3d023-222e-49cf-9c71-40dda47f7398.quote: I always loved the way music made me feel. I did sports at school and all, but when I got home, it was just music. Everybody in my neighborhood loved music. I could jump the back fence and be in the park where there were ghetto blasters everywhere.
75e3d023-222e-49cf-9c71-40dda47f7398.author: Dr. Dre

40dffe0d-c6cd-4470-ac78-86d8a7441da9.quote: I love my homeland, but it's an absurd country. Politics in the Philippines is like spectator sports!
40dffe0d-c6cd-4470-ac78-86d8a7441da9.author: Miguel Syjuco

678a6b2f-1ae6-4d62-b298-ea8bf9e7d506.quote: Always desire to learn something useful.
678a6b2f-1ae6-4d62-b298-ea8bf9e7d506.author: Sophocles

2ec40c11-44bb-4821-a14b-8f54e67be8ab.quote: The best thing about the Kentucky Derby is that it is only two minutes long. It is the quickest event in sports, except for Sumo-wrestling & Mike Tyson fights. Maybe Drag-racing is quicker, but I have never been attracted to it.
2ec40c11-44bb-4821-a14b-8f54e67be8ab.author: Hunter S. Thompson

b59eda0d-4054-4ca4-ba1a-04ed66320cd5.quote: Had I not come out with an inspirational CD, you perhaps would have never known that I feel like I feel, that all songs, all the music I've ever done is a gift from God.
b59eda0d-4054-4ca4-ba1a-04ed66320cd5.author: Smokey Robinson

37197147-c510-4a76-b72f-ebe4a5e628df.quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
37197147-c510-4a76-b72f-ebe4a5e628df.author: Michael Korda

2c2d517b-475b-426b-bf0f-cd30dcca2570.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
2c2d517b-475b-426b-bf0f-cd30dcca2570.author: W. Clement Stone

6a058f85-ef55-4e62-87e5-fd021bfd823a.quote: For watching sports, I tend to drink Guinness; early evenings always begin well with a Grey Goose and tonic with plenty of lime; and on a cold winter's night, there's nothing quite like a glass of Black Maple Hill... an absolute peach of a bourbon.
6a058f85-ef55-4e62-87e5-fd021bfd823a.author: Martin Bashir

26562723-9335-4946-a523-6f0071785656.quote: Oh, I would love to be a motivational speaker. I have pulled myself out of a million potholes, and I can see the potholes ahead of me. That doesn't mean that I could always do that so perfectly for my own life. I totally fall in potholes.
26562723-9335-4946-a523-6f0071785656.author: Drew Barrymore

0ca4e0fe-9309-40ba-bbc1-cf55591b1e78.quote: In order to excel, you must be completely dedicated to your chosen sport. You must also be prepared to work hard and be willing to accept constructive criticism. Without one-hundred percent dedication, you won't be able to do this.
0ca4e0fe-9309-40ba-bbc1-cf55591b1e78.author: Willie Mays

3611c0be-46d0-49f7-a07f-5aa02ce2286e.quote: You can be a little lonely because it's an individual sport.
3611c0be-46d0-49f7-a07f-5aa02ce2286e.author: Guy Forget

041d8205-02e6-4333-a577-6ca4852d4429.quote: Although it is disappointing that softball was not reinstated into the Olympics, we are going to continue to keep growing the sport.
041d8205-02e6-4333-a577-6ca4852d4429.author: Jennie Finch

7aaaed77-b212-45a3-908b-5488242f61a4.quote: I think every athlete will tell you no matter what sport you're in, when you train so hard and when you care so much about doing what you do, there's a little bit of nerves that come with that. But nerves that won't prevent you form performing, nerves that, hopefully, allow you to be that much more motivated and inspired to do well.
7aaaed77-b212-45a3-908b-5488242f61a4.author: Sidney Crosby

500907c4-82c3-46be-81c5-1de7a5fd1160.quote: If I go to a concert or sporting event I usually go in a VIP entrance. And leave the same way.
500907c4-82c3-46be-81c5-1de7a5fd1160.author: Fran Drescher

5cb4cefd-3a98-40cd-ab3f-ea8fc32fc340.quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed - there's so little competition.
5cb4cefd-3a98-40cd-ab3f-ea8fc32fc340.author: Elbert Hubbard

d971b2e6-91ae-4575-9ef7-42403f6b1215.quote: I love various sports, including basketball, tennis and billiards.
d971b2e6-91ae-4575-9ef7-42403f6b1215.author: Yani Tseng

a2a67854-6d2f-43d6-994d-7f6e5af41b5b.quote: The best and fastest way to learn a sport is to watch and imitate a champion.
a2a67854-6d2f-43d6-994d-7f6e5af41b5b.author: Jean-Claude Killy

3385ca99-6b88-4956-be23-9cc5a9445871.quote: In most sports, your brain and your body will cooperate... But in rock climbing, it is the other way around. Your brain doesn't see the point in climbing upwards. Your brain will tell you to keep as low as possible, to cling to the wall and not get any higher. You have to have your brain persuading your body to do the right movements.
3385ca99-6b88-4956-be23-9cc5a9445871.author: Jo Nesbo

d088480b-c2bf-4896-8f20-899df0a3de2e.quote: Hunting is not a sport. In a sport, both sides should know they're in the game.
d088480b-c2bf-4896-8f20-899df0a3de2e.author: Paul Rodriguez

09a24fa2-50d6-4aa6-b535-04c1e229cedb.quote: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.
09a24fa2-50d6-4aa6-b535-04c1e229cedb.author: John Burroughs

f1071627-c530-420e-8d24-4a7346e7bf3b.quote: Competing in sports has taught me that if I'm not willing to give 120 percent, somebody else will.
f1071627-c530-420e-8d24-4a7346e7bf3b.author: Ron Blomberg

173607f8-26b3-4b00-b21f-7c640c1da999.quote: My uncle played rugby, and my dad played football, and they used to argue which game was the roughest - and everybody agreed rugby was. It's a great team sport, and to be successful, every person has to play in the same level.
173607f8-26b3-4b00-b21f-7c640c1da999.author: Clint Eastwood

63682e62-6b65-41c1-bc9f-e7f756b2bb56.quote: Football's the biggest game in the world. America's the greatest sporting nation there is. To play some part in putting those two things together: why wouldn't I be excited about that?
63682e62-6b65-41c1-bc9f-e7f756b2bb56.author: David Beckham

fb599127-4871-4f2a-9462-9bee237e1220.quote: You can't win unless you learn how to lose.
fb599127-4871-4f2a-9462-9bee237e1220.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

07a6f6e4-be22-429b-82a5-03f709a6ecba.quote: Unfortunately the world is what it is now. People don't get along for whatever reason. As professional athletes, in a way we're almost ambassadors for peace, because sports brings everyone together.
07a6f6e4-be22-429b-82a5-03f709a6ecba.author: Venus Williams

75196a98-acb9-4e4f-bea0-6f96dfd058a5.quote: Trip Hawkins - and this was the early 1980s - was saying there's going to be a day when everyone has a computer and they're going to want to do more on it, including playing games. So he started up a company, EA Sports, and he was going to have three games, football, basketball and baseball. So I was the football game.
75196a98-acb9-4e4f-bea0-6f96dfd058a5.author: John Madden

bfaf1be1-b467-4ca2-af2b-ae6d1892fbd0.quote: Sports are a microcosm of society.
bfaf1be1-b467-4ca2-af2b-ae6d1892fbd0.author: Billie Jean King

7f7a9fc8-8798-4f26-aca8-f9333afbced6.quote: Anybody can be a runner... We were meant to move. We were meant to run. It's the easiest sport.
7f7a9fc8-8798-4f26-aca8-f9333afbced6.author: Bill Rodgers

e3a4082e-25aa-4fcc-b00b-cda4bc588792.quote: I pray God may preserve your health and life many years.
e3a4082e-25aa-4fcc-b00b-cda4bc588792.author: Junipero Serra

7e73a26a-bb2f-43fe-a527-2a4d3372260e.quote: Every video I've made has an inspirational message behind it. Since day one, I thought, 'Okay, I want my audience to be, like, Disney members.' So if that's the case, I have to keep everything rated G.
7e73a26a-bb2f-43fe-a527-2a4d3372260e.author: Michelle Phan

e1fec7cb-71f5-485e-822f-ff5cd248191a.quote: You know how sports teach kids teamwork and how to be strong and brave and confident? Improv was my sport. I learned how to not waffle and how to hold a conversation, how to take risks and actually be excited to fail.
e1fec7cb-71f5-485e-822f-ff5cd248191a.author: Emma Stone

6fe15016-2d05-4783-93c9-5f646d267584.quote: And above all things, never think that you're not good enough yourself. A man should never think that. My belief is that in life people will take you at your own reckoning.
6fe15016-2d05-4783-93c9-5f646d267584.author: Isaac Asimov

7999d17d-f50a-45bd-932d-e82967a7ffa3.quote: I have learned, in my life and work as a sportswriter, that big-time Sports and big-time Politics are not so far apart in America. They are both a means to the same end, which is victory... And why not? Victory is good for you, and don't let anybody tell you different.
