7999d17d-f50a-45bd-932d-e82967a7ffa3.author: Hunter S. Thompson

82d43a39-9e24-4517-b5a9-976922a19c6a.quote: To be candid with you, free agency hurts all sports. It's great for athletes making an enormous amount of money. But to say it helps the sports, I don't believe that.
82d43a39-9e24-4517-b5a9-976922a19c6a.author: Jerry West

89f54f02-35a2-4819-8769-236ce8151e0b.quote: If I pass away one day, I am happy because I tried to do my best. My sport allowed me to do so much because it's the biggest sport in the world.
89f54f02-35a2-4819-8769-236ce8151e0b.author: Pele

0d75d51e-f738-4fd2-b983-ac3b0f8eb6ac.quote: He's got everything. He' not a great player yet because he hasn't won any major championships, but it's a matter of time. He's an outstanding talent. I didn't realize how tall he is.
0d75d51e-f738-4fd2-b983-ac3b0f8eb6ac.author: Nick Price

8af7c33e-fcd0-4bc3-a4e9-721365a3e9e8.quote: I look at athletes in all sports and try to picture what kind of football player they'd be, what position they'd play and so on.
8af7c33e-fcd0-4bc3-a4e9-721365a3e9e8.author: Lou Holtz

77b4f093-d5eb-405d-8de3-1dccff4ed926.quote: Golf is a game in which one endeavors to control a ball with implements ill adapted for the purpose.
77b4f093-d5eb-405d-8de3-1dccff4ed926.author: Woodrow Wilson

7c3e2e72-ff85-4529-9dff-bc05f59fa3b1.quote: My sun sets to rise again.
7c3e2e72-ff85-4529-9dff-bc05f59fa3b1.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

3e447a3b-6d3c-40dc-999f-55418ae8931c.quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
3e447a3b-6d3c-40dc-999f-55418ae8931c.author: Sasha Cohen

3bcfccee-406d-4156-bf39-1316a8b70c0c.quote: Earl Nightingale has inspired more people toward success and fortune than any other motivational speaker on the planet.
3bcfccee-406d-4156-bf39-1316a8b70c0c.author: Zig Ziglar

a37df29e-a220-4a92-887e-75d9c06fc8b1.quote: What other people may find in poetry or art museums, I find in the flight of a good drive.
a37df29e-a220-4a92-887e-75d9c06fc8b1.author: Arnold Palmer

ff1a2fe7-86d7-47d8-9a52-54f0725aaa2f.quote: Linguistics is a good way of defining the culture of a brand. The vocabulary used by sports and lifestyle brands - running, fitness, training, motorsports - is all about functionality, whereas the vocabulary of the luxury business - handbags, ready-to-wear - is all about the product.
ff1a2fe7-86d7-47d8-9a52-54f0725aaa2f.author: Francois-Henri Pinault

f49e56e9-c541-4c44-a150-d87b4319ae7e.quote: Sometimes, quite out of the blue, sport will throw up a tender moment, when hostility ceases and an opponent is acknowledged.
f49e56e9-c541-4c44-a150-d87b4319ae7e.author: Harsha Bhogle

5d7ed500-d783-4439-8ca1-8f0eb2e311d6.quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
5d7ed500-d783-4439-8ca1-8f0eb2e311d6.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

fdd424ba-2c6b-4a73-be6f-c5a8bbf629a4.quote: If the javelin had hit me 10cm to the left, it would have punctured my lung, 20cm higher the throat, which would have been the worst-case scenario. Just 1cm higher and it would have hit bone, muscle and tendon and that would have been the end of my sporting career.
fdd424ba-2c6b-4a73-be6f-c5a8bbf629a4.author: Roman Sebrle

e8b2f12a-f069-48f9-9afc-b5ede76318c7.quote: And when I breathed, my breath was lightning.
e8b2f12a-f069-48f9-9afc-b5ede76318c7.author: Black Elk

fb63a06d-1e06-4bc4-a77d-a299bd64a7c3.quote: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven.
fb63a06d-1e06-4bc4-a77d-a299bd64a7c3.author: Henry Ward Beecher

0ff52075-8680-451a-89a4-abd96e443ace.quote: People tell you the world looks a certain way. Parents tell you how to think. Schools tell you how to think. TV. Religion. And then at a certain point, if you're lucky, you realize you can make up your own mind. Nobody sets the rules but you. You can design your own life.
0ff52075-8680-451a-89a4-abd96e443ace.author: Carrie-Anne Moss

96f4e2f2-de72-43be-9cc1-dc9e2fe5c5b3.quote: One today is worth two tomorrows.
96f4e2f2-de72-43be-9cc1-dc9e2fe5c5b3.author: Benjamin Franklin

d844bda4-3103-48d1-b18f-46f5e508ba48.quote: I am not a has-been. I am a will be.
d844bda4-3103-48d1-b18f-46f5e508ba48.author: Lauren Bacall

acbcb796-f1ca-4549-9c9e-0b016d11d2dd.quote: People have an opinion of Africa and it is not so good, but we have to let sport unite us all.
acbcb796-f1ca-4549-9c9e-0b016d11d2dd.author: Didier Drogba

69e3eef4-0752-4c3f-8a81-75f8c4092dd9.quote: For a kid who's lost his mom and all the rage and grief that no one was able to talk out of me, football was a very therapeutic sport. Very.
69e3eef4-0752-4c3f-8a81-75f8c4092dd9.author: Jon Hamm

5e823a08-929e-4bb6-bd70-e5862f6b055c.quote: It is such a luxury to open a new book that's highly recommended by friends - either an inspirational yet humorously self-deprecating memoir, or a page-turning piece of fiction.
5e823a08-929e-4bb6-bd70-e5862f6b055c.author: Kelli O'Hara

52dffbd0-01fa-4830-9372-981649b2b3c6.quote: When I was a child, the FA Cup was one of the crown jewels of the sporting year, along with the Grand National, Wimbledon and The Open. But with every announcement it seems to lose another piece of its identity. First it was sponsors added to the name, followed by the semi-finals at Wembley.
52dffbd0-01fa-4830-9372-981649b2b3c6.author: Gary Neville

bf916011-71e1-4267-8fe8-8c66f5ba9b77.quote: The single most important thing in a child's performance is the quality of the teacher. Making sure a child spends the maximum amount of time with inspirational teachers is the most important thing.
bf916011-71e1-4267-8fe8-8c66f5ba9b77.author: Michael Gove

c1e9eebf-46ef-4779-b8aa-00222f5d1211.quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
c1e9eebf-46ef-4779-b8aa-00222f5d1211.author: Robin Williams

7de6f5a2-905b-4aca-88ce-641e36af61d1.quote: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
7de6f5a2-905b-4aca-88ce-641e36af61d1.author: Victor Hugo

03b20148-7206-4ca8-b3a1-7cca0126801f.quote: The tennis ball doesn't know how old I am. The ball doesn't know if I'm a man or a woman or if I come from a communist country or not. Sport has always broken down these barriers.
03b20148-7206-4ca8-b3a1-7cca0126801f.author: Martina Navratilova

f2b308ea-5ccb-4807-9571-fb2a8cfe4b7d.quote: When I was a kid, my father brought home the autobiography of Sid Luckman, the great Chicago Bears quarterback - probably an extra copy from the sports department where he worked. It was the first sports biography I ever read.
f2b308ea-5ccb-4807-9571-fb2a8cfe4b7d.author: George Vecsey

f0dd8f9e-ab82-46bf-9ec4-8b7123ca1701.quote: In 1964, when Lee Iacocca said, 'Shelby, I want you to make a sports car out of the Mustang,' the first thing I said was, 'Lee, you can't make a race horse out of a mule. I don't want to do it.' He said, 'I didn't ask you to make it; you work for me.'
f0dd8f9e-ab82-46bf-9ec4-8b7123ca1701.author: Carroll Shelby

0aa666bc-ef1f-4792-a2e8-8593437733cb.quote: I celebrate myself, and sing myself.
0aa666bc-ef1f-4792-a2e8-8593437733cb.author: Walt Whitman

f4027dbd-c861-4368-b49d-6fb51c57d4fd.quote: I'm thrilled, I'm grateful, I'm blessed. I played for the world's greatest professional sports team in history. Once a Dallas Cowboy, always a Dallas Cowboy.
f4027dbd-c861-4368-b49d-6fb51c57d4fd.author: Bob Hayes

b97ddcaf-3fb5-4641-b688-f45c26ac5aa7.quote: My sporting hero was Drazen Petrovic, the NBA basketball player, who was killed in a car accident in 1993. He was a good friend, an unbelievable player, and I dedicated my Wimbledon win to him.
b97ddcaf-3fb5-4641-b688-f45c26ac5aa7.author: Goran Ivanisevic

7a2903b6-bf19-4c40-9edd-360f63d8939e.quote: If I stayed a football player, my career would have been over 20 years ago. As it is, my knees are shot. I found I got the same good feeling in acting that I had in sports, but I found I could have a more profound impact on people.
7a2903b6-bf19-4c40-9edd-360f63d8939e.author: William Petersen

b070b372-cbb0-4ea1-baac-d1a6baf092f8.quote: I've been a Colt for almost all of my adult life, but I guess in life, and in sports, we all know nothing lasts forever. Times change, circumstances change, and that's the reality of playing in the NFL.
b070b372-cbb0-4ea1-baac-d1a6baf092f8.author: Peyton Manning

15850fc9-d011-4820-bbc0-10a2c78176c6.quote: We may train or peek for a certain race, but running is a lifetime sport.
15850fc9-d011-4820-bbc0-10a2c78176c6.author: Alberto Salazar

2b5cc646-28d8-4f83-b5c4-f05a81cef452.quote: Since we launched the original 'Pop Idol' in England, I've remained close with Simon Fuller. Working as executive producer on 'American idol' for its first seven years not only was an inspirational journey into the heart of American pop culture, it opened my eyes to the untapped potential of the incredibly dynamic young people in this world.
2b5cc646-28d8-4f83-b5c4-f05a81cef452.author: Nigel Lythgoe

471a8ef3-a990-49a9-b087-bcb79e3a6ea5.quote: I call tennis the McDonald's of sport - you go in, they make a quick buck out of you, and you're out.
471a8ef3-a990-49a9-b087-bcb79e3a6ea5.author: Pat Cash

728350a4-2324-41f5-996c-0fb0c19ab23c.quote: Growing up, I looked up to major league baseball players, and now these young women have amazing, incredible women all across the board, from swimming to gymnastics to softball to basketball. It is incredible how far women have come and women in sports have come.
728350a4-2324-41f5-996c-0fb0c19ab23c.author: Jennie Finch

53adbeb7-636c-4343-9d86-2e1117d283b5.quote: And I highly recommend for all the women in the world, even if they're 71, you can never take for granted that he loves you. It's always good to flirt with him. It's a great sport.
53adbeb7-636c-4343-9d86-2e1117d283b5.author: Salma Hayek

bca00594-3ca2-4e47-9419-eb9c71f0c60c.quote: I believe it is in my nature to dance by virtue of the beat of my heart, the pulse of my blood and the music in my mind.
bca00594-3ca2-4e47-9419-eb9c71f0c60c.author: Robert Fulghum

9f988030-7e6b-4fd0-8ebb-e3ef803064a3.quote: When I grew up, my father taught us the value of hard work. He wanted us to enjoy ourselves, but he also wanted to know what it took to be successful. He coached a lot of our sports teams growing up. We weren't very good, but we learned about hard work and enjoying life and your teammates.
9f988030-7e6b-4fd0-8ebb-e3ef803064a3.author: Andrew Luck

b04099cc-3399-4505-aebc-46197202d11d.quote: When I used to play sports, I'd be the one cheering the team on, 'Come on, we can beat these guys!' That's just in me.
b04099cc-3399-4505-aebc-46197202d11d.author: Joel Osteen

f4917ac3-9464-434c-8694-26b2050da0a1.quote: When a man wants to relax, he will slob out and really relax. Or he will pursue a hobby - anything from building models to watching sport.
f4917ac3-9464-434c-8694-26b2050da0a1.author: Julie Burchill

fa3fe0eb-7805-4a01-a790-2b330dd78144.quote: I don't want to play golf. When I hit a ball, I want someone else to go chase it.
fa3fe0eb-7805-4a01-a790-2b330dd78144.author: Rogers Hornsby

5c28f28b-17f5-4ed8-8b83-632fe403f507.quote: Baseball is a team sport played by individuals for themselves.
5c28f28b-17f5-4ed8-8b83-632fe403f507.author: Joe Torre

f8f37035-ec21-4ce9-b6ce-43e87facd7cf.quote: I think that it's perhaps harder to learn from victory than it is from defeat. I think that we don't want defeat. We don't want defeat in sport. We don't want defeat in life. How are we going to be beaten? All right. We have to deal with those things. What's going to cause us to lose the game, whatever the game might be?
f8f37035-ec21-4ce9-b6ce-43e87facd7cf.author: Bobby Knight

7a2127eb-c5e7-4aea-840e-e95c8533a48c.quote: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
7a2127eb-c5e7-4aea-840e-e95c8533a48c.author: Malala Yousafzai

4468b997-65c8-4044-8a5d-6d735ec7b802.quote: The ban on sports betting does exactly what Prohibition did. It makes criminals rich.
4468b997-65c8-4044-8a5d-6d735ec7b802.author: James Surowiecki

c8ed92f7-e4b4-4ad9-9b01-66811d923533.quote: Ethnic prejudice has no place in sports, and baseball must recognize that truth if it is to maintain stature as a national game.
c8ed92f7-e4b4-4ad9-9b01-66811d923533.author: Branch Rickey

ea0dae25-27d7-4696-8c10-86523501dabb.quote: Your body's really only meant to compete at the highest levels of combat sports for a few years.
ea0dae25-27d7-4696-8c10-86523501dabb.author: Joe Rogan

1cafaacc-6ae9-4f8e-8a3c-6d044b456fdc.quote: I have looked into your eyes with my eyes. I have put my heart near your heart.
1cafaacc-6ae9-4f8e-8a3c-6d044b456fdc.author: Pope John XXIII

451bd340-9669-421e-8e5c-1c59f1b21a99.quote: Sailing is a completely new sport for me and I wasn't sure what to expect but I've definitely got the bug.
451bd340-9669-421e-8e5c-1c59f1b21a99.author: Kirsty Gallacher

58347d8c-18c5-4f9b-ad63-9723d46956fe.quote: I'm not good at anything except writing jokes. I wasn't good at sports, I wasn't good at anything artsy, ever. I think there was a real worry for a while about what I would be good at. I was just this chubby little Indian kid who looked like a nerd.
58347d8c-18c5-4f9b-ad63-9723d46956fe.author: Mindy Kaling

e20871f8-9490-453f-9e61-0fc70e87d32c.quote: You cannot mix sports with politics.
e20871f8-9490-453f-9e61-0fc70e87d32c.author: Jackie Chan

cac41ae4-80de-44bb-8c97-92befa8bf34d.quote: I don't know why people question the academic training of an athlete. Fifty percent of the doctors in this country graduated in the bottom half of their classes.
cac41ae4-80de-44bb-8c97-92befa8bf34d.author: Al McGuire

41a615f4-d063-4dc6-89cf-1911556de4da.quote: Great American sport. Horseshoes is a very great game. I love it.
41a615f4-d063-4dc6-89cf-1911556de4da.author: Dan Quayle

74f1f8f6-2b31-4aea-8b95-5d198201367e.quote: Play is the only way the highest intelligence of humankind can unfold.
74f1f8f6-2b31-4aea-8b95-5d198201367e.author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

6fbf757f-bc84-43a1-9b1b-b531f9e0791a.quote: Not everyone likes sports. Gandhi and Malcolm X come to mind.
6fbf757f-bc84-43a1-9b1b-b531f9e0791a.author: Jay Mohr

31d0dd51-3ea3-4e46-a298-6246a7ae323e.quote: You know it's going to hell when the best rapper out there is white and the best golfer is black.
31d0dd51-3ea3-4e46-a298-6246a7ae323e.author: Charles Barkley

e1380f50-ed58-4c85-a6ed-bf37ccae5e7c.quote: The trouble with jogging is that the ice falls out of your glass.
e1380f50-ed58-4c85-a6ed-bf37ccae5e7c.author: Martin Mull

7eae134c-9451-40f3-80c9-95132e0728ae.quote: If I could be good at any sport, it'd be javelin. I know a few people I would love to throw a spear at.
7eae134c-9451-40f3-80c9-95132e0728ae.author: Cheryl Cole

3128ee9f-97b9-4afb-830f-492a2a9df0bd.quote: I pick projects according to how fascinating they are to me, and it has resulted in a broad reach. My records are actually in five different sports: balloons, airplanes, airships, gliders, and sailboats.
3128ee9f-97b9-4afb-830f-492a2a9df0bd.author: Steve Fossett

406618ed-34ba-4adc-a93d-667e6552c708.quote: In an individual sport, yes, you have to win titles. Baseball's different. But basketball, hockey? One person can control the tempo of a game, can completely alter the momentum of a series. There's a lot of great individual talent.
406618ed-34ba-4adc-a93d-667e6552c708.author: Kobe Bryant

fb35612b-ee7b-446e-b69d-a4fd9d6174ed.quote: Growing up in Huntington Beach, you were either a traditional sports athlete, a skateboarder, or a surfer. I got my first skateboard when I was five and skated off and on over the years, did a little BMX racing as a kid, and then in my freshman or sophomore year I started getting a little bit more into skateboarding.
fb35612b-ee7b-446e-b69d-a4fd9d6174ed.author: Jason Lee

6bbeea38-5bdf-4f09-80f1-e2432188361c.quote: I think sports makes for good drama because it has all the same ingredients as anything worth reading or listening to or watching. Conflict, desire, heartbreak - it's all there.
6bbeea38-5bdf-4f09-80f1-e2432188361c.author: Jay Baruchel

6df1dbc0-4d0a-4327-97eb-f176a4ce5f4b.quote: But yet I don't think I should be labeled just a black quarterback, because it's bigger things in this sport that need to be accomplished.
6df1dbc0-4d0a-4327-97eb-f176a4ce5f4b.author: Cam Newton

ba5f6721-672b-4879-9952-9d482a43b6cf.quote: We all know that girls who compete in sports perform better in school, are physically healthier and have a stronger self-esteem.
ba5f6721-672b-4879-9952-9d482a43b6cf.author: Louise Slaughter

776a9092-4819-4d5b-bbdd-a2eb5075fe00.quote: The only thing a golfer needs is more daylight.
776a9092-4819-4d5b-bbdd-a2eb5075fe00.author: Ben Hogan

7af3326e-5c30-4a34-ab6a-cc491a3c7c1d.quote: I think people who are creative are the luckiest people on earth. I know that there are no shortcuts, but you must keep your faith in something Greater than You, and keep doing what you love. Do what you love, and you will find the way to get it out to the world.
7af3326e-5c30-4a34-ab6a-cc491a3c7c1d.author: Judy Collins

bf3561f9-855e-4c9e-b548-6aee5f9066a1.quote: If a man can beat you, walk him.
bf3561f9-855e-4c9e-b548-6aee5f9066a1.author: Satchel Paige

4ce1bae7-25f9-449c-9898-5909554b612a.quote: Mountaineering is one of the most difficult sports - we are away from routine life for days, living in tents, and it requires high degree of physical and mental strength.
4ce1bae7-25f9-449c-9898-5909554b612a.author: Samina Baig

bb1afcbf-1824-4814-85c5-751de871e216.quote: The problem with winter sports is that - follow me closely here - they generally take place in winter.
bb1afcbf-1824-4814-85c5-751de871e216.author: Dave Barry

232869a5-f58b-4045-bb08-7ce495639aeb.quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
232869a5-f58b-4045-bb08-7ce495639aeb.author: Unknown

0588e476-d4b4-413c-ac47-bcc3093db653.quote: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.
0588e476-d4b4-413c-ac47-bcc3093db653.author: Desiderius Erasmus

a021d7a4-b104-44d6-b42c-1ac1e3bc8945.quote: As flies to wanton boys, are we to the gods; they kill us for their sport.
a021d7a4-b104-44d6-b42c-1ac1e3bc8945.author: William Shakespeare

3159daf6-1472-4116-8d76-a0790e141212.quote: The flow of Guiness into the studio was inspirational as well as nutritive.
3159daf6-1472-4116-8d76-a0790e141212.author: Carter Burwell

f8a42d42-259c-4551-be2a-6497822b3675.quote: I liked the energy of cooking, the action, the camaraderie. I often compare the kitchen to sports and compare the chef to a coach. There are a lot of similarities to it.
f8a42d42-259c-4551-be2a-6497822b3675.author: Todd English

95a22b58-871b-4f63-bd44-1053140ebab4.quote: The triple is the most exciting play in baseball. Home runs win a lot of games, but I never understood why fans are so obsessed with them.
95a22b58-871b-4f63-bd44-1053140ebab4.author: Hank Aaron

3dd3d90e-6335-4d4f-9d0b-510038b03348.quote: We've been surrounded by images of space our whole lives, from the speculative images of science fiction to the inspirational visions of artists to the increasingly beautiful pictures made possible by complex technologies. But whilst we have an overwhelmingly vivid visual understanding of space, we have no sense of what space sounds like.
3dd3d90e-6335-4d4f-9d0b-510038b03348.author: Honor Harger

fd946db6-c6f0-4496-9d87-d01368d1465e.quote: War of attrition, war of wills. That's what the Stanley Cup playoffs are - more intense, more physical and more prolonged than the playoffs of any other sport.
fd946db6-c6f0-4496-9d87-d01368d1465e.author: George Vecsey

901ddd8c-4168-463f-83f7-b14b474c8c52.quote: I believe in work, in connections between the players, I think what makes football great is that it is a team sport. You can win in different ways, by being more of a team, or by having better individual players. It is the team ethic that interests me, always.
901ddd8c-4168-463f-83f7-b14b474c8c52.author: Arsene Wenger

2224661e-97fc-402e-aadb-369376eeb128.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
2224661e-97fc-402e-aadb-369376eeb128.author: H. G. Wells

b0dd648b-1bc2-49ef-91ee-9763e84d10c7.quote: Baseball was, is and always will be to me the best game in the world.
b0dd648b-1bc2-49ef-91ee-9763e84d10c7.author: Babe Ruth

1654848e-3b3a-41f3-bada-0bac06dff373.quote: I'm not in this sport to say a guy can beat me.
1654848e-3b3a-41f3-bada-0bac06dff373.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

d4b0c8dd-0a00-4830-8e10-9915c14a4ff5.quote: There is no life for girls in team sports past Little League. I got into tennis when I realized this, and because I thought golf would be too slow for me, and I was too scared to swim.
d4b0c8dd-0a00-4830-8e10-9915c14a4ff5.author: Billie Jean King

41bcb49a-1157-4920-9494-2d033a8d0993.quote: From a very early age, as far back as I can remember, I always played sports.
41bcb49a-1157-4920-9494-2d033a8d0993.author: Cris Judd

478e4665-a726-4228-af96-eecd76bed7d1.quote: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport.
478e4665-a726-4228-af96-eecd76bed7d1.author: Julia Child

d4a21396-35c6-48ef-9615-e88e44e33265.quote: Biography, like big game hunting, is one of the recognized forms of sport, and it is as unfair as only sport can be.
d4a21396-35c6-48ef-9615-e88e44e33265.author: Philip Guedalla

d67ce5b3-6c6c-4b82-9bac-6173a2ba7a4f.quote: We are raising today's children in sterile, risk-averse and highly structured environments. In so doing, we are failing to cultivate artists, pioneers and entrepreneurs, and instead cultivating a generation of children who can follow the rules in organized sports games, sit for hours in front of screens and mark bubbles on standardized tests.
d67ce5b3-6c6c-4b82-9bac-6173a2ba7a4f.author: Darell Hammond

1755e83e-5c8e-4ed4-ad27-2d991d81bb58.quote: There isn't a flaw in his golf or his makeup. He will win more majors than Arnold Palmer and me combined. Somebody is going to dust my records. It might as well be Tiger, because he's such a great kid.
1755e83e-5c8e-4ed4-ad27-2d991d81bb58.author: Jack Nicklaus

f1ab0fe5-ddd5-4da5-97b7-f4ace59730e3.quote: It's the nature of the beast, playing sports on the ski team and how competitive all of us are. I want to beat everybody's time.
f1ab0fe5-ddd5-4da5-97b7-f4ace59730e3.author: Ted Ligety

9f330e55-5d5f-46fe-968a-e6741b8bb306.quote: This is just rap. I'm not trying to make people think I'm some sort of scientific wizard or inspirational poet.
9f330e55-5d5f-46fe-968a-e6741b8bb306.author: Action Bronson

e385ef5d-41a7-46e4-8f93-8adceb1473c2.quote: Half the lies they tell about me aren't true.
e385ef5d-41a7-46e4-8f93-8adceb1473c2.author: Yogi Berra

fc9048b9-8fff-422b-bab1-384d316cb828.quote: After leaving school, I travelled around Europe for about six months. In Denmark, I thought that was my chance to get an amazing haircut, so I went to what I thought was a great hairdresser. It turned out to be the car wash of hairdressers, and I walked out sporting yet another pudding bowl, but this time with a stripe bleached down the centre.
fc9048b9-8fff-422b-bab1-384d316cb828.author: Becki Newton

c8f8f1f6-94da-4324-99b4-4d5a0cce4be0.quote: One thing you learned as a Cubs fan: when you bought you ticket, you could bank on seeing the bottom of the ninth.
c8f8f1f6-94da-4324-99b4-4d5a0cce4be0.author: Joe Garagiola

54c2d240-5258-460c-b7af-28727806a0a6.quote: When Bill Clinton ran in '92, and I listened to him, and I had of course known of his record from Arkansas, I found him extraordinarily inspirational, and I voted Democratic.
54c2d240-5258-460c-b7af-28727806a0a6.author: Wesley Clark

43436e4e-f42d-4a83-844f-1904ff34c7d0.quote: Mankind is made great or little by its own will.
43436e4e-f42d-4a83-844f-1904ff34c7d0.author: Friedrich Schiller

905c2c05-114c-4ba4-ab48-0fa4ce643e9f.quote: I thank you God for this most amazing day, for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and for the blue dream of sky and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes.
905c2c05-114c-4ba4-ab48-0fa4ce643e9f.author: e. e. cummings

d841bda6-a24f-40da-98c2-b7edb7af2cd8.quote: If you are going to throw a club, it is important to throw it ahead of you, down the fairway, so you don't have to waste energy going back to pick it up.
d841bda6-a24f-40da-98c2-b7edb7af2cd8.author: Tommy Bolt

70b76b37-8cd7-4f87-83f6-52425ac5b9c7.quote: God always strives together with those who strive.
70b76b37-8cd7-4f87-83f6-52425ac5b9c7.author: Aeschylus

2b54ad70-64fa-48a6-a0d4-fe76c75898a0.quote: God sleeps in the minerals, awakens in plants, walks in animals, and thinks in man.
2b54ad70-64fa-48a6-a0d4-fe76c75898a0.author: Arthur Young

e49092e5-7890-4ccf-a0a5-82d6f15920b7.quote: Look at a football field. It looks like a big movie screen. This is theatre. Football combines the strategy of chess. It's part ballet. It's part battleground, part playground. We clarify, amplify and glorify the game with our footage, the narration and that music, and in the end create an inspirational piece of footage.
e49092e5-7890-4ccf-a0a5-82d6f15920b7.author: Steve Sabol

9bbeeb62-f106-450e-9b24-870b85c433de.quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
9bbeeb62-f106-450e-9b24-870b85c433de.author: Woodrow Wilson

f5667f42-9d43-4f97-be52-b4c95b3f5698.quote: Thus so wretched is man that he would weary even without any cause for weariness... and so frivolous is he that, though full of a thousand reasons for weariness, the least thing, such as playing billiards or hitting a ball, is sufficient enough to amuse him.
f5667f42-9d43-4f97-be52-b4c95b3f5698.author: Blaise Pascal

56f28f18-f68e-406e-82ae-6e5ece73a8e7.quote: Approach the game with no preset agendas and you'll probably come away surprised at your overall efforts.
56f28f18-f68e-406e-82ae-6e5ece73a8e7.author: Phil Jackson

c9427313-a5b2-44ca-ac69-73a8066494d8.quote: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
c9427313-a5b2-44ca-ac69-73a8066494d8.author: Nelson Mandela

4fa9be08-7a34-4e7c-b348-773db476035f.quote: Think about it - pro wrestling as an Olympic sport would be pretty cool. Look at figure skating or gymnastics - what is it? It's a choreographed performance that is judged.
4fa9be08-7a34-4e7c-b348-773db476035f.author: Chris Jericho

6c847d22-aa9d-4005-bf64-d3e85b77d68d.quote: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.
6c847d22-aa9d-4005-bf64-d3e85b77d68d.author: Friedrich Schiller

8eb746d3-1dad-4c38-8b1e-ffc8d44a4801.quote: Breaking records is not something you expect to be doing. That's like a sports thing, it's not usually a comedy and writing thing.
8eb746d3-1dad-4c38-8b1e-ffc8d44a4801.author: Louis C. K.

4909b167-f644-485f-b4cf-59faccb615d4.quote: I never felt the same passion for the game in the States and there were a lot of headaches, a lot of obstacles to overcome - it didn't just run itself for the love of the game because soccer is not the No. 1 sport as it is in Europe.
4909b167-f644-485f-b4cf-59faccb615d4.author: Hope Solo

c74833bb-baf4-40f2-a6a3-6509055d3959.quote: I wasn't really a work-conscious type of person. I was a player. I loved to play sports.
c74833bb-baf4-40f2-a6a3-6509055d3959.author: Michael Jordan

006bfbc0-bcca-4316-b858-26b987f74ac7.quote: I do like alternative rock and rap, but as far as inspirational, then I go full-on orchestra. It fills up your entire being.
006bfbc0-bcca-4316-b858-26b987f74ac7.author: Osric Chau

184cfb38-ed82-4558-820f-2442934bc01e.quote: There is no doubt that Formula 1 has the best risk management of any sport and any industry in the world.
184cfb38-ed82-4558-820f-2442934bc01e.author: Jackie Stewart

c3f0acde-b3a0-4495-8fd9-f470de4efb04.quote: I'm one of these people that likes adrenaline and new things, like extreme sports. It makes me feel alive.
c3f0acde-b3a0-4495-8fd9-f470de4efb04.author: Gisele Bundchen

9c2e05b2-abfc-4940-b5c5-734c350063f4.quote: I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life - and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing I wanted to do.
9c2e05b2-abfc-4940-b5c5-734c350063f4.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

36839538-5e42-4556-ad7b-61234da36726.quote: Soccer was the first sport that my parents put me in, and ultimately, all the parents kind of came over to my mom and were, 'We think Channing would be better at football.... We love him, he's really great, but he's kind of hurting our children.' I was just a little wild.
36839538-5e42-4556-ad7b-61234da36726.author: Channing Tatum

8fd87477-ff3f-4e49-87a7-860bf9d97286.quote: I've stayed calm when I'm winning and I've stayed calm when I've lost. Tennis is a sport where we have a lot of tournaments every week, so you can't celebrate a lot when you have big victories, and you cannot get too down when you're losing, as in a few days you'll be in the next tournament and you'll have to be ready with that.
8fd87477-ff3f-4e49-87a7-860bf9d97286.author: Rafael Nadal

ddaad276-b737-44bf-82fd-4fed73caf095.quote: Olympism is a philosophy which, by blending sport with culture, seeks to create a way of life based on the joy found in effort, the educational value of good example and respect for universal ethical principles.
ddaad276-b737-44bf-82fd-4fed73caf095.author: Juan Antonio Samaranch

ce29d961-81f8-403c-896f-66434ce83060.quote: If you've got a talent, protect it.
ce29d961-81f8-403c-896f-66434ce83060.author: Jim Carrey

821ea5a9-17b4-4aad-ba26-38c96b46a20c.quote: In various fields, such as science, technology, sports, business and the arts, immigrants enrich our culture every single day.
821ea5a9-17b4-4aad-ba26-38c96b46a20c.author: Charles B. Rangel

5b90c7e8-90d8-4a37-80c5-e23c3fd0b8c0.quote: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records.
5b90c7e8-90d8-4a37-80c5-e23c3fd0b8c0.author: William Arthur Ward

334b6af0-bd42-4a39-8a1d-d6dd00410320.quote: Kids can have great passion and great ability but if you have the facilities for your particular sport that can give you the inspiration to become a sportsman.
334b6af0-bd42-4a39-8a1d-d6dd00410320.author: David Beckham

0817afb5-f5cb-45df-a9b8-567c8211eb2c.quote: Hitch your wagon to a star.
0817afb5-f5cb-45df-a9b8-567c8211eb2c.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

70eea739-e5e5-4358-a894-964ed2671b49.quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
70eea739-e5e5-4358-a894-964ed2671b49.author: Jack London

966e0b48-bbed-4c42-ac9c-2102baab87e0.quote: I have to confess I'm addicted to Sky Sports News. Just the music can pull me in. And then whether it's badminton in the Czech Republic, snail pushing or mole hopping, I'm hooked.
966e0b48-bbed-4c42-ac9c-2102baab87e0.author: Andrew Buchan

552c0926-0b87-4ab2-af65-5c0e7777e358.quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
552c0926-0b87-4ab2-af65-5c0e7777e358.author: Marcus Aurelius

9dcac944-7dbc-4fa6-8f92-032078c87dea.quote: There's three things men always talk about - women, sports, and cars.
9dcac944-7dbc-4fa6-8f92-032078c87dea.author: Mario Lopez

1a8a04b5-911c-42be-a71c-41669e39df06.quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
1a8a04b5-911c-42be-a71c-41669e39df06.author: Unknown

600b1bfa-c4d9-4e4e-b640-50407dc6dd0c.quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
600b1bfa-c4d9-4e4e-b640-50407dc6dd0c.author: Tom Stoppard

9111799e-c305-4420-a872-cb17347f3ee8.quote: The incentive of a medal at the biggest sporting arena in the world is what drives me. Before I hang my gloves, I want to win the Olympic medal, and my performance at London will decide my future in the sport.
9111799e-c305-4420-a872-cb17347f3ee8.author: Mary Kom

aa1d6a04-4612-4244-a622-b79c635865fb.quote: I love sports. When I'm not playing, I'm watching, reading, or otherwise obsessing about them. This probably stems from growing up in Indiana, where if you didn't at least attempt to play basketball, you were considered of dubious moral character.
aa1d6a04-4612-4244-a622-b79c635865fb.author: Mark Waters

3e1451f5-bbe2-4896-904b-fa9d5bc09644.quote: Too low they build, who build beneath the stars.
3e1451f5-bbe2-4896-904b-fa9d5bc09644.author: Edward Young

9695f43c-609c-44a6-a50b-3c4edbf10214.quote: I've never been a fan of individual awards because football is such a team sport. There's so many things that goes into making plays. It's about teammates trusting one another and working together.
9695f43c-609c-44a6-a50b-3c4edbf10214.author: Troy Polamalu

4af34456-b442-44bc-a272-879c0d1c7d63.quote: When it comes to women, there has been a tendency to define women in sports in the context of their relationships - they watch games because their husbands watch. They're interested because their kids play a sport. They buy tickets to a sporting event because it's a way to spend time with family.
4af34456-b442-44bc-a272-879c0d1c7d63.author: Indra Nooyi

43251203-f024-4178-9ba8-87a94b2af17f.quote: Personally, I can't see the appeal in trekking down to D.C. for a networking extravaganza, even if it is built around a special moment in American history. While I find the election of Barack Obama inspirational, I don't have a desire to memorialize it with overly effusive celebration.
43251203-f024-4178-9ba8-87a94b2af17f.author: Jamie Johnson

019a726c-4c79-41c0-ad8d-79000a3fe46d.quote: I love snowboarding. It's probably my favorite sport. I love sitting on top of the mountain and the snow falling and that silence, that snow silence. That's, like, a very peaceful, happy place for me.
019a726c-4c79-41c0-ad8d-79000a3fe46d.author: Philippe Cousteau, Jr.

f6870992-ff7b-43a7-b392-8a34fa70ee9c.quote: I have always thought you could take the measure of a man by his sports manners - that is to say, the way in which he conducts himself on the playing field, or even over a game of chess or cards.
f6870992-ff7b-43a7-b392-8a34fa70ee9c.author: Graydon Carter

5738b75e-bca0-4934-8797-6403b74cafeb.quote: I was motivated to be different in part because I was different.
5738b75e-bca0-4934-8797-6403b74cafeb.author: Donna Brazile

8dd6f048-2851-4acf-a79a-ff6142022012.quote: New Yorkers love it when you spill your guts out there. Spill your guts at Wimbledon and they make you stop and clean it up.
8dd6f048-2851-4acf-a79a-ff6142022012.author: Jimmy Connors

e0ff140d-d0b8-4cad-8379-0aad6fe3763a.quote: I like to put on hardcore when I have to clean my apartment, which I hate to do, but it's motivational. I like old heavy metal when I'm outside working on my car. Music has definite functions for me.
e0ff140d-d0b8-4cad-8379-0aad6fe3763a.author: Peter Steele

c6d81df7-50cf-48ac-a100-9a6756b71d57.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
c6d81df7-50cf-48ac-a100-9a6756b71d57.author: Helen Keller

a3d11ac2-223e-40cf-bb70-cc6ee57e355d.quote: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
a3d11ac2-223e-40cf-bb70-cc6ee57e355d.author: e. e. cummings

5512ff7e-62df-4354-9271-f139a7b1018f.quote: It's cool just because I've had this dream of changing the sport of swimming and it's finally happening.
5512ff7e-62df-4354-9271-f139a7b1018f.author: Michael Phelps

d0acb5ef-200b-41a0-bce5-ca814cc59498.quote: If someone were to actually come to one of our training sessions, there's lots of flipping and sweating and crying and blood going on all over the place. I mean, if that doesn't qualify it as a sport, then I don't know what does.
d0acb5ef-200b-41a0-bce5-ca814cc59498.author: Meryl Davis

5bef2a2a-b912-4c07-811c-a7315e0673e1.quote: Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?
5bef2a2a-b912-4c07-811c-a7315e0673e1.author: Eliza Dushku

b6d8a008-0bd6-491c-96ed-bbf078ec65c2.quote: Contrary to the royal and uptight image of polo, I want to bring it to a younger generation. This is a great sport that can have a larger audience and appeal to more people. Sportsmanship is lacking in many other sports that I don't want to name.

d00f3705-f3ec-4620-96ef-e54c07623f90.quote: Whatever you vividly imagine, ardently desire, sincerely believe, and enthusiastically act upon... must inevitably come to pass!
d00f3705-f3ec-4620-96ef-e54c07623f90.author: Paul J. Meyer

ff2241fd-dd07-4cd7-96c0-7552a6f08b33.quote: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
ff2241fd-dd07-4cd7-96c0-7552a6f08b33.author: Alexander the Great

e89f3e6d-b507-445c-9f29-8ea5762445e1.quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.

b7ae4a4f-5477-463e-8e61-320fa2875037.quote: Every heart that has beat strongly and cheerfully has left a hopeful impulse behind it in the world, and bettered the tradition of mankind.

1809b458-70b9-4896-b996-95e6659cdf10.quote: We live in a world where sports have the potential to bridge the gap between racism, sexism and discrimination. The 2012 Olympic Games was a great start but hopefully what these games taught us is that if women are given an opportunity on an equal playing field the possibilities for women are endless.

eb49a3f7-a013-4d5a-b2d4-e35998294aac.quote: Never in a million years did I think the sport of poker would blow up the way it did.
eb49a3f7-a013-4d5a-b2d4-e35998294aac.author: Chris Moneymaker

d88a0313-2ff0-4281-ba91-1e3387538ac7.quote: I'm an athlete, so I'm very interested in making the sport as safe as possible - just for my own career longevity.
d88a0313-2ff0-4281-ba91-1e3387538ac7.author: Ted Ligety

453e5f7f-5e0a-433e-a7c2-8c000c84d2bf.quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.

563397fd-094d-4eee-a9d5-80b36b27f9eb.quote: Why are video games so violent? The ones I've seen remind me of the 4th of July, with everything exploding, buildings, cars, airplanes, men and women. Kill, kill, and kill for sport and entertainment.

32d25767-0c7d-4b65-93ef-0e319d164557.author: David Icke

8a6c55e1-4954-412d-b92b-cf2eccaa1746.quote: I said to the almond tree, 'Friend, speak to me of God,' and the almond tree blossomed.
8a6c55e1-4954-412d-b92b-cf2eccaa1746.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

e66b8d03-4bce-4289-8520-99f975d788ca.quote: Several professional athletes have wrongly taught many young Americans by example that the only way to succeed in sports is to take steroids.
e66b8d03-4bce-4289-8520-99f975d788ca.author: Jim Sensenbrenner

60faf16d-a97d-4749-b7ea-8e94aa55861d.quote: Just be patient. Let the game come to you. Don't rush. Be quick, but don't hurry.

77659c7b-ee89-498c-a08c-ef085a339fad.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
77659c7b-ee89-498c-a08c-ef085a339fad.author: Vince Lombardi

99ad3f3c-bf88-414c-8fca-e526d472488a.quote: The Olympic Games are highly commercialised. They purport to follow the traditions of an ancient athletics competition, but today it is the commercial aspect that is most apparent. I have seen how, through sport, cities and corporations compete against each other for financial gain.

67cd8784-53c5-4f8c-8c61-9257b7a50b45.quote: Charlie and I discovered at a really young at that we had a passion for figure skating, and I think that passion drives us to work every day to improve and grow. We have really learned to love our sport more and more, year to year. And the hard work really pays off.

d070021a-4511-4188-84bc-2f0f5e9180a6.quote: I do love to eavesdrop. It's inspirational, not only for subject matter but for actual dialogue, the way people talk.

df4fee47-c8fb-4a3b-9af0-a2421aeb4439.quote: In the seventies we had to make it acceptable for people to accept girls and women as athletes. We had to make it okay for them to be active. Those were much scarier times for females in sports.

c213d1e3-f0ef-407b-9b3c-98dafb68c7f0.quote: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.

aac31d40-ec89-4e21-9de3-1ada71a5d7ec.quote: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative.

74868be7-9e28-4680-952a-730930a4b5c3.quote: You don't have to be Einstein to see that horse racing is dangerous. Those two ambulances driving behind you aren't there for the scenery. I will never get over the fatalities of colleagues. It is the saddest and toughest part of this sport.

597944bc-d4e2-4c07-9700-82a29aee4b19.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
597944bc-d4e2-4c07-9700-82a29aee4b19.author: William Butler Yeats

eab8fa32-eb71-4053-a1c2-628b60bbf4e0.quote: One of the things that I did before I ran for president is I was a professional speaker. Not a motivational speaker - an inspirational speaker. Motivation comes from within. You have to be inspired. That's what I do. I inspire people, I inspire the public, I inspire my staff. I inspired the organizations I took over to want to succeed.

8c71a002-5999-4f15-a169-2d28a6d9001f.quote: Comparisons are really no good in sport, especially if it is a comparison between different eras and generations, for there are so many variables that come into play, starting from the quality of the opposition to playing conditions.

Not that there's anything wrong with 'Casino Royale.' But 'Happy Feet' - written and directed by George Miller - is a complete charmer, even if, in the way of most family fare, it can't resist straying into the Inspirational.
beca12ed-c414-4b5d-bc5b-dceb025c4b21.author: Robert Gottlieb

I think we have found passionate fans, and built up a strong culture for the sport - and things are improving every day, with more and more people getting interested.

8029b1d1-3577-4648-b8b7-1b2ba05f98b3.quote: I always believed in my ability, but I think in any sport you need that little bit of luck.

2f73681a-7c3f-4f99-8f46-1c6611763a4b.quote: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me.

They have a lot of sporting events that have made it more popular there. They have motocross and rave celebrations, and they're embracing it as a youth culture thing.
b69022f9-bcd4-4e38-9854-bffe21c50864.author: Lisa Morton

cb4b10cc-0802-4df5-8b09-98ec9f49a7bc.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
cb4b10cc-0802-4df5-8b09-98ec9f49a7bc.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

41a323b2-72ab-47f4-aa4c-68906bb4ad72.quote: When I came to America in 1978, I was a huge sports fan - the problem was, my sport was cricket. Shockingly enough, no one wanted to talk cricket with me!

74bf1cfc-3909-4a63-b24e-dda4e51e523f.quote: In sport, there is always room for improvement. Whenever I see my innings against the West Indies or Australia, I think, 'Maybe, I could have done this better or should have changed that.' See, cricket is a skill game, and one can always improve upon the impact one has on an innings.
74bf1cfc-3909-4a63-b24e-dda4e51e523f.author: Yuvraj Singh

67e99e0c-a0d2-47e0-b477-319088634f74.quote: Keep your feet on the ground, but let your heart soar as high as it will. Refuse to be average or to surrender to the chill of your spiritual environment.

e072ab56-7f04-4fff-9539-63b3e77241f8.quote: My favorite way to spend Saturday is in and out of bed, watching sports on TV and eating.
e072ab56-7f04-4fff-9539-63b3e77241f8.author: Alan King

d6b703e5-747d-44bb-b762-e44cef2decdd.quote: In sports teams, apart from talk of sporting prowess and the imparting of inspirational thought, an extraordinary amount of time is spent discussing, and flaunting, material possessions.

b5262bee-c043-43d1-afa5-6368093aa2bc.quote: Lee's great gifts are teaching and inspirational guidance, not administration and management.
b5262bee-c043-43d1-afa5-6368093aa2bc.author: Cheryl Crawford

7beb48f4-8c25-4e7e-8669-e932a16a7f64.quote: It takes a tremendous amount of skill to be a football player. And some of these guys have enough skills to do other sports. Soccer could be one. Basketball could be another. Things where you need incredible hand-eye coordination are always options. I think a football player would be able to adapt to a lot of sports.
7beb48f4-8c25-4e7e-8669-e932a16a7f64.author: Troy Polamalu

9a2338e3-7d27-4ecc-9594-c78e72338069.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
9a2338e3-7d27-4ecc-9594-c78e72338069.author: Tony Robbins

c2b5c676-f852-4b3b-aadd-73dbb3611d0a.quote: Well, dating has become a sport and not about finding the person you love.
c2b5c676-f852-4b3b-aadd-73dbb3611d0a.author: Rashida Jones

fbff3982-7e48-48aa-a2bf-380194f2b15c.quote: I will openly admit that I've never really followed hockey. Given my New England upbringing, I have always adhered to the Celtics, Patriots, Red Sox, Bruins mantra of professional sports fandom, but hockey was definitely the lowest sport on the totem pole - even when the Bruins won the Stanley Cup.
fbff3982-7e48-48aa-a2bf-380194f2b15c.author: Rachel Nichols

bf87c2c9-84e4-41a5-8785-6e891d2565f2.quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
bf87c2c9-84e4-41a5-8785-6e891d2565f2.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

fdd9195b-626c-413b-9319-7294e150b900.quote: Tomorrow is the most important thing in life. Comes into us at midnight very clean. It's perfect when it arrives and it puts itself in our hands. It hopes we've learned something from yesterday.
fdd9195b-626c-413b-9319-7294e150b900.author: John Wayne

8f60f633-6be3-42cb-b144-ff82c72e7c0a.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
8f60f633-6be3-42cb-b144-ff82c72e7c0a.author: Helen Keller

4ce867d3-e699-4ba3-b476-79dead29de3f.quote: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.
4ce867d3-e699-4ba3-b476-79dead29de3f.author: John Wooden

6568eefd-a482-4e7e-a0ce-fcb3829930cc.quote: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.
6568eefd-a482-4e7e-a0ce-fcb3829930cc.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

0cd7b487-6174-4446-a08c-725fff43d709.quote: The truth is, what Americans enjoy about football is much of what makes the sport dangerous. However, I believe there must be a way to find the art of success and vitality in football, without the driving the level of impact that causes serious risk of head trauma, paralysis and other life-changing injuries.
0cd7b487-6174-4446-a08c-725fff43d709.author: Naveen Jain

58fb9457-6d23-4c7e-b4bf-7b77f6b7bad6.quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.

73e68a2c-bc24-42e7-a8a9-d7e9c4201aaa.quote: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
73e68a2c-bc24-42e7-a8a9-d7e9c4201aaa.author: Rabindranath Tagore

9e8f5b7d-34b8-49c7-bfc9-68094e53d68a.quote: Typically, if you reward something, you get more of it. You punish something, you get less of it. And our businesses have been built for the last 150 years very much on that kind of motivational scheme.
9e8f5b7d-34b8-49c7-bfc9-68094e53d68a.author: Daniel H. Pink

400880a2-ba53-4e6e-8e3d-e18f1a5ec86e.quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
400880a2-ba53-4e6e-8e3d-e18f1a5ec86e.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

e1d82cda-50c8-4bc6-8add-1c5aa3ec82ce.quote: It was easy being healthy when I was young. I was full of energy, so sports and physical challenges were fun. But as I got older and the spring left my step, exercise became harder, and eating, drinking and watching TV became easier. By the time I was 50, I'd put on 50 pounds.
e1d82cda-50c8-4bc6-8add-1c5aa3ec82ce.author: Robert Kiyosaki

ae5dbcb0-255b-49ee-abfd-c6543247ec0c.author: Barry Switzer

b27fc22f-9593-4197-9e50-0c97868cbe11.quote: Cycling is a sport of the open road and spectators are lining that road.

f6b02ef9-73e6-4d81-bc0f-b45711f790b7.quote: A concerted effort to preserve our heritage is a vital link to our cultural, educational, aesthetic, inspirational, and economic legacies - all of the things that quite literally make us who we are.

03abe82b-2380-4b06-8485-2b9e19dea294.quote: There were always plenty of newspapers in the house. 'The Times', 'Guardian', 'Daily Telegraph' and 'Daily Mail' were all regular fixtures on the coffee table. I used to enjoy reading 'The Times' editorial pages and the 'Daily Mail' sports pages.

57a92369-86cf-4999-bdb7-19d957623a65.quote: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination.

82d6e10e-af7f-4e79-a3b7-6d93af4d5f09.quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
82d6e10e-af7f-4e79-a3b7-6d93af4d5f09.author: Nido Qubein

0e78c4fe-d774-4d83-8e7f-09301248a67b.quote: Football isn't a contact sport, it's a collision sport. Dancing is a contact sport.
0e78c4fe-d774-4d83-8e7f-09301248a67b.author: Duffy Daugherty

c857a172-b6d1-4600-ad93-87b30dc42276.quote: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
c857a172-b6d1-4600-ad93-87b30dc42276.author: Wilma Rudolph

50331221-f654-4faa-a0af-753c7e4a32d9.quote: Hitting is timing. Pitching is upsetting timing.
50331221-f654-4faa-a0af-753c7e4a32d9.author: Warren Spahn

404a907b-f4b9-480c-8711-06ad0bb9092c.quote: On the other hand, chess is a mass sport now and for chess organisers shorter time control is obviously more attractive. But I think that this control does not suit World Championship matches.

97cb0843-d0ae-45cd-8445-271d2cbae726.quote: I had grand visions of being in professional sports. But when reality set in, I went, 'Oh, OK. I'll just move to Hollywood and be an actor.' I didn't want to look back on my life and wonder, 'What if I had done this? Or I had done that?'
97cb0843-d0ae-45cd-8445-271d2cbae726.author: Bailey Chase

d1386d9c-8323-4267-a09f-29dbcb5d2ed1.quote: Boxing is the toughest and loneliest sport in the world. You've got all the fans, lots of hangers-on jumping up and shouting different words. But when you actually go in the ring, it's a very lonely and scary place. It's just you and the other guy.
d1386d9c-8323-4267-a09f-29dbcb5d2ed1.author: Frank Bruno

2a08170a-1621-4f75-8ba5-49adade0f5b6.quote: If you could only love enough, you could be the most powerful person in the world.

94fe6d62-b5ed-4d60-9bd9-3cadcb238d1b.quote: Sports, entertainment and aviation are three of the most exciting professions in the world; you are dealing with the same magnitude.
94fe6d62-b5ed-4d60-9bd9-3cadcb238d1b.author: John Travolta

36d6e9ad-0111-47dc-b3af-c8b7f9d02ac0.quote: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.

cef98c0b-a9d9-4968-b1b0-ead2ac189d76.quote: Hope is some extraordinary spiritual grace that God gives us to control our fears, not to oust them.
cef98c0b-a9d9-4968-b1b0-ead2ac189d76.author: Vincent McNabb

bfb3812d-b38d-47a8-9d08-1182cc0cd4a8.quote: I grew up in Westlake Villiage, a suburb of L.A. There was a guy there who was a fighter and was like, 'I'll teach you to box.' I started a little bit of boxing, then it crossed over into jiu-jitsu. I was into it for a little while, but then I started doing basketball, baseball, team sports.
bfb3812d-b38d-47a8-9d08-1182cc0cd4a8.author: Jonathan Lipnicki

cf8d60a1-06bf-4e62-85f7-8722fd456232.quote: To be wholly devoted to some intellectual exercise is to have succeeded in life.
cf8d60a1-06bf-4e62-85f7-8722fd456232.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

c9b6efd9-fa01-47ec-bfca-59fbef0e913f.quote: I hope that at the end of the seven years, people will say that I have been of some inspirational value to them at home in terms of inclusiveness and abroad, I look forward to representing Ireland.

86333fad-4709-470e-b875-2ca76d21f8d6.quote: I'm for a drug-free sport and always will be.

62efa342-1602-4a9b-8664-8fedc2792791.quote: I've been more or less vegetarian for about 40 years. Health diet really helps. I do meditation every day, and either yoga or sport several times a week.
62efa342-1602-4a9b-8664-8fedc2792791.author: John McLaughlin

a75d221e-2892-4af3-8cec-0e7d4f614cad.quote: It is very important to know who you are. To make decisions. To show who you are.
a75d221e-2892-4af3-8cec-0e7d4f614cad.author: Malala Yousafzai

fa1b42de-742d-4826-8638-5ffd2f106e5e.quote: Barack Obama's inspirational whoosh to the presidency in 2008 was unusual. Most campaigns are less exhilarating; indeed, they are downright disappointing - until someone wins.
fa1b42de-742d-4826-8638-5ffd2f106e5e.author: Joe Klein

0c645e3a-70ad-4540-b31d-ba0361712317.quote: A #2 pencil and a dream can take you anywhere.
0c645e3a-70ad-4540-b31d-ba0361712317.author: Joyce Meyer

c9114cf7-f366-4543-9bdf-06b80eca508d.quote: Extreme sports tricks are becoming increasingly complex, the courses ever more challenging and crashes all too common.
c9114cf7-f366-4543-9bdf-06b80eca508d.author: Lucy Walker

0b3ac14d-7b5c-430f-9529-ead7750df018.quote: 'Star Wars' is fun, its exciting, its inspirational, and people respond to that. It's what they want.
0b3ac14d-7b5c-430f-9529-ead7750df018.author: George Lucas

eab95c25-b247-4199-894d-f4f7f5fdfd8a.quote: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
eab95c25-b247-4199-894d-f4f7f5fdfd8a.author: Unknown

40e05797-37de-495f-ba95-bbbda11e3d55.quote: We need to accept that the commandments of God aren't just a long list of good ideas. They aren't 'life hacks' from an Internet blog or motivational quotes from a Pinterest board.

3be67d39-f829-4bb1-8f8b-2b307f5db4f2.quote: Tennis takes care of everything. It requires agility and quickness to get to the ball, core strength to get power into your shorts and stamina to last for an entire match. In addition to toning your arms and shoulders, it's a total body workout for your legs and abs, and works your heart and core unlike any other sport.
3be67d39-f829-4bb1-8f8b-2b307f5db4f2.author: Samantha Stosur

25544d59-4c0d-4845-8bdc-bf501a79d2ac.quote: I was always the youngest person in class, skinny, scrawny, no good at sports. I asserted myself by being smart. But then I got to college and started to get C's and D's. That was fantastic. I no longer had to be the smartest person in the room.
25544d59-4c0d-4845-8bdc-bf501a79d2ac.author: Douglas Coupland

ceaa275b-a392-4d85-bba1-519bdeea88e5.quote: One day, I got so disgusted that I sat down and wrote a list called 'Justin's list of things to do before he kicks the bucket.' I wrote it for myself and shortened it to 'Justin's Bucket List.' It was there on the wall, not as a story idea but as a motivational tool for myself, which actually ended up working pretty well.
ceaa275b-a392-4d85-bba1-519bdeea88e5.author: Justin Zackham

259f68ad-6b89-43d6-86e5-07fd06d18a68.quote: You never know what motivates you.

99329454-6c19-450e-b965-198e285e9561.quote: Fear has been a big battle, it runs rampant in my sport so I love to overcome that, to challenge it head on, because there is nothing that feels as accomplished as overcoming a fear, and something that has blocked you in such a big way.

8e83093e-ca17-4084-87d7-5f3496430eb4.quote: It's not that I don't want a fast car. I like the speed. I'm just not the type of person who finds a sports car a sexy car.

afb4bafa-6262-493d-ba17-43372c905b5c.quote: I don't really like politics that much. And I like the order and simplicity of sports. They have an ending. You can argue with your friends about it, but in the end you still like sports. I almost love the fantasy world of sports more than the real world.

87b22d5e-893c-4602-b2e1-616689cf5a65.quote: You wouldn't have won if we'd beaten you.

17a67941-847c-44cd-90ec-d082852b5bf5.author: William Shakespeare

8894ff52-cba3-4442-9c7d-57d880a0bf57.quote: What separates sports from entrepreneurism, however, is that in business we constantly have to overcome undefined and unpredictable challenges. Athletes train for specific events and conditions, whereas entrepreneurs generally have little idea what they will encounter along the way.

9cca693d-ece1-4d77-8283-30cd4eb07962.quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win.

15c7b9d8-d409-4621-a81f-c4cde3b72e22.quote: Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you.
15c7b9d8-d409-4621-a81f-c4cde3b72e22.author: Satchel Paige

408c64cc-5111-43d4-84f6-ae19973e0ae8.author: Mark Twain

53244a95-cb21-41fb-b8f0-11744094d497.author: Pierre de Coubertin

8eb8c7b4-99ce-4fdc-a5ba-c6d487408285.quote: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.
8eb8c7b4-99ce-4fdc-a5ba-c6d487408285.author: Orison Swett Marden

0a36cc01-a539-4673-b3c6-22f736d80747.quote: Academe, n.: An ancient school where morality and philosophy were taught. Academy, n.: A modern school where football is taught.

fa46e92f-6909-44da-86a1-be5eff0954f9.quote: Gymnastics, especially in my family, is more than a sport. It's our life, it's our careers, it's our family business.

082d2c69-8741-41ed-a5fe-5426501c6022.quote: Soccer is a great game, and the rich variety of styles and passions that come with being truly global makes the World Cup a nonpareil event in the universe of competitive sport.

58586adf-15a2-411a-8f5b-92a29651919f.quote: To find a man's true character, play golf with him.

017a1977-f84b-49cf-98e5-d6dbe94c76e3.quote: What's more important than who's going to be the first black manager is who's going to be the first black sports editor of the New York Times.

78bf150c-7878-4dd7-97f8-6e927b55eb9e.quote: If your man is a sports enthusiast, you may have to resign yourself to his spouting off in a monotone on a prize fight, football game or pennant race.

Carlos Ortiz, Wilfredo Gomez, Wilfredo Benitez and Felix 'Tito' Trinidad and many others have made Puerto Rican boxing what it is today, and I am only an extension of their greatness.

6d6a8347-0feb-48aa-860a-ae413f9a356e.quote: If you think back to the first sporting event you went to, you don't remember the score, you don't remember a home run, you don't remember a dunk. You remember who you were with. Were you with your mom, your dad, your brother, on a date?

1fd1f126-13a4-4c76-a684-e540aace9f2f.quote: Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit.
1fd1f126-13a4-4c76-a684-e540aace9f2f.author: Bernard Williams

1f219780-e1ae-417e-83c3-6302be5c4e31.quote: Boxing is the toughest and loneliest sport in the world.
1f219780-e1ae-417e-83c3-6302be5c4e31.author: Frank Bruno

4358aea6-e249-415f-b323-a26de678b09b.quote: Racing may be a minority sport, but I wouldn't swap it for all the money in the world.
4358aea6-e249-415f-b323-a26de678b09b.author: Tony McCoy

ac3a6ef5-3aa8-4b81-b780-fb82c95844bc.quote: Basketball is like war in that offensive weapons are developed first, and it always takes a while for the defense to catch up.
ac3a6ef5-3aa8-4b81-b780-fb82c95844bc.author: Red Auerbach

6a01628e-2cc3-4ab5-a235-fe073e905375.quote: There will soon be streams of data coming from all manner of products - appliances, clothing, sporting goods, you name it. Wouldn't you rather live in a world where you can export the data from your son's football helmet to a new app that monitors force and impact against a cohort of high school players around the country?
6a01628e-2cc3-4ab5-a235-fe073e905375.author: John Battelle

e5153efb-b29c-413b-979b-ce19b3047338.quote: The Wright brothers flew right through the smoke screen of impossibility.
e5153efb-b29c-413b-979b-ce19b3047338.author: Charles Kettering

c9602eae-5b69-4dec-ac18-737686ee6dec.quote: The addiction to sports, therefore, in a peculiar degree marks an arrested development in man's moral nature.
c9602eae-5b69-4dec-ac18-737686ee6dec.author: Thorstein Veblen

a6cf5414-9322-4ee4-8cdf-1b29e7a80b11.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
a6cf5414-9322-4ee4-8cdf-1b29e7a80b11.author: Charles R. Swindoll

4077b4bd-3a17-4ed2-a4b0-d395e8c11d72.quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
4077b4bd-3a17-4ed2-a4b0-d395e8c11d72.author: Maya Angelou

04fdb2cd-a93e-41ab-ade7-819ed7977cbf.quote: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
04fdb2cd-a93e-41ab-ade7-819ed7977cbf.author: Thomas Jefferson

32d31dda-2160-4e35-ada6-3d53cddc8600.quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
32d31dda-2160-4e35-ada6-3d53cddc8600.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

2cba1b54-d3a4-42c8-86d9-58ef5b1675cf.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
2cba1b54-d3a4-42c8-86d9-58ef5b1675cf.author: Mark Twain

d509e79a-0ee1-436b-a6cb-f834a7d630c2.quote: My tastes and inspirational artists were always rather eclectic and diverse.
d509e79a-0ee1-436b-a6cb-f834a7d630c2.author: Taylor Dayne

80b6b13b-cb0b-4ae4-8713-247c9a1f7cd4.quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
80b6b13b-cb0b-4ae4-8713-247c9a1f7cd4.author: Dale Carnegie

6b8fa83f-d794-4bcb-a3fb-2debb59f5bec.quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
6b8fa83f-d794-4bcb-a3fb-2debb59f5bec.author: Earl Nightingale

7c3f4358-1dea-42d2-9960-6cc04013389d.quote: I think the Cowboys are one of only two teams in all of sports that engender love and hate to that extreme. The other is the Yankees. You love the Yankees or you hate the Yankees.
7c3f4358-1dea-42d2-9960-6cc04013389d.author: Al Michaels

11b5c74d-661d-4af0-a252-54fca145613c.quote: Thanks to the competence, love of God, our country's security and stability, endowed wealth, integrated infrastructure and quality services, the U.A.E. turned into the world's renowned destination for tourism, investment and business management: the interface of choice for hosting major cultural events, artistic and sports, in the world.
11b5c74d-661d-4af0-a252-54fca145613c.author: Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan

52baeb7b-d31f-4584-b067-dc96f2557c57.quote: As the proud father of two teens and past Chairman to the Presidents Council on Physical Fitness and Sports, I am committed to educating parents and especially young people on ways to live a long, healthy and active life.
52baeb7b-d31f-4584-b067-dc96f2557c57.author: Lee Haney

73ccc2d0-15b7-4329-b998-0efb5c80d796.quote: I wrote '('Til) I Kissed You' about a girl I met in Australia. Her name was Lilian, and she was very, very inspirational. I was married, but... I wrote the song about her on the way back home.
73ccc2d0-15b7-4329-b998-0efb5c80d796.author: Don Everly

58c7dd1d-d957-4ac3-889f-1e9cf1743c5e.quote: When they take surveys of women in business, of the Fortune 500, the successful women, 80% of them, say they were in sports as a young woman.
58c7dd1d-d957-4ac3-889f-1e9cf1743c5e.author: Billie Jean King

dfb65483-ae30-40c6-9ae7-d21c734781b9.quote: I am as hungry now as I was when I began in the sport. If anything, I am probably a bit hungrier. It is because I know there are fewer tomorrows than yesterdays.
dfb65483-ae30-40c6-9ae7-d21c734781b9.author: Allen Johnson

122ac84b-57b5-4031-93df-5581d0946659.quote: I'm extremely well recognized in Korea just because of what I do on the ice, and there is a lack of that in Canada because hockey is our sport and it will be for eternity.
122ac84b-57b5-4031-93df-5581d0946659.author: Patrick Chan

8436c89b-7bf6-44b2-8935-59cdfd006cca.quote: The thing about sport, any sport, is that swearing is very much part of it.
8436c89b-7bf6-44b2-8935-59cdfd006cca.author: Jimmy Greaves

60d01185-05a9-4579-9f2e-37736f4b7bae.quote: Step by step and the thing is done.
60d01185-05a9-4579-9f2e-37736f4b7bae.author: Charles Atlas

d835dec4-0d5e-45a5-8fdd-5d7369afd1c5.quote: There are kids who get on a BMX bike when they're eight years old and they go, 'Whoa, this is incredible,' and grow up to do extreme sports. It's the same for me with acting.
d835dec4-0d5e-45a5-8fdd-5d7369afd1c5.author: Joaquin Phoenix

0b1c081c-b7b4-43d9-af78-6580c3263fec.quote: The people who influence you are the people who believe in you.
0b1c081c-b7b4-43d9-af78-6580c3263fec.author: Henry Drummond
