3644b827-e1cb-4970-a7d0-29c5a165b290.author: Joseph Campbell

9b7a306d-b552-44f8-81ff-ff33e831b801.quote: Pitching is the art of instilling fear.
9b7a306d-b552-44f8-81ff-ff33e831b801.author: Sandy Koufax

404118cb-6211-4d97-95b6-697edddf1583.quote: For me, sports is a big part of my life. It helped me through high school. It helped me get better grades, because if you don't have good grades, you can't play sports.
404118cb-6211-4d97-95b6-697edddf1583.author: David Charvet

2a3de559-89b0-4136-933b-9a639d7bcf7a.quote: I feel this pang of regret whenever I watch sport; this sense that I will never play a big match again.
2a3de559-89b0-4136-933b-9a639d7bcf7a.author: David Beckham

870dc857-3a95-48e0-8c1a-4ded591093e8.quote: The only way to prove that you're a good sport is to lose.
870dc857-3a95-48e0-8c1a-4ded591093e8.author: Ernie Banks

d537942a-3154-4182-89bb-4a9742de3e5b.quote: And now, this is the sweetest and most glorious day that ever my eyes did see.
d537942a-3154-4182-89bb-4a9742de3e5b.author: Donald Cargill

c7c8da1c-9b30-47e0-94de-c9b8a9be0bd3.quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.
c7c8da1c-9b30-47e0-94de-c9b8a9be0bd3.author: Denis Waitley

55ad5f29-de82-4fda-9003-bbfce6758550.quote: The two most important things in my life were academics and sports. I had to do my schoolwork first.
55ad5f29-de82-4fda-9003-bbfce6758550.author: Gabriel Luna

d41bdb60-d1cc-4192-9354-6591dbe0b427.quote: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.
d41bdb60-d1cc-4192-9354-6591dbe0b427.author: John Dewey

05c46cb3-d0c2-46a1-82ed-9c1cb540ed46.quote: Serious sport is war minus the shooting.
05c46cb3-d0c2-46a1-82ed-9c1cb540ed46.author: George Orwell

8f305c63-d3e8-4982-873d-cdfd613a0a2a.quote: I told another ESPN friend here, I love all sports. I can't think of any I don't love. I've even come to appreciate cricket. Maybe I could play a sportswriter. I don't know. Anything in the sports realm is appealing.
8f305c63-d3e8-4982-873d-cdfd613a0a2a.author: Sean Astin

4ba8b63c-6bd3-4b39-bfdb-35c20be27beb.quote: I am very conscious of who I am as an artist and as an inspirational person.
4ba8b63c-6bd3-4b39-bfdb-35c20be27beb.author: R. Kelly

3255a786-a00d-4a7d-a28b-362c4ebf9acb.quote: Reading was very important to me as a kid. It was very inspirational to me. I went to a school where that wasn't encouraged so much, but my parents encouraged that, and it has made me part of who I am.
3255a786-a00d-4a7d-a28b-362c4ebf9acb.author: Sasha Grey

06dfd1db-e058-4203-a7c4-de52a254f31b.quote: Regardless of the obstacles or hurdles that are ahead of you, regardless of the opponent, regardless of the odds, your goal and objective always is to win. I think that's part of sports.
06dfd1db-e058-4203-a7c4-de52a254f31b.author: Grant Hill

a1e18984-92ad-47ec-888a-26da253b4e5c.quote: You can't prove Rembrandt is better than Norman Rockwell - although if you actually do prefer Rockwell, I'd say you were shunning complexity, were secretly conservative, and hadn't really looked at either painter's work. Taste is a blood sport.
a1e18984-92ad-47ec-888a-26da253b4e5c.author: Jerry Saltz

55f87132-9b6d-4006-90b7-9d0b10e701dd.quote: Bruce Lee was an artist and, like him, I try to go beyond the fundamentals of my sport. I want the public to see a knockout in the making.
55f87132-9b6d-4006-90b7-9d0b10e701dd.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

745ddf25-904a-4c7b-985f-c85a3ab65ec1.quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
745ddf25-904a-4c7b-985f-c85a3ab65ec1.author: John Muir

ce04694b-afbf-497b-8e16-c20a2463dddd.quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.
ce04694b-afbf-497b-8e16-c20a2463dddd.author: Michelangelo

f8abca9d-3369-4a20-8585-f7e69bdbd577.quote: I loved the world of roller derby because I thought it was such an empowering metaphor, that you get out there and do it. It's such a rocker, athletic, capable, cool exhibitionist sport; it's about this great sort of camaraderie.
f8abca9d-3369-4a20-8585-f7e69bdbd577.author: Drew Barrymore

b7c18e73-c55c-4f0d-aefe-341a68bc7ee7.quote: My family knew, but most of the sporting world did not realize that my right hand been some 75% paralyzed.
b7c18e73-c55c-4f0d-aefe-341a68bc7ee7.author: Bill Toomey

9c2273c6-bde4-4e7d-8dd5-af4858d555d5.quote: It doesn't matter whether you are pursuing success in business, sports, the arts, or life in general: The bridge between wishing and accomplishing is discipline.
9c2273c6-bde4-4e7d-8dd5-af4858d555d5.author: Harvey Mackay

9791894d-09d7-435c-98e6-b27b77c169e7.quote: A lot of America is kind of done. People have been making films about it for 100 years. Everything to me feels used up. But Jo-Burg feels unbelievably inspirational to me.
9791894d-09d7-435c-98e6-b27b77c169e7.author: Neill Blomkamp

e89d0b77-4f9d-4eb0-aa8b-3c5c27fbe76a.quote: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.
e89d0b77-4f9d-4eb0-aa8b-3c5c27fbe76a.author: Albert Camus

573dbb52-234e-4e89-8f68-300b73b1bce9.quote: You win some, lose some, and wreck some.
573dbb52-234e-4e89-8f68-300b73b1bce9.author: Dale Earnhardt

2eec98a6-99eb-49ef-baaf-1233d12f1778.quote: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
2eec98a6-99eb-49ef-baaf-1233d12f1778.author: Pope John XXIII

d84332d1-d0f1-44f0-a9b3-6494c8c0c03a.quote: Trying to sneak a fastball past Hank Aaron is like trying to sneak the sunrise past a rooster.
d84332d1-d0f1-44f0-a9b3-6494c8c0c03a.author: Joe Adcock

48028c1d-4a04-4d04-af97-f50eda1673ee.quote: Ideas shape the course of history.
48028c1d-4a04-4d04-af97-f50eda1673ee.author: John Maynard Keynes

d5be5a2c-ba17-42f2-9796-aba2ad513260.quote: You never know when some small thing will lead to a big idea. Travel is very inspirational - but it's in the ordinary that I find my themes of love and work and family.
d5be5a2c-ba17-42f2-9796-aba2ad513260.author: Adriana Trigiani

15e3485e-8c5f-46c9-92aa-342d170e5de5.quote: If you have the athletic ability, why waste it in one sport?
15e3485e-8c5f-46c9-92aa-342d170e5de5.author: Isaiah Mustafa

d8cac0fa-7395-4e9b-8756-e024da3a162d.quote: Social cohesion was built into language long before Facebook and LinkedIn and Twitter - we're tribal by nature. Tribes today aren't the same as tribes thousand of years ago: It isn't just religious tribes or ethnic tribes now: It's sports fans, it's communities, it's geography.
d8cac0fa-7395-4e9b-8756-e024da3a162d.author: Peter Guber

80226e0e-a34c-45f5-9f1e-fe2cff415dc3.quote: Baseball is the only field of endeavor where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.
80226e0e-a34c-45f5-9f1e-fe2cff415dc3.author: Ted Williams

6f5f76ad-0978-4ed5-ac6a-5d222e9a405b.quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
6f5f76ad-0978-4ed5-ac6a-5d222e9a405b.author: Peter Marshall

706b3bbc-1437-41c2-ac07-0f932a5c42eb.quote: First impressions matter more in basketball than in any other sport, and they can be savored only in person. Players can't hide behind pads or helmets, so we can stare at them, evaluate every move they make: running, jumping, walking, even ogling the cheerleaders. We can see every ripple and tattoo. If they're lazy, we can tell.
706b3bbc-1437-41c2-ac07-0f932a5c42eb.author: Bill Simmons

b40f1007-4220-425a-9cfe-6adf51442c09.quote: In sports and in business, the greatest leaders are those who make the best decisions in the most crucial of situations. They are the ones who focus their energy on turning tough decisions into winning decisions.
b40f1007-4220-425a-9cfe-6adf51442c09.author: Don Yaeger

a075936b-1733-47eb-9ecb-2e249911302f.quote: I was foreign and Jewish, with a funny name, and was very small and hated sport, a real problem at an English prep school. So the way to get round it was to become the school joker, which I did quite effectively - I was always fooling around to make the people who would otherwise dump me in the loo laugh.
a075936b-1733-47eb-9ecb-2e249911302f.author: Alain de Botton

b2930792-4cd9-4683-9036-3f3a0c0106bc.quote: I believe in the city as a natural human environment, but we must humanize it. It's art that will re-define public space in the 21st Century. We can make our cities diverse, inspirational places by putting art, dance and performance in all its forms into the matrix of street life.
b2930792-4cd9-4683-9036-3f3a0c0106bc.author: Antony Gormley

a37a3b7d-56a5-45aa-9f26-940d90bb207d.quote: For each individual, sport is a possible source for inner improvement.
a37a3b7d-56a5-45aa-9f26-940d90bb207d.author: Pierre de Coubertin

c66859ee-ac11-497f-9346-73b1f1748b1d.quote: To love means loving the unlovable. To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. Faith means believing the unbelievable. Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.
c66859ee-ac11-497f-9346-73b1f1748b1d.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

6b9d096b-5757-449c-8bff-3767228744d9.quote: The best form of flattery is to be admired, imitated or respected. I've always felt proud our fans look up to us or feel we are inspirational.
6b9d096b-5757-449c-8bff-3767228744d9.author: Cheryl James

d3ec383a-4259-4aae-a095-61268d5b64a0.quote: Sports is the common denominator in the world that brings everyone together. If there's any one place in the world where there is equality, it is probably sports. That was something that didn't always exist. We've come a long way in sports. Why can't society use sports as a way to bring people together and create change?
d3ec383a-4259-4aae-a095-61268d5b64a0.author: Stephen M. Ross

b5647a69-4444-49d1-8b77-feccc3859e26.quote: I always like a woman in power in politics. I think they're pretty inspirational in terms of looks to begin with. It's very calculated.
b5647a69-4444-49d1-8b77-feccc3859e26.author: Chris Benz

f0713aee-168b-4df6-8f63-173e450055ce.quote: You need three things to win: discipline, hard work and, before everything maybe, commitment. No one will make it without those three. Sport teaches you that.
f0713aee-168b-4df6-8f63-173e450055ce.author: Haile Gebrselassie

72e394eb-bd6f-4a7a-bfd8-ca856610c302.quote: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
72e394eb-bd6f-4a7a-bfd8-ca856610c302.author: Neil Armstrong

75b598f2-5dc1-46c3-ad3a-ebac87289c68.quote: Do your little bit of good where you are; its those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
75b598f2-5dc1-46c3-ad3a-ebac87289c68.author: Desmond Tutu

55857196-fdae-4225-8d32-0febd1270967.quote: Dance never really goes away; it just reforms and reinvents, and it's become more athletic with new connection to fitness and sport. Dance used to have this exclusivity, but not any more.
55857196-fdae-4225-8d32-0febd1270967.author: Bonnie Langford

bec8d9eb-294c-4892-8962-4ab0d9c040af.quote: Crave for a thing, you will get it. Renounce the craving, the object will follow you by itself.
bec8d9eb-294c-4892-8962-4ab0d9c040af.author: Swami Sivananda

984b92a3-767e-4b99-b1d6-087c9d1dd5d4.quote: The great thing about sports is you constantly have to prove yourself. You constantly have to go out there and do it, day in and day out.
984b92a3-767e-4b99-b1d6-087c9d1dd5d4.author: Grant Hill

7bc430b7-b70f-407d-a7b8-d8ae309de3f4.quote: I did some sports. It was a bit frustrating. I wasn't the greatest sports person.
7bc430b7-b70f-407d-a7b8-d8ae309de3f4.author: Tim Burton

8d2bd479-b6f3-4782-b947-5d34957c8ee5.quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
8d2bd479-b6f3-4782-b947-5d34957c8ee5.author: Leo Buscaglia

7516d5c7-c0eb-48d6-871c-30d21180848e.quote: Don't force your kids into sports. I never was. To this day, my dad has never asked me to go play golf. I ask him. It's the child's desire to play that matters, not the parent's desire to have the child play. Fun. Keep it fun.
7516d5c7-c0eb-48d6-871c-30d21180848e.author: Tiger Woods

3108dfdf-edca-41ce-9161-31e88340a569.quote: I'm girlie in the sense that I like makeup, but I also love sports and man food.
3108dfdf-edca-41ce-9161-31e88340a569.author: Carrie Underwood

11be4711-2091-4148-a54c-b28ed064aacd.quote: In sports, people reach their peak very early. You have to move on. I don't know if I will ever surpass what I did at the Olympics, but I'm still doing the work I always wanted to do.
11be4711-2091-4148-a54c-b28ed064aacd.author: Greg Louganis

06cc3ff4-3675-4109-9f82-c61d3bfcc3d2.quote: I just was in the second round. That's painful, because always is tough to lose, but well, that's sport. You win, you lose.
06cc3ff4-3675-4109-9f82-c61d3bfcc3d2.author: Rafael Nadal

ad0886e0-e7ee-4987-87d5-4b8e2a274914.quote: The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible.
ad0886e0-e7ee-4987-87d5-4b8e2a274914.author: Arthur C. Clarke

842c6849-545d-4264-a910-2f46a3971652.quote: Set your sights high, the higher the better. Expect the most wonderful things to happen, not in the future but right now. Realize that nothing is too good. Allow absolutely nothing to hamper you or hold you up in any way.
842c6849-545d-4264-a910-2f46a3971652.author: Eileen Caddy

426093f8-ac48-4a7c-930e-9690f71b68a3.quote: Brand is not a product, that's for sure; it's not one item. It's an idea, it's a theory, it's a meaning, it's how you carry yourself. It's aspirational, it's inspirational.
426093f8-ac48-4a7c-930e-9690f71b68a3.author: Kevin Plank

b47d6cfa-c4f7-4151-9ae3-d3421807bba1.quote: My son is trying to be a sports writer, and my daughter is a college student. She wants to be a comedy writer, and she's at film school. I discouraged both of them early on from getting involved in Starbucks. I didn't think it would be fair; plus, they didn't have any interest anyway.
b47d6cfa-c4f7-4151-9ae3-d3421807bba1.author: Howard Schultz

325d3d29-fd7f-48da-b50c-a70a1c01d1ae.quote: I'd like to one day be featured on a list of inspirational people who have made a difference in the world, whether it be helping underprivileged people or putting an end to the poaching of wildlife in Africa.
325d3d29-fd7f-48da-b50c-a70a1c01d1ae.author: Candice Swanepoel

9e7af3d1-9a77-4bd8-b197-3505c3caac9a.quote: I am a proud product of Irish golf and the Golfing Union of Ireland and am hugely honoured to have come from very rich Irish sporting roots... I am also a proud Ulsterman who grew up in Northern Ireland. That is my background and always will be.
9e7af3d1-9a77-4bd8-b197-3505c3caac9a.author: Rory McIlroy

1d2354cc-4ba2-4ebe-aa40-53159b1a7bf3.quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
1d2354cc-4ba2-4ebe-aa40-53159b1a7bf3.author: John F. Kennedy

678d2c3d-4740-41ad-99fe-0f0601f445ef.quote: Every child should have time for arts, music, sports, drama, robotics, school newspapers and the like, not to mention recess and play.
678d2c3d-4740-41ad-99fe-0f0601f445ef.author: Chris Gabrieli

c569a98b-139d-43b9-8736-48922d15e5ee.quote: Sports betting is all about money management, so the most money won on one event is not the most important thing.
c569a98b-139d-43b9-8736-48922d15e5ee.author: Bruce Dern

34c574ab-6a2d-4166-a950-e82e3c2777ac.quote: This is my 20th year in the sport. I've known swimming and that's it. I don't want to swim past age 30; if I continue after this Olympics, and come back in 2016, I'll be 31. I'm looking forward to being able to see the other side of the fence.
34c574ab-6a2d-4166-a950-e82e3c2777ac.author: Michael Phelps

a2f14c44-1d4f-49e9-a2a2-f4fd1568c8b4.quote: Life is a full-contact sport, and there's a score up on the board.
a2f14c44-1d4f-49e9-a2a2-f4fd1568c8b4.author: Phil McGraw

7c161448-4c22-4669-a2a0-89057ef92d0c.quote: I've realized the extraordinary power of sports to heal, unite and inspire. I believe the Olympics will serve as the ultimate platform to provide positive changes and I hope to inspire all of Japan through my strong showing there.
7c161448-4c22-4669-a2a0-89057ef92d0c.author: Kohei Uchimura

02b2ef1e-2162-4d0a-8766-380583c96540.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
02b2ef1e-2162-4d0a-8766-380583c96540.author: Ronald Reagan

ceb54d60-5197-4ac0-bf8d-7a163bb1134a.quote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
ceb54d60-5197-4ac0-bf8d-7a163bb1134a.author: Michael Jordan

cd246a63-cd04-4e02-bf0c-57fa3e43b352.quote: The reason sport is attractive to many of the general public is that it's filled with reversals. What you think may happen doesn't happen. A champion is beaten, an unknown becomes a champion.
cd246a63-cd04-4e02-bf0c-57fa3e43b352.author: Roger Bannister

0d8637c8-e48b-4fda-b9b9-45a3f70f8b58.quote: As the Olympic torch neared Lake Placid, N.Y., in 1980, signaling the opening of that year's Winter Olympics, newspapers and magazines throughout the world offered predictions on who would win medals in the major sports. Not a single publication gave the American men's hockey team a chance against the world powers.
0d8637c8-e48b-4fda-b9b9-45a3f70f8b58.author: Don Yaeger

46a3030d-5b0b-418a-8779-2666ac994823.quote: The game of golf would lose a great deal if croquet mallets and billiard cues were allowed on the putting green.
46a3030d-5b0b-418a-8779-2666ac994823.author: Ernest Hemingway

49a6b67d-5ca3-4c5d-8681-7e27b55fa6ac.quote: Boxing is a celebration of the lost religion of masculinity all the more trenchant for its being lost.
49a6b67d-5ca3-4c5d-8681-7e27b55fa6ac.author: Joyce Carol Oates

87d3f6a6-1f3d-4b6b-b795-02d7d32a46d2.quote: The will to succeed is important, but what's more important is the will to prepare.
87d3f6a6-1f3d-4b6b-b795-02d7d32a46d2.author: Bobby Knight

3370b8fc-0c81-463f-a63d-491ebcb2cd75.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
3370b8fc-0c81-463f-a63d-491ebcb2cd75.author: Muhammad Ali

d8b7524f-1a13-4859-a98a-ce449aa9b75f.quote: I was a total athlete. I loved sports, but when I realized I wasn't going to be a professional athlete, I realized I wanted to be in movies.
d8b7524f-1a13-4859-a98a-ce449aa9b75f.author: Seann William Scott

cf2f22f2-7784-4413-8197-51b6b06b0199.quote: I'm not buddy-buddy with the players. If they need a buddy, let them buy a dog.
cf2f22f2-7784-4413-8197-51b6b06b0199.author: Whitey Herzog

69a39ad8-e22f-4ac6-b914-50b032c019e6.quote: Get action. Seize the moment. Man was never intended to become an oyster.
69a39ad8-e22f-4ac6-b914-50b032c019e6.author: Theodore Roosevelt

ef8c4033-13d8-48a0-8779-d1cacb5b4b95.quote: I find interesting characters or lessons that resonate with people and sometimes I write about them in the sports pages, sometimes I write them in a column, sometimes in a novel, sometimes a play or sometimes in nonfiction. But at the core I always say to myself, 'Is there a story here? Is this something people want to read?'
ef8c4033-13d8-48a0-8779-d1cacb5b4b95.author: Mitch Albom

41ade430-f5d5-4f89-b2e5-109606bfeacc.quote: Sport is one of the few spaces where people can learn about different cultures in a spirit of trust and friendship.
41ade430-f5d5-4f89-b2e5-109606bfeacc.author: Richard Attias

f72306e0-3a2e-42a5-8353-6988306684b4.quote: I believe that if one always looked at the skies, one would end up with wings.
f72306e0-3a2e-42a5-8353-6988306684b4.author: Gustave Flaubert

16d0125a-a01c-46a9-9766-2775be02c58f.quote: You had to be into sport and, sad to say, I'm a traitor to my country because I don't have a sporting bone in my body.
16d0125a-a01c-46a9-9766-2775be02c58f.author: Geoffrey Rush

dea3d2dd-b93e-4b2a-b7b5-ab028e08201b.quote: As athletes, we're used to reacting quickly. Here, it's 'come, stop, come, stop.' There's a lot of downtime. That's the toughest part of the day.
dea3d2dd-b93e-4b2a-b7b5-ab028e08201b.author: Michael Jordan

241ffe74-1e39-4244-99b8-13c51ef76d7e.quote: Where is women's sports prominently displayed with the men? Tennis is the only thing I can think of.
241ffe74-1e39-4244-99b8-13c51ef76d7e.author: Ronda Rousey

bdd8dde3-e38a-43b4-a31a-d23751e643d7.quote: I wanted to use sports for social change.
bdd8dde3-e38a-43b4-a31a-d23751e643d7.author: Billie Jean King

71e108b0-4625-4edd-b46b-3c03d2596faf.quote: Being famous gets me good concert tickets, good tables in restaurants, good seats at sporting events and that's really about it.
71e108b0-4625-4edd-b46b-3c03d2596faf.author: Fran Drescher

d152b84b-acbc-4fdf-8ebc-404c8628f4f8.quote: I still feel that in India we look upon sports as a recreational activity - which it is - but people have to understand that there is a career in sports. It's not just necessary to be a doctor or a lawyer or an engineer, as most of us Indians appear to think that our children should grow up to be.
d152b84b-acbc-4fdf-8ebc-404c8628f4f8.author: Abhishek Bachchan

12cac2ec-ec97-497e-b0d3-15e0dbc966d3.quote: Sports have become increasingly more specialized, but that doesn't mean they shouldn't be fun.
12cac2ec-ec97-497e-b0d3-15e0dbc966d3.author: Mia Hamm

e7ec9a70-a298-4ba8-9129-ccfd881dbd24.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
e7ec9a70-a298-4ba8-9129-ccfd881dbd24.author: Kyle Chandler

ce2efe67-f97d-43b4-b271-44acfe7f9e42.quote: I won't have any competitive instincts in any sports, other than golf. I can't see being competitive in sports any more.
ce2efe67-f97d-43b4-b271-44acfe7f9e42.author: Michael Jordan

aa282632-beb6-46e0-9893-702b49bfe4f6.quote: Sport must be accessible to working class youth.
aa282632-beb6-46e0-9893-702b49bfe4f6.author: Pierre de Coubertin

6ff4e334-3e5d-4f38-affb-da07edf82452.quote: The authentic self is the soul made visible.
6ff4e334-3e5d-4f38-affb-da07edf82452.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

2169aa01-56cb-4a55-9f59-4ef1d58ec8c0.quote: I think exercise tests us in so many ways, our skills, our hearts, our ability to bounce back after setbacks. This is the inner beauty of sports and competition, and it can serve us all well as adult athletes.
2169aa01-56cb-4a55-9f59-4ef1d58ec8c0.author: Peggy Fleming

bec0102e-5092-4a0e-9936-2aceacc54f7b.quote: So I developed very early a massive inferiority complex, and I've told the story often about how that inspired me later in life to get involved in other things, because I couldn't out-do my brothers in sports, and it's a very competitive relationship.
bec0102e-5092-4a0e-9936-2aceacc54f7b.author: George J. Mitchell

a33b87fc-1cca-43a6-a4b8-e888eee37ff8.quote: Once you become an owner of a team, you get so much more into the sport and you can't help it. So I really love NFL football now to the degree of following it much more than I did previously.
a33b87fc-1cca-43a6-a4b8-e888eee37ff8.author: Paul Allen

bd557a12-38de-4489-9ed9-d3e54e616c3d.quote: I've been known to write 10 pages a day for 10 days running before I take a breath. I am not a disciplined writer. I'm one of those people who laughingly call themselves inspirational writers, which basically means someone who has no control over their own creative process.
bd557a12-38de-4489-9ed9-d3e54e616c3d.author: Catherine Ryan Hyde

42aa02cb-e3eb-4cd1-b402-67a901391b20.quote: My father, Oliver Hynes, was an educator. He was originally just a teacher, a very good one, but then he was promoted to be in charge of education for the entire area. He was always an inspirational teacher. He was my big personal supporter, always coming here for the Tony Awards. My mother, Carmel, was a homemaker.
42aa02cb-e3eb-4cd1-b402-67a901391b20.author: Garry Hynes

07bf201a-3bf2-40c1-90fe-94ce51d1bb0f.quote: God loves to help him who strives to help himself.
07bf201a-3bf2-40c1-90fe-94ce51d1bb0f.author: Aeschylus

849b8338-2e93-4d2d-8440-6b315fd091a0.quote: I was an All-American in wrestling in high school, was National Champion in Chinese kickboxing in 1999 and have spent a lot of time around professional athletes, which includes my eight-plus years as CEO of a sports nutrition company.
849b8338-2e93-4d2d-8440-6b315fd091a0.author: Timothy Ferriss

f9a46c5b-adc7-4783-950e-04c967910dcf.quote: Baseball is drama with an endless run and an ever-changing cast.
f9a46c5b-adc7-4783-950e-04c967910dcf.author: Joe Garagiola

d86b406c-1368-483e-903c-aa7448ab3702.quote: I like to make my fights exciting and different. Everybody in UFC can fight; we're capable of kickboxing, wrestling, but I like to stand out. That's what I really pride myself on. What can I do to stand out from the other people in my sport.
d86b406c-1368-483e-903c-aa7448ab3702.author: Anthony Pettis

dab1d18d-692f-4b28-9cc2-85ece41a27e7.quote: If you see in sports at a super high level, people get hurt or have injuries when there isn't that pleasure, the true pleasure of the sport, when they're tired or demoralized or they're not quite focused.
dab1d18d-692f-4b28-9cc2-85ece41a27e7.author: David Belle

9bd0d992-9767-46e2-83e0-6ca4c8339725.quote: When money comes into play then that's all it's about wanting money, who's making the most who can get the most, me, me me... and in the end it screws up the person and the sport.
9bd0d992-9767-46e2-83e0-6ca4c8339725.author: Alexis Arguello

5828bcb4-2ae0-4cb5-80be-315661008b79.quote: I am deliberate and afraid of nothing.
5828bcb4-2ae0-4cb5-80be-315661008b79.author: Audre Lorde

9854f463-5611-45c6-adde-310ea0ae6ac4.quote: Psychology is much bigger than just medicine, or fixing unhealthy things. It's about education, work, marriage - it's even about sports. What I want to do is see psychologists working to help people build strengths in all these domains.
9854f463-5611-45c6-adde-310ea0ae6ac4.author: Martin Seligman

eb2b048b-73cf-4d85-b478-67e04b61d070.quote: It's our responsibility for the village to say, 'Hey we're going to create these programs,' whether it's sports, creative arts, music, we need some things to give young people positive things to do, and that's including jobs.
eb2b048b-73cf-4d85-b478-67e04b61d070.author: Common

a22ebb39-8764-4267-bac6-8e6a94b4a51a.quote: I think extreme sports are really good for relieving stress.
a22ebb39-8764-4267-bac6-8e6a94b4a51a.author: Dave Chappelle

f06d6f37-5d83-4edc-aaeb-2da6c8e3544a.quote: There are so many different elements to surfing. Small waves, big waves, long boards, short boards. This makes it a sport you can share with people. It's not just a solitary thing - it's become a family thing, too. It's about exercising and passing something on from father to son, and from mother to daughter.
f06d6f37-5d83-4edc-aaeb-2da6c8e3544a.author: Kelly Slater

80bc28fe-3eb0-43fb-b9de-b901888537cb.quote: You've got to enjoy time with your family and friends, and if you're involved in sports franchises, those peak moments in playoff games. You have to enjoy life.
80bc28fe-3eb0-43fb-b9de-b901888537cb.author: Paul Allen

fc9e59d0-e1ba-487b-90c7-b01f3fe255d8.quote: When I was a kid, I played sports a lot. My mom and dad were divorced, but I hung out in the neighborhood a lot, and it was all about sports. I would be out all day on the sand lot or on the hockey rink. My dad would take me to baseball games, but he worked so hard, and he would always fall asleep.
fc9e59d0-e1ba-487b-90c7-b01f3fe255d8.author: Alex Gibney

65e9c4f7-8e97-4c7f-9951-5ce2415b8fd7.quote: Without craftsmanship, inspiration is a mere reed shaken in the wind.
65e9c4f7-8e97-4c7f-9951-5ce2415b8fd7.author: Johannes Brahms

5c0813cd-6026-43b6-91bc-1e16aa765ca9.quote: Never give in and never give up.
5c0813cd-6026-43b6-91bc-1e16aa765ca9.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

74cc53b1-b489-48d2-93b9-5e5b8dba0bfb.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I - I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
74cc53b1-b489-48d2-93b9-5e5b8dba0bfb.author: Robert Frost

a5e6d255-960f-4b8c-8f13-e9fcecde4065.quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
a5e6d255-960f-4b8c-8f13-e9fcecde4065.author: Michael Jordan

cdfe9dfa-256e-45f2-babd-39863564f1a2.quote: Baseball life is a tough life on the family.
cdfe9dfa-256e-45f2-babd-39863564f1a2.author: Nolan Ryan

fc7de5f7-11bb-4ef7-b760-ae5e8a011b26.quote: I enjoy sports movies that don't sugarcoat. One thing that irritates me about sports movies is that they're like, 'The magic of the ball,' and 'The magic of the stadium.' It ain't that magical. When you get hit coming across the middle at 25 miles per hour, the magic's over.
fc7de5f7-11bb-4ef7-b760-ae5e8a011b26.author: Terry Crews

d5257016-0d99-49f7-b93d-1fa203f712a6.quote: Mental strength is really important because you either win or lose in your mind. And I'm not solely talking about sporting matches, boxing events - anything you do, you do it first with your mental strength. And you can actually train and develop it, and I am responsible for what I'm saying because I have experience with that.
d5257016-0d99-49f7-b93d-1fa203f712a6.author: Wladimir Klitschko

acf3dd24-7577-47cc-815e-db0347fa7b94.quote: Growing up, in church we had the homily; at home it's what I call the 'momily' - the inspirational and instructive mom-isms that every family has.
acf3dd24-7577-47cc-815e-db0347fa7b94.author: Christine Pelosi

e9a1fb10-940e-4b70-8790-225112f4fbb3.quote: Sport is and should remain a great school of life that supports young people in their personal development. It teaches respect for others and also for oneself.
e9a1fb10-940e-4b70-8790-225112f4fbb3.author: Richard Attias

42bbd88b-4097-43e7-9d8b-4be2f8c49199.quote: It is not up to me whether I win or lose. Ultimately, this might not be my day. And it is that philosophy towards sports, something that I really truly live by. I am emotional. I want to win. I am hungry. I am a competitor. I have that fire. But deep down, I truly enjoy the art of competing so much more than the result.
42bbd88b-4097-43e7-9d8b-4be2f8c49199.author: Apolo Ohno

a6408d37-4fbb-44dc-9d5b-e4b322c8704c.quote: If I weren't earning $3 million a year to dunk a basketball, most people on the street would run in the other direction if they saw me coming.
a6408d37-4fbb-44dc-9d5b-e4b322c8704c.author: Charles Barkley

5a3e75dd-d052-4502-95cb-bf94677771d1.quote: If you want to perform at your ultimate best, if you want to be the best you can be in sports and in school, mentally, physically - chiropractic is the way, because everything has to do with your nervous system.
5a3e75dd-d052-4502-95cb-bf94677771d1.author: Jonathan Lipnicki

aa1ff83c-8303-422c-985e-858e1c614ba3.quote: Each day provides its own gifts.
aa1ff83c-8303-422c-985e-858e1c614ba3.author: Marcus Aurelius

d4190f4c-9607-4926-a07a-c9ccfc777e9d.quote: I think that the reason for my success is that I am really not aspirational. I am inspirational in that the people at home feel like they can really relate to me.
d4190f4c-9607-4926-a07a-c9ccfc777e9d.author: Rosie O'Donnell

189e608b-b755-4bc7-9818-7f9c928c7dea.quote: In the sports arena I would say there is nothing like training and preparation. You have to train your mind as much as your body.
189e608b-b755-4bc7-9818-7f9c928c7dea.author: Venus Williams

0f841852-3375-46a9-951d-a70b48205a0a.quote: Life wasn't easy growing up; it was frustrating. If I had been a better reader, then that would have come easily, sports would have come easily, everything would have come easily, and I never would have realized that the way you get ahead in life is hard work.
0f841852-3375-46a9-951d-a70b48205a0a.author: Caitlyn Jenner

60eddb57-2704-4317-bcb6-b6cfcaa8de91.quote: Football is a simple game. Twenty-two men chase a ball for 90 minutes and at the end, the Germans always win.
60eddb57-2704-4317-bcb6-b6cfcaa8de91.author: Gary Lineker

a52eedfb-bcb8-4758-a678-89b58b20b15d.quote: I like every single actor or actress in the world, because we never know what the conditions are like when they are working. I give everyone the benefit of the doubt and root for them like a psychotic sports fan.
a52eedfb-bcb8-4758-a678-89b58b20b15d.author: Judd Nelson

b12cf43c-63d0-4030-96f5-8aed52a640d6.quote: Baseball has the great advantage over cricket of being sooner ended.
b12cf43c-63d0-4030-96f5-8aed52a640d6.author: George Bernard Shaw

b0efd150-7524-4a79-9e2b-cf63f5037ee6.quote: Together with a culture of work, there must be a culture of leisure as gratification. To put it another way: people who work must take the time to relax, to be with their families, to enjoy themselves, read, listen to music, play a sport.
b0efd150-7524-4a79-9e2b-cf63f5037ee6.author: Pope Francis

8edf4b47-30d1-4a2d-bf6d-04ad65e82bf8.quote: My uncles and other relatives are against encouraging girls in every aspect, and that includes sports. I hardly interact with them. My parents are more open. They back me all the way.
8edf4b47-30d1-4a2d-bf6d-04ad65e82bf8.author: Saina Nehwal

230cdd98-d5f9-4c6d-89ee-ef1442df2db7.quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
230cdd98-d5f9-4c6d-89ee-ef1442df2db7.author: Democritus

c012f414-1ebb-4e78-97b7-28c00ef6e48b.quote: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.
c012f414-1ebb-4e78-97b7-28c00ef6e48b.author: Michael Phelps

57e89939-6685-4890-ad5e-30d83ed758f7.quote: People ask me what I do in winter when there's no baseball. I'll tell you what I do. I stare out the window and wait for spring.
57e89939-6685-4890-ad5e-30d83ed758f7.author: Rogers Hornsby

f98c884e-1992-44e6-9abe-5735227e350b.quote: Sport allows us to engage in dialogue and to build bridges, and it may even have the capacity to reshape international relations. The Olympic Games embody perfectly this universal mission.
f98c884e-1992-44e6-9abe-5735227e350b.author: Richard Attias

3ab9f87b-b007-4dfc-84c4-badf653896a0.quote: I'd rather be a face for happiness and doing things that you have a passion for, rather than faking it and pretending like I'm this face of women's basketball, when I can't stand the sport at all.
3ab9f87b-b007-4dfc-84c4-badf653896a0.author: Elena Delle Donne

55b8d237-a961-4efc-9842-e2b7e00acbdf.quote: The fewer rules a coach has, the fewer rules there are for players to break.
55b8d237-a961-4efc-9842-e2b7e00acbdf.author: John Madden

e017df4c-45b7-4184-8242-b8899196befe.quote: Growing up, sports was my outlet, my way to portray a personality. I was very shy around people but, through sports, something I was good at, I was able to make friends.
e017df4c-45b7-4184-8242-b8899196befe.author: Curtis Joseph

1cba395f-845a-4703-bb03-a1f63f72a207.quote: Nobody wants to buy a $60,000 electric Civic. But people will pay $90,000 for an electric sports car.
1cba395f-845a-4703-bb03-a1f63f72a207.author: Elon Musk

ff3f03be-4b6b-444b-9ea9-e5e4a8e39a5f.quote: People are often quite surprised by the sport and leisure activities practised by the blind. For example, tandem cycling is very popular.
ff3f03be-4b6b-444b-9ea9-e5e4a8e39a5f.author: Andrea Bocelli

5a9af56e-2eb7-4e0e-882c-8ca0534cf3ac.quote: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.
5a9af56e-2eb7-4e0e-882c-8ca0534cf3ac.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

63920fd5-2cdf-4e85-8e28-c453dcc88bc7.quote: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
63920fd5-2cdf-4e85-8e28-c453dcc88bc7.author: Jessica Savitch

ec8eb0d5-e373-4a0d-8dc4-1ac776bd805f.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
ec8eb0d5-e373-4a0d-8dc4-1ac776bd805f.author: Thomas A. Edison

26632933-cc75-494d-8b5d-d3392c10c9ea.quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
26632933-cc75-494d-8b5d-d3392c10c9ea.author: Ben Okri

4a01cb6a-0bae-4e67-b123-97cee0cd3472.quote: Sports is the toy department of human life.
4a01cb6a-0bae-4e67-b123-97cee0cd3472.author: Howard Cosell

337b09ab-252b-4ff1-92fd-263d124fd2ad.quote: I know many people who are actually queasy about the idea that their kids may harbour sporting ambitions.
337b09ab-252b-4ff1-92fd-263d124fd2ad.author: Sebastian Coe

c1635a0d-4fc9-4479-83f3-9bf685c57d96.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
c1635a0d-4fc9-4479-83f3-9bf685c57d96.author: Dalai Lama

76ae3265-b7f6-41b6-9b13-892ad2c2238d.quote: I'll take photographs with kids. People who want to take photographs with me. People who like the movies. People who supported me. I'll do that all day, all night, that's fine. But the bombardment of the paparazzi is just... I truly don't understand. It just feels like this kind of gluttonous, horrific sport. It's like sport.
76ae3265-b7f6-41b6-9b13-892ad2c2238d.author: Johnny Depp

32b057c4-f006-4a43-b3dd-0f419acc4d76.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
32b057c4-f006-4a43-b3dd-0f419acc4d76.author: Carl Sagan

a24b27fa-d900-4a44-8793-47a2c2641a3e.quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
a24b27fa-d900-4a44-8793-47a2c2641a3e.author: Babe Ruth

b20a143a-3348-4f96-81be-a0c867e7c50d.quote: Reach for it. Push yourself as far as you can.
b20a143a-3348-4f96-81be-a0c867e7c50d.author: Christa McAuliffe

ae8cb75f-5674-4202-a500-0b283c82fa9d.quote: You always draw inspiration from your family or your parents if they've proven to be inspirational. My mother is someone who's always been inspirational to me.
ae8cb75f-5674-4202-a500-0b283c82fa9d.author: Dustin Clare

859c66b7-ce26-4827-b462-46cdd27102d6.quote: I learned early on, stay away from politics, stay away from religion and don't talk about sports. Those three right there will get you in trouble.
859c66b7-ce26-4827-b462-46cdd27102d6.author: Gabriel Iglesias

b258407e-d850-4265-9a4f-1f5e3200d164.quote: I'm a huge sports fan but have no interest in minutiae. I don't remember who won Super Bowls five years ago or listen to sports talk radio.
b258407e-d850-4265-9a4f-1f5e3200d164.author: Norm MacDonald

1deb9d25-bff1-4c9a-a98e-35b332548a9d.quote: A man has to learn that he cannot command things, but that he can command himself; that he cannot coerce the wills of others, but that he can mold and master his own will: and things serve him who serves Truth; people seek guidance of him who is master of himself.
1deb9d25-bff1-4c9a-a98e-35b332548a9d.author: James Allen

480d5c11-afbc-4dda-ae70-cdc41da07c10.quote: I regard golf as an expensive way of playing marbles.
480d5c11-afbc-4dda-ae70-cdc41da07c10.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

a975153a-177e-49f3-8218-3d5160f1ca35.quote: I love sports. I've played basketball, baseball, soccer, tennis, track and field growing up.
a975153a-177e-49f3-8218-3d5160f1ca35.author: Michael B. Jordan

5d78fc34-0761-451b-962f-27310df566c6.quote: For truly it is to be noted, that children's plays are not sports, and should be deemed as their most serious actions.
5d78fc34-0761-451b-962f-27310df566c6.author: Michel de Montaigne

136d9e0e-9fa0-4401-9098-4227fe939763.quote: Science has taught us, against all intuition, that apparently solid things like crystals and rocks are really almost entirely composed of empty space. And the familiar illustration is the nucleus of an atom is a fly in the middle of a sports stadium, and the next atom is in the next sports stadium.
136d9e0e-9fa0-4401-9098-4227fe939763.author: Richard Dawkins

046cfc7c-7d95-4e19-8135-d1ddeb85d846.quote: People can say whatever they want about the sport of bodybuilding, but to get prepared to do a contest or even think about doing a contest, or even to get into decent shape, it requires a certain amount of discipline, and it comes from taking a new year's resolution to a lifestyle.
046cfc7c-7d95-4e19-8135-d1ddeb85d846.author: John Cena

6a65cfed-9b11-4164-af80-c618e82e1132.quote: I have been listening to sport and watching sport on the BBC since I was a tiny boy.
6a65cfed-9b11-4164-af80-c618e82e1132.author: Allan McNish

51d995fa-aad1-486d-9cbc-d38b71127050.quote: I'm a sports fan. I'm not just an athlete who plays football.
51d995fa-aad1-486d-9cbc-d38b71127050.author: Reggie Bush

9995e23e-7486-49ab-afe5-b0e7fa63ad8e.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
9995e23e-7486-49ab-afe5-b0e7fa63ad8e.author: George Eliot

55ff841b-1c19-4c65-b956-d88f03b9e504.quote: Above all, such sports as judo, in my view, teach people to relate to each other. They teach us to respect a partner, teach us to understand that an externally weak partner can not only put up worthy resistance, but, if you relax and take too much for granted, may even win.
55ff841b-1c19-4c65-b956-d88f03b9e504.author: Vladimir Putin

cf3ac450-2010-49c2-a442-985315ad6358.quote: Sporting events like the Olympics have developed and maintained a clear message of promoting gender equality as an essential criterion in the success of any international event.
cf3ac450-2010-49c2-a442-985315ad6358.author: Richard Attias

edc3dfc1-82c5-4a45-9244-f8a0e132a74f.quote: Once I knew only darkness and stillness... my life was without past or future... but a little word from the fingers of another fell into my hand that clutched at emptiness, and my heart leaped to the rapture of living.
edc3dfc1-82c5-4a45-9244-f8a0e132a74f.author: Helen Keller

7b9fbb47-cb2e-46db-b4f2-34087b71b89b.quote: One of the most basic factors in sports is that winning becomes a habit, and losing is the same way. When failure starts to feel normal in your life or your work or even your darkest vices, you won't have to go looking for trouble, because trouble will find you. Count on it.
7b9fbb47-cb2e-46db-b4f2-34087b71b89b.author: Hunter S. Thompson

a7d1dec0-c3e6-41b0-8e5e-7170b2b19b2d.quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.
a7d1dec0-c3e6-41b0-8e5e-7170b2b19b2d.author: Thomas Aquinas

108758b9-fbdc-4d23-ada8-bae85664f9e7.quote: You spend a good piece of your life gripping a baseball and in the end it turns out that it was the other way around all the time.
108758b9-fbdc-4d23-ada8-bae85664f9e7.author: Jim Bouton

b1e0d24b-b90e-4e49-843e-ebae44a7907c.quote: Baseball is the greatest sport in the world. It is the cleanest, besides affording more people the right kind of amusement than any other. I do not say that because I have made my living at it. I say it from the heart.
b1e0d24b-b90e-4e49-843e-ebae44a7907c.author: Charles Comiskey

280953ac-7c09-4f5c-ad44-12b0da957b92.quote: I lived in a town of 400 until I was like nine or ten. My dad coached all the sports - he was a gym teacher and health teacher for grades K-12.
280953ac-7c09-4f5c-ad44-12b0da957b92.author: January Jones

cb1d120a-af77-43e6-943e-012be046aab6.quote: To me, it doesn't matter how good you are. Sport is all about playing and competing. Whatever you do in cricket and in sport, enjoy it, be positive and try to win.
cb1d120a-af77-43e6-943e-012be046aab6.author: Ian Botham

cb2feb84-f1b7-4850-80a3-3ae993dbe331.quote: I think what endurance sports teach you is to stay dedicated, stay focused, and also to understand you're going to have ups and downs, but you need to keep running right through them.
cb2feb84-f1b7-4850-80a3-3ae993dbe331.author: Kyrsten Sinema

d867efcf-36ff-4102-b45c-a966a0f5f5e0.quote: As a father, I believe that involving children in sports at a young age is generally, a wise proposition. I believe that healthy competition is... well... healthy; that sporting events foster a spirit of teamwork that far surpasses the events themselves; and that active participation keeps children moving and is good for their self-esteem.
d867efcf-36ff-4102-b45c-a966a0f5f5e0.author: Naveen Jain

a7f3a846-99aa-4cce-808e-a6cc81317197.quote: If you got the game, you got the game. That's why Tiger Woods is out there playing golf with Greg Norman.
a7f3a846-99aa-4cce-808e-a6cc81317197.author: Shaquille O'Neal

4851e106-706a-4017-bac1-009ca5f182ae.quote: I have a Ph.D. in philosophy and sports science. At 14, I went through this really tough Soviet training system. A lot of my roommates got psychologically broken or physically injured. Either you came through, or you were out. I made my Ph.D. work in the field of young athletes aged 14-19 because at this age any human is changing.
4851e106-706a-4017-bac1-009ca5f182ae.author: Wladimir Klitschko

6132f681-06e3-4328-8148-e9cfa8cd1917.quote: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.
6132f681-06e3-4328-8148-e9cfa8cd1917.author: Rose Kennedy

e621931c-4f29-424b-a7df-a8e6b60b3e11.quote: Discrimination and prejudice of any kind have no place in sports or in our society.
e621931c-4f29-424b-a7df-a8e6b60b3e11.author: Jerry Reinsdorf

db9944bc-48c4-4638-b818-a7d4c5f06e6c.quote: I myself am frustrated in just where sports are at. It's a hard thing when you're out there working every day, and you know that someone else is cheating and they may not necessarily get caught.
db9944bc-48c4-4638-b818-a7d4c5f06e6c.author: Allyson Felix

065f6dbc-02fe-4114-ab2a-66d643b2d80e.quote: I think what it takes to succeed remains the same. You have to have a real love of your sport to carry you through all the bad times, you still want to go ski even when things aren't working. You must have a commitment to work hard and to never give up.
065f6dbc-02fe-4114-ab2a-66d643b2d80e.author: Nancy Greene

96e957aa-020f-409b-9610-bdbec5b2f69d.quote: Sports teaches you there is always a second innings in life. If you fail today, there's a second innings maybe two days later. Maybe there's another opportunity coming up three or six months later. If you look at mistake as learnings and commit never to make a same mistake again, then you actually get better with every mistake that you make.
96e957aa-020f-409b-9610-bdbec5b2f69d.author: Harsha Bhogle

7665bccb-01ac-48b9-9d4b-fee60f98c21c.quote: Winning isn't everything, but playing and competing and striving and going through things can be a lot of fun and really important. As long as you're doing it in a way that's healthy, sports can be an incredible opportunity.
7665bccb-01ac-48b9-9d4b-fee60f98c21c.author: Andrew Shue

cdc72e99-bb12-4719-bafa-4bbad91d7b64.quote: The difference in golf and government is that in golf you can't improve your lie.
cdc72e99-bb12-4719-bafa-4bbad91d7b64.author: George Deukmejian

70f95519-a868-4470-adda-5833c381cfb1.quote: I worked at my high school newspaper at Andover, which came out weekly, unusual for a high school paper. Then my first day at Penn I went right to the 'Daily Pennsylvanian' and pretty much spent most of my college career working both as the sports editor and then editor of the editorial page.
70f95519-a868-4470-adda-5833c381cfb1.author: H. G. Bissinger

270dcf24-4485-41b9-b0c3-4c3b7032fb86.quote: I've always liked speed. I own a car that I shouldn't be talking about because I'm an environmentalist, but the 1955 Porsche Spyder 550 RS is the finest sports car ever made.
270dcf24-4485-41b9-b0c3-4c3b7032fb86.author: Robert Redford

b7aaf00e-f5d9-4e5f-8219-1316cb9e2de2.quote: Of course, in our grade school, in those days, there were no organized sports at all. We just went out and ran around the school yard for recess.
b7aaf00e-f5d9-4e5f-8219-1316cb9e2de2.author: Alan Shepard

632c01a3-2c76-4902-ab9a-52e0d9710265.quote: The biggest lesson from Africa was that life's joys come mostly from relationships and friendships, not from material things. I saw time and again how much fun Africans had with their families and friends and on the sports fields; they laughed all the time.
632c01a3-2c76-4902-ab9a-52e0d9710265.author: Andrew Shue

7a933168-560e-470f-a48c-717bd8ca3c55.quote: Our time here is magic! It's the only space you have to realize whatever it is that is beautiful, whatever is true, whatever is great, whatever is potential, whatever is rare, whatever is unique, in. It's the only space.
7a933168-560e-470f-a48c-717bd8ca3c55.author: Ben Okri

4133ff72-390c-46fd-9b3d-a3715d5e4b73.quote: The content and thematic materials of dance is, of itself, like boxing. You play tennis and baseball. But boxing is not a sport you play: you stand up and do it.
4133ff72-390c-46fd-9b3d-a3715d5e4b73.author: Twyla Tharp

293dd6ae-cba6-4af8-9a68-26104d7b5738.quote: My dad is the reason I actually started watching wrestling. My dad was never big into sports; we were all big into sports as kids, and he'd go to our Little League games or whatever and not really know what was going on, because he didn't know about sports, but he knew about wrestling.
293dd6ae-cba6-4af8-9a68-26104d7b5738.author: John Cena

cc3a8a18-c20a-4f1c-8c23-fb5c96d3e7bb.quote: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.
cc3a8a18-c20a-4f1c-8c23-fb5c96d3e7bb.author: Albert Schweitzer

eb4d7864-a6db-486f-a933-9b2e3414a89c.quote: If I make a change to a young kid to play any sport, not only tennis, instead of spending time in front of the TV or computer, that is good. I want to give them a good example: 'Hey, go out and play and see the world.'
eb4d7864-a6db-486f-a933-9b2e3414a89c.author: Ana Ivanovic

3f2dac4a-81b6-487d-a4a6-1cd77fa8d7ae.quote: You don't hurt 'em if you don't hit 'em.
3f2dac4a-81b6-487d-a4a6-1cd77fa8d7ae.author: Chesty Puller

12d957f3-01d5-40da-bd02-75ec1920df27.quote: I love sporting events and popcorn and pizza and being outside, like at a baseball or football game. I love amusement parks, going to ride roller coasters.
12d957f3-01d5-40da-bd02-75ec1920df27.author: Carrie Underwood

5307432f-55c8-4555-bdae-26f62e00e0fd.quote: Sport is not just about entertainment. It is equally about winning and losing, pooling and galvanising the energy of the youth, upgrading people's physical fitness and mental prowess.
5307432f-55c8-4555-bdae-26f62e00e0fd.author: Nita Ambani

601aa73c-fc3a-4c53-9ad7-0087f2a3c899.quote: You know, I never looked down the road and said, 'Hey look, one day, the Hall of Fame.' It's always about playing each and every game 100 percent and I thank my teammates for getting me into the Hall because football is a team sport, not an individual sport.
601aa73c-fc3a-4c53-9ad7-0087f2a3c899.author: Jerry Rice

0c7837dd-2e81-48fc-bfbf-ef382f41fbb6.quote: I like both athletic girls and girly girls. It depends on their personality. I like girls who can go out and play sports with me and throw the football around, but you don't want a girl who's too much tougher than you. I like brainy girls who can respond to what I'm saying.
0c7837dd-2e81-48fc-bfbf-ef382f41fbb6.author: Josh Hutcherson

83cbdfa6-56ac-43d4-97fe-422cd61bac1a.quote: A human being has so many skins inside, covering the depths of the heart. We know so many things, but we don't know ourselves! Why, thirty or forty skins or hides, as thick and hard as an ox's or bear's, cover the soul. Go into your own ground and learn to know yourself there.
83cbdfa6-56ac-43d4-97fe-422cd61bac1a.author: Meister Eckhart

44129555-32c8-4996-8b24-c49ce8f460f0.quote: I've been asked a lot lately if tennis is clean or not. I don't know any more how you judge whether a sport is clean. If one in 100 players is doping, in my eyes that isn't a clean sport.
44129555-32c8-4996-8b24-c49ce8f460f0.author: Andy Murray

04aa97b2-5800-44fe-aad3-ad7096345e6a.quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
04aa97b2-5800-44fe-aad3-ad7096345e6a.author: Buddha

5a1676d2-4963-4974-98a3-18d62bc3f494.quote: Good ideas are like Nike sports shoes. They may facilitate success for an athlete who possesses them, but on their own they are nothing but an overpriced pair of sneakers. Sports shoes don't win races. Athletes do.
5a1676d2-4963-4974-98a3-18d62bc3f494.author: Felix Dennis

4ed4c728-a4e1-4899-93ab-028d857efe66.quote: I like all the adventure sports but I like to do them in a safe way.
4ed4c728-a4e1-4899-93ab-028d857efe66.author: Catherine Bell

e5e3a449-439e-46d1-a44b-02f00a41b2eb.quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
e5e3a449-439e-46d1-a44b-02f00a41b2eb.author: Ella Fitzgerald

6bf45216-5bf0-4633-8751-ebd45a6922b4.quote: Sailing a boat calls for quick action, a blending of feeling with the wind and water as well as with the very heart and soul of the boat itself. Sailing teaches alertness and courage, and gives in return a joyousness and peace that but few sports afford.
6bf45216-5bf0-4633-8751-ebd45a6922b4.author: George Matthew Adams

4672e251-cbda-4f54-9295-92ddb018b5a7.quote: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
4672e251-cbda-4f54-9295-92ddb018b5a7.author: Bertrand Russell

1f46b8be-cd77-499b-b06f-1a172b737fd3.quote: Reverse every natural instinct and do the opposite of what you are inclined to do, and you will probably come very close to having a perfect golf swing.
1f46b8be-cd77-499b-b06f-1a172b737fd3.author: Ben Hogan

e7016e0f-426b-49ac-ada7-fce8650e8f14.quote: As an Olympic champion gymnast, I have always stayed involved in my sport.
e7016e0f-426b-49ac-ada7-fce8650e8f14.author: Nadia Comaneci

d158daf0-e00f-4f10-a8a3-4f1c0b6f1e50.quote: You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.
d158daf0-e00f-4f10-a8a3-4f1c0b6f1e50.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

03cbc9c8-0e2d-4df1-afcb-d00ca3ca7679.quote: I have amazing friends who have led inspirational lives.
03cbc9c8-0e2d-4df1-afcb-d00ca3ca7679.author: Andrew Shue

b6b2fe2e-99cb-4ea5-bd11-8e702e65b16c.quote: The handicap of deafness is not in the ear; it is in the mind.
b6b2fe2e-99cb-4ea5-bd11-8e702e65b16c.author: Marlee Matlin

95c05103-268b-4da7-9f21-e1399fe22711.quote: Volleyball was a lot of fun, but I knew it wasn't my sport.
95c05103-268b-4da7-9f21-e1399fe22711.author: Elena Delle Donne

14fdf0c9-d981-4d80-8378-d39f25cf9fc7.quote: Every day is a new opportunity. You can build on yesterday's success or put its failures behind and start over again. That's the way life is, with a new game every day, and that's the way baseball is.
14fdf0c9-d981-4d80-8378-d39f25cf9fc7.author: Bob Feller

788467b9-10b2-42c4-a094-089b96812407.quote: Having inched closer and accomplished some of my major goals in the sport of golf, no pun intended, why not work as hard as I can to attain those goals if I'm already feeling like I'm playing well and getting more and more comfortable.
788467b9-10b2-42c4-a094-089b96812407.author: Jordan Spieth

31b06ecd-7f03-4248-bb9e-5564c3a598bb.quote: The Olympic Games must not be an end in itself, they must be a means of creating a vast programme of physical education and sports competitions for all young people.
31b06ecd-7f03-4248-bb9e-5564c3a598bb.author: Avery Brundage

e1c1a4e8-897d-461d-96c5-b9f3b946e913.quote: There is no life without sport and no sport without competition.
e1c1a4e8-897d-461d-96c5-b9f3b946e913.author: Randeep Hooda

a5d672a3-7c07-4595-ae5f-219774db3543.quote: Let each man exercise the art he knows.
a5d672a3-7c07-4595-ae5f-219774db3543.author: Aristophanes

80373f7c-97f2-4893-a0b1-2b7a973e2ee1.quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
80373f7c-97f2-4893-a0b1-2b7a973e2ee1.author: Richard Bach

54e1cff7-0df0-4bf4-b3fd-9c0a3e01179d.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
54e1cff7-0df0-4bf4-b3fd-9c0a3e01179d.author: Norman Vincent Peale

830a57bd-e5d5-49fe-945e-2a8ba6047e49.quote: If you look at all the sports in China, the government is extremely involved and they are extremely proud of their athlete.
830a57bd-e5d5-49fe-945e-2a8ba6047e49.author: Patrick Chan

1568a89e-4c36-4d9a-af4a-19b72dfcec45.quote: Video games offer violent messages, and even the sports video games include taunting and teasing.
1568a89e-4c36-4d9a-af4a-19b72dfcec45.author: Geoffrey Canada

a6baed20-33db-4639-8607-c253a4590649.quote: Jeremy Lin is the only Asian American in the NBA today and one of the few in any professional U.S. sport. His arrival is surely leading other talented Asian American athletes this week to contemplate a pro career.
a6baed20-33db-4639-8607-c253a4590649.author: Eric Liu

8203d1a9-f4a5-4115-bb57-ce5df814ffe9.quote: I would probably work with Drake as he is massively inspirational to me as a writer as well as an artist. If not him, then Susan Boyle!
8203d1a9-f4a5-4115-bb57-ce5df814ffe9.author: Conor Maynard

7d06499e-5e62-46de-9b13-748404174b57.quote: In the Bible it says God has made everything good for man to eat and to wear their skins. Whenever we eat beef, we eat chicken, we have to kill to eat. But at the same time, hunting is a sport. I think it is a great sport... I would say most hunters are Christian men.
7d06499e-5e62-46de-9b13-748404174b57.author: Luke Scott

79229ac4-b0b4-466a-9d2c-07b72c0be67f.quote: I won't predict anything historic. But nothing is impossible.
79229ac4-b0b4-466a-9d2c-07b72c0be67f.author: Michael Phelps

b8f08d17-58d2-4787-b569-c40ddba9ef9b.quote: I see similarities in the sports I played growing up in the sense of how I tackle a role when I get a job. A lot of effort goes in on an individual basis. There is a lot of time spent by yourself working on your craft and what you have to do. But, at the end of the day, you're there to serve the movie just like you would the rugby team.
b8f08d17-58d2-4787-b569-c40ddba9ef9b.author: Luke Bracey

7b4f8c6b-bba7-4dfd-8ffb-085a9cc04fc6.quote: Success comprises in itself the seeds of its own decline and sport is not spared by this law.
7b4f8c6b-bba7-4dfd-8ffb-085a9cc04fc6.author: Pierre de Coubertin

d4e877d7-f33d-461e-b65c-7c7b110244af.quote: Be not entangled in this world of days and nights; Thou hast another time and space as well.
d4e877d7-f33d-461e-b65c-7c7b110244af.author: Muhammad Iqbal

5edb2ac6-1605-480b-8c07-c38184e88b03.quote: I like sports, and I enjoy playing basketball and lifting weights.
5edb2ac6-1605-480b-8c07-c38184e88b03.author: Joel Osteen

a22dba9a-5601-40e9-b1bc-2d23fa7bc322.quote: We all know that Americans love their statistics - in sport, obviously. And in finance too.
a22dba9a-5601-40e9-b1bc-2d23fa7bc322.author: Evan Davis

7353fa6f-d479-4432-aad3-d587c07379f4.quote: Like the United Nations, there is something inspirational about New York as a great melting pot of different cultures and traditions. And if this is the city that never sleeps, the United Nations works tirelessly, around the clock around the world.
7353fa6f-d479-4432-aad3-d587c07379f4.author: Ban Ki-moon

1f2e9a3a-53e1-4d0e-bda1-eeee9b33e2af.quote: Apart from education, you need good health, and for that, you need to play sports.
1f2e9a3a-53e1-4d0e-bda1-eeee9b33e2af.author: Kapil Dev

c2ba65ef-a28d-49ff-97e0-3b1d7997cd65.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
c2ba65ef-a28d-49ff-97e0-3b1d7997cd65.author: Theodore Roosevelt

c1f32ae2-bdee-4d68-9229-54f72f9fa861.quote: I used to play sports. Then I realized you can buy trophies. Now I am good at everything.
c1f32ae2-bdee-4d68-9229-54f72f9fa861.author: Demetri Martin

a20e6586-4a68-4102-8a0f-7464fb317a8d.quote: You'll be dedicated and that's what you should want to be in anything in life - whether it's sports or academics or your relationship. It all stems from finding that fun, that thrill, that excitement.
a20e6586-4a68-4102-8a0f-7464fb317a8d.author: Brandi Chastain

eb7c1f9f-3ead-47dc-971f-0ef855d2c36e.quote: I want to be an inspirational model. I want people to look at me and say, 'Wow, she looks healthy.'
eb7c1f9f-3ead-47dc-971f-0ef855d2c36e.author: Ireland Baldwin

0d233e30-6fef-4faf-94e2-5b308d804495.quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
0d233e30-6fef-4faf-94e2-5b308d804495.author: Benjamin Franklin

d2a21da3-8e54-4da5-99dd-ba88647621ef.quote: As soon as you take money for playing sport, it isn't sport, it's work.
d2a21da3-8e54-4da5-99dd-ba88647621ef.author: Avery Brundage

89cc25ce-1f97-482c-936b-39b395c954fb.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
89cc25ce-1f97-482c-936b-39b395c954fb.author: Steve Jobs

03dd5d90-dc35-44a2-aee1-28b478ea44c9.quote: I never in my wildest imagination dreamed that I would somehow become a sports commentator.
03dd5d90-dc35-44a2-aee1-28b478ea44c9.author: Joe Rogan

fd35a505-d20f-45fa-afe6-987f0744bca0.quote: I have a love-hate relationship with the Grammys because I don't see the music world as a competitive sport.
fd35a505-d20f-45fa-afe6-987f0744bca0.author: James Taylor

c5753c6b-069c-4bfd-90a9-cb1c00084541.quote: The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.
c5753c6b-069c-4bfd-90a9-cb1c00084541.author: Philip Emeagwali

6ff4da6d-1708-46c6-bfda-fe04f151166e.quote: Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting.
6ff4da6d-1708-46c6-bfda-fe04f151166e.author: Christopher Morley

62222907-30bd-4635-954e-2f74397789c4.quote: If it doesn't matter who wins or loses, then why do they keep score?
62222907-30bd-4635-954e-2f74397789c4.author: Vince Lombardi

2098a529-95b2-4c2f-b929-9d171cf3ea56.quote: I believe that one defines oneself by reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself. To cut yourself out of stone.
2098a529-95b2-4c2f-b929-9d171cf3ea56.author: Henry Rollins

b0e57e50-18ed-4ffc-98e4-4e53b221e84e.quote: We play a sport. It's a game. At the end of the day, that's all it is, is a game. It doesn't make you any better or any worse than anybody else. So by winning a game, you're no better. By losing a game, you're no worse. I think by keeping that mentality, it really keeps things in perspective for me to treat everybody the same.
b0e57e50-18ed-4ffc-98e4-4e53b221e84e.author: Tim Tebow

f1e3f297-2255-4577-99d5-73a1ef20f352.quote: If you're a sports fan you realize that when you meet somebody, like a girlfriend, they kind of have to root for your team. They don't have a choice.
f1e3f297-2255-4577-99d5-73a1ef20f352.author: Jimmy Fallon

d087e14a-b7e4-429e-b7a4-ba3f1085308d.quote: I want people to see the passion I have for swimming and become more involved in the sport.
d087e14a-b7e4-429e-b7a4-ba3f1085308d.author: Ryan Lochte

2aafd970-b995-4691-ad31-383656587009.quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
2aafd970-b995-4691-ad31-383656587009.author: Isaac Newton

bba519cf-0dff-438c-a976-ad642f8b9b19.quote: If you don't ask, you don't get.
bba519cf-0dff-438c-a976-ad642f8b9b19.author: Stevie Wonder

c8f5dc8e-bbde-41f1-89e7-5ddf86c1f1b9.quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
c8f5dc8e-bbde-41f1-89e7-5ddf86c1f1b9.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

a896b23c-b222-4351-8dca-8d656e975dea.quote: Football is football and talent is talent. But the mindset of your team makes all the difference.
a896b23c-b222-4351-8dca-8d656e975dea.author: Robert Griffin III

55db13ec-6fdf-48cc-bd55-60cd64d6500d.quote: That's the biggest gap in sports, the difference between the winner and the loser of the Super Bowl.
55db13ec-6fdf-48cc-bd55-60cd64d6500d.author: John Madden

07ea1411-a009-42c1-891b-3a3767fb3a7b.quote: Skiing combines outdoor fun with knocking down trees with your face.
07ea1411-a009-42c1-891b-3a3767fb3a7b.author: Dave Barry

4f9708c7-d293-4745-8259-1a288181521b.quote: Team sports are very important for shaping personalities. It's important that kids understand the mentality behind playing team sports and playing for one another and playing with friends.
4f9708c7-d293-4745-8259-1a288181521b.author: Brian O'Driscoll

b8945a79-b7e0-4db5-970a-cd49e0d0e4e9.quote: I'm a huge fan of Chicago sports and Chicago food, and I love going home and my family is still there. I guess it's pretty easy to have a normal life in Chicago.
b8945a79-b7e0-4db5-970a-cd49e0d0e4e9.author: Matt Walsh

3239e341-31d9-4239-b722-124db2117b9e.quote: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
3239e341-31d9-4239-b722-124db2117b9e.author: Anatole France

3dfeac4e-b1a6-44e3-aa5d-5c6f8e912004.quote: Golf appeals to the idiot in us and the child. Just how childlike golf players become is proven by their frequent inability to count past five.
3dfeac4e-b1a6-44e3-aa5d-5c6f8e912004.author: John Updike

73c359f5-6f50-40ac-b8cc-229eeb90da76.quote: I want to tell the world of cycling to please join me in telling Pat McQuaid to resign. I have never seen such an abuse of power in cycling's history - resign, Pat, if you love cycling. Resign even if you hate the sport.
73c359f5-6f50-40ac-b8cc-229eeb90da76.author: Greg LeMond

13028f1b-90e7-438b-91d1-c9f1b4617e6b.quote: Every sport needs its temple, its cathedral.
13028f1b-90e7-438b-91d1-c9f1b4617e6b.author: Thomas Friedman

a908faa5-bebf-4f32-b35f-0066a6b60e24.quote: Sports is remarkably cognitive. I think it's underrated just how smart it is. Actually, if I had more time, I would spend more time with sports. Watching it, reading about it, I think it's oddly underrated.
a908faa5-bebf-4f32-b35f-0066a6b60e24.author: Tyler Cowen

c9097f8d-5e1d-483e-9b3a-70defd1e9ecf.quote: When a sports movie really works, it gets you on all levels, because the stakes are high. It's black and white. It's win or lose.
c9097f8d-5e1d-483e-9b3a-70defd1e9ecf.author: Carla Gugino

21f668c6-5def-437c-b188-3b363075409c.quote: You don't play against opponents, you play against the game of basketball.
21f668c6-5def-437c-b188-3b363075409c.author: Bobby Knight

e19a035d-56cc-40f0-ae06-bcd2cf689e14.quote: First of all, what happens is, when you're good at something, you spend a lot of time with it. People identify you with that sport, so it becomes part of your identity.
e19a035d-56cc-40f0-ae06-bcd2cf689e14.author: Mike Krzyzewski

c15e043a-0886-476b-b18b-334c5d6db22e.quote: While the liberal media elite depict the bowler as a chubby guy with a comb-over and polyester pants, the reality is that bowling is one of the most tech-heavy sports today. Robotic pinsetters and computerized scoring were just the beginning.
c15e043a-0886-476b-b18b-334c5d6db22e.author: Chris Hardwick

292251fd-a188-48de-8721-4911cdbfef47.quote: I love inspirational R&B, like Mary J. Blige and Jennifer Hudson. I want to do that. That kind of music stays with you.
292251fd-a188-48de-8721-4911cdbfef47.author: Ashthon Jones

1ce2e7ba-9474-4f72-9909-25f721fdb3b2.quote: I'm from West Virginia. If you didn't know what was happening in NASCAR, you were on the outside. NASCAR is a big league sport, but it's still also country and redneck.
1ce2e7ba-9474-4f72-9909-25f721fdb3b2.author: Randy Moss

4ed5d890-096d-4530-b61f-76dc5e9d05a6.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
4ed5d890-096d-4530-b61f-76dc5e9d05a6.author: Elon Musk

12bb2cb7-6a9f-4904-95af-cd56bc7f6dda.quote: Bulls do not win bull fights. People do.
12bb2cb7-6a9f-4904-95af-cd56bc7f6dda.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

77d4418a-b0b8-493a-a46d-9c1a701b44ac.quote: If a tie is like kissing your sister, losing is like kissing you grandmother with her teeth out.
77d4418a-b0b8-493a-a46d-9c1a701b44ac.author: George Brett

a751c5f1-9e2e-47a5-84a0-f5b204bcf19b.quote: Perhaps the single most important element in mastering the techniques and tactics of racing is experience. But once you have the fundamentals, acquiring the experience is a matter of time.
a751c5f1-9e2e-47a5-84a0-f5b204bcf19b.author: Greg LeMond

4817c34f-ca4c-4964-9e91-8deeab91ae31.quote: I was sporty in high school. I played tennis and hockey, and was basketball captain. Then I went to university and stopped doing sport and started eating ice cream.
4817c34f-ca4c-4964-9e91-8deeab91ae31.author: Rebel Wilson

ee7c8dd9-9596-4202-b18e-ad5effe54eaa.quote: When we talk about reviews, what we are really talking about is just a market report - it's like reading about the new Lexus. You have to know what the guy writing the review cares about to understand his take. Does he like sports cars, or does he like Bentleys?
ee7c8dd9-9596-4202-b18e-ad5effe54eaa.author: Mike Nichols

17fc504e-6edf-4030-9ee4-585c21a372ca.quote: Sports and management are not as diverse as people think.
17fc504e-6edf-4030-9ee4-585c21a372ca.author: Harsha Bhogle

3027d839-e0ab-4094-8081-e0ce7eb3a289.quote: I was socially isolated as a kid. I had friends, but I wasn't very good at sports and that sort of thing so I became quite comfortable being by myself, exploring. The world was my private playground, and in it, I was supreme. Darwin, Faraday, Huxley and other great scientists were my companions.
3027d839-e0ab-4094-8081-e0ce7eb3a289.author: Vilayanur S. Ramachandran

57d049b2-dd7d-4ff3-b02f-7adf0f70e808.quote: In football, it's the ultimate team sport. You have to have good people around you as a quarterback for things to happen.
57d049b2-dd7d-4ff3-b02f-7adf0f70e808.author: Warren Moon

93762cfd-3948-4109-b4c1-c016bd3cbfa3.quote: All hockey players are bilingual. They know English and profanity.
93762cfd-3948-4109-b4c1-c016bd3cbfa3.author: Gordie Howe

b6dd2b77-f60f-45ee-bc83-7c4f16a4deed.quote: You need at least six or seven years to understand the philosophy and concentration of karate to know to clean your spirit of everything and dedicate your mind and body to the sport.
b6dd2b77-f60f-45ee-bc83-7c4f16a4deed.author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

13054cbf-b73c-478a-95f0-c1a97335650e.quote: There is nothing stronger in the world than gentleness.
13054cbf-b73c-478a-95f0-c1a97335650e.author: Han Suyin

13891d94-f6dd-4c0a-a8ea-25698d4d1a1d.quote: If there were no night, we would not appreciate the day, nor could we see the stars and the vastness of the heavens. We must partake of the bitter with the sweet. There is a divine purpose in the adversities we encounter every day. They prepare, they purge, they purify, and thus they bless.
13891d94-f6dd-4c0a-a8ea-25698d4d1a1d.author: James E. Faust

40a6ebdd-7030-411a-8e1f-fd6219b5ff9b.quote: As the only girl growing up among three brothers, I was always afraid of being excluded. If there was a game to be played, a sport to be learned, a competition to join, I was on my feet and ready. I didn't spend much time alone for fear that I'd miss out.
40a6ebdd-7030-411a-8e1f-fd6219b5ff9b.author: Elisabeth Shue

bd2e83a9-d896-4b83-95e5-1098203102a2.quote: Hard courts are very negative for the body. I know the sport is a business and creating these courts is easier than clay or grass, but I am 100 per cent sure it is wrong.
bd2e83a9-d896-4b83-95e5-1098203102a2.author: Rafael Nadal

f181508f-d900-41a0-a14f-7cbe0218a732.quote: The only thing that ultimately matters is to eat an ice-cream cone, play a slide trombone, plant a small tree, good God, now you're free.
f181508f-d900-41a0-a14f-7cbe0218a732.author: Ray Manzarek

dd6bb759-b65f-4beb-bfcb-81eaa712e821.quote: All the minor sports injuries you acquire over the years begin to multiply like flies when you get over 70.
dd6bb759-b65f-4beb-bfcb-81eaa712e821.author: Peter O'Toole

260a2b11-b92e-49d7-bc0d-fc2030ccd90e.quote: If my writing comes to a halt, I head to the shops: I find them very inspirational. And if I get into real trouble with my plot, I go out for a pizza with my husband.
260a2b11-b92e-49d7-bc0d-fc2030ccd90e.author: Sophie Kinsella

592d0ba1-9612-4dcd-8f0f-be0b03bfea9a.quote: Your personal life, your professional life, and your creative life are all intertwined. I went through a few very difficult years where I felt like a failure. But it was actually really important for me to go through that. Struggle, for me, is the most inspirational thing in the world at the end of the day - as long as you treat it that way.
592d0ba1-9612-4dcd-8f0f-be0b03bfea9a.author: Skylar Grey

3c9cca0a-78f4-44fc-a2a8-730288a29811.quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!
3c9cca0a-78f4-44fc-a2a8-730288a29811.author: Anne Frank
